T02D1410:253a-0: @253a # // rgya gar skad du shr'i ta tva bi sha d'a n'a ma shr'i samba ra britti /
T02D1410:253a-2: dpal sdom pa'i 'grel pa dpal de kho na nyid mkhas pa zhes bya ba //
T02D1410:253a-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1410:253a-4: kun nas snang min dpe med nyid //
T02D1410:253a-5: skyon med zhi ba kho na dang //
T02D1410:253a-6: rdzas med rang bzhin dag pa yi //
T02D1410:253a-7: byang chub sems la bdag phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1410:253a-8: gang gis stong pa nyid kyi lce rnams kyis ni
T02D1410:253a-9: rdo rje'i chu dang bshang pa khrag rnams myangs pa
T02D1410:253a-10: dang / byams sogs so rnams kyis ni gdong dang
T02D1410:253a-11: lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams sos pa des na
T02D1410:253a-12: dang / mkha' 'gro ste // mngon shes lnga yi
T02D1410:253a-13: zhal chen rnams kyis yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams
T02D1410:253a-14: zos pa des na drag po yin //
T02D1410:253a-15: bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pas dri ma
T02D1410:253a-16: gsum bral spyan gsum gyis sdom gang yin de la
T02D1410:253a-17: 'dud // 'dir ni legs grub rnams kyis rnam phye rdo rje theg pa'i snying po ni //
T02D1410:253a-18: sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rgya cher bshad pa rgyal ba'i sras kyis byas //
T02D1410:253a-19: don gyi ro yi chu gter 'dus par blo gros blun po gang bdag kyang //
T02D1410:253a-20: nam mkha' nam mkha' lding gi lam du sbrang bu dag kyang cis mi 'gro //
T02D1410:253a-21: gser las brdungs byas 'dra zhing chu skyes rnam rgyas pa //
T02D1410:253a-22: bkres pas nyen pa g-yos legs kha zas za ba 'dra //
T02D1410:253a-23: springs yig legs par bye 'dra rin chen sgrom phye 'dra //
T02D1410:253a-24: 'dir ni rgyud bzang rnam phye dga'i ba'i mchog 'dzin byed //
T02D1410:253a-25: bde ba sdug bsngal dngos po bral ba chos zhes
T02D1410:253b-0: bya dang longs spyod rdzogs @253b pa ston pa po
T02D1410:253b-1: // sprul pa sgyu ma mig 'phrul lta bur snang
T02D1410:253b-2: tshogs pa dang mkha' la rdzu 'phrul dang bcas pa
T02D1410:253b-3: // / ngo bo nyid ni dri ma med pa
T02D1410:253b-4: sku mchog 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod la bdag btud
T02D1410:253b-5: // / nas // bsdus pa'i rgyud ni sbas pa
T02D1410:253b-6: 'grel bar byed pa de kho na nyid mkhas pa
T02D1410:253b-7: // / nas // bshad par bya // theg pa che las theg pa'i mchog /
T02D1410:253b-8: sngags kyi theg pa bya sla ba //
T02D1410:253b-9: nyan thos ma yin rang rgyal min //
T02D1410:253b-10: theg pa chen po'i don bsdus pa //
T02D1410:253b-11: mu stegs kun gyis ma myangs shing //
T02D1410:253b-12: pha rol phyin pa'i tshul la brten /
T02D1410:253b-13: gsang sngags tshul ni rnam grangs mang //
T02D1410:253b-14: bya ba spyod pa gnyis ka'i bdag //
T02D1410:253b-15: mod sde brgyud dang rtog rang bzhin //
T02D1410:253b-16: chos kyi phung po stong phrag ni //
T02D1410:253b-17: brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs rnams nyid //
T02D1410:253b-18: sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa yin //
T02D1410:253b-19: de las ches snying po yi rgyud //
T02D1410:253b-21: yan lag bcu gnyis gsungs la brten //
T02D1410:253b-22: mkha' 'gro ma yi man ngag brjod //
T02D1410:253b-23: rnam lnga mngon par rdzogs byang chub //
T02D1410:253b-24: chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1410:253b-25: shes rab thabs ni mnyam par sbyor //
T02D1410:253b-27: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1410:253b-28: dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:253b-29: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya //
T02D1410:253b-30: 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog //
T02D1410:253b-31: snyigs ma lnga yi dus 'dir ni //
T02D1410:253b-32: rtog pa po rnams blo zhen zhing //
T02D1410:253b-33: tshe thung brtson 'grus chung ba rnams //
T02D1410:253b-34: rgyas pa mdor bsdus ched du yang //
T02D1410:253b-35: shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis med //
T02D1410:253b-36: rgyal bas dpal ldan 'bras spungs bstan //
T02D1410:253b-37: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg //
T02D1410:253b-38: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni bla na med //
T02D1410:253b-39: gang du bde 'dod spro ba yis //
T02D1410:253b-40: dka' spyad kyis kyang sgrub par byed //
T02D1410:253b-41: gsal zhing gting dpag dka' ba dang /
T02D1410:253b-42: yod dang yod pa ma yin dang //
T02D1410:253b-43: rten cing ma nges ma khyab pa //
T02D1410:253b-44: kun rdzob skyo ba can gang yin //
T02D1410:253b-45: des na rtog ge bral ba yi //
T02D1410:253b-46: bde ba chen po dbu ma pa //
T02D1410:253b-47: stong nyid snying rje gnyis su med //
T02D1410:253b-48: gang du sems ni yongs su gsal //
T02D1410:253b-49: skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1410:253b-50: dga' dang bde ba bsgrub par bya //
T02D1410:253b-51: ae ma mkha' 'gro ma rgyud gang //
T02D1410:253b-52: rgyud rnams kun du mchog yin te //
T02D1410:253b-53: khams gsum dbang phyug ye shes ni //
T02D1410:253b-54: 'di las gzhan pa yod ma yin //
T02D1410:253b-55: 'di nyid gnyis med de nyid de //
T02D1410:254a-0: @254a * // bden pa gnyis po rnam phye ba //
T02D1410:254a-1: gsum gyis kun rdzob rab tu brjod //
T02D1410:254a-2: don dam pa gang gnyis dag gis //
T02D1410:254a-3: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor rdo rje bzlas //
T02D1410:254a-4: rang bzhin rlabs dang 'od gsal dang //
T02D1410:254a-5: zung du 'jug dang rim pa lnga //
T02D1410:254a-6: rgyud rnams kun du bshad pa yin //
T02D1410:254a-7: rim mtha' rim pa lngar shes nas //
T02D1410:254a-8: rgyud du mtha' drug la 'jug go //
T02D1410:254a-9: rgyud du mdor bstan rnam gsum dang //
T02D1410:254a-10: rgyas par bshad pa rnam gsum 'gyur //
T02D1410:254a-11: 'di yi rnam par bshad pa yang //
T02D1410:254a-12: rnal 'byor ma kun du spyod pa'i rgyud du /
T02D1410:254a-13: ji ltar mdor bstan rab tu brjod //
T02D1410:254a-14: rgyas par bshad pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1410:254a-15: so sor rgyas bshad brda dang ni //
T02D1410:254a-16: cho ga rgyas pa mtha' dag nyid //
T02D1410:254a-17: mdor bstan pa ni sprul pa yin //
T02D1410:254a-18: rgyas bshad longs spyod rdzogs par 'dod //
T02D1410:254a-19: so sor rgyas bshad mtha' dag ni //
T02D1410:254a-20: mya ngan 'das pa'i de nyid bstan //
T02D1410:254a-21: dpa' bo khyod kyis nga la bshad //
T02D1410:254a-22: sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis rtogs dka' //
T02D1410:254a-23: sgra dang sgra nyams brda dang ni //
T02D1410:254a-24: lam 'di kho na'i rjes brang nas //
T02D1410:254a-25: dad pa skyes nas de yang dag //
T02D1410:254a-26: rnal 'byor spyod tshul la gnas yin //
T02D1410:254a-27: blon po rmongs pa ngan sdig gis //
T02D1410:254a-28: bsgribs pa byis pa'i shes pa can //
T02D1410:254a-29: yongs su ma smin sems can gyi //
T02D1410:254a-32: de dag kun gyis kyang mi shes //
T02D1410:254a-33: mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang //
T02D1410:254a-34: mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtag dga' ba //
T02D1410:254a-35: nga rgyal la sogs bdun sems pa //
T02D1410:254a-36: de kun gyis sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D1410:254a-37: spyod yul gsang ba mi shes so //
T02D1410:254a-38: gzhan du'ang mdor bstan rgyas bshad ni //
T02D1410:254a-40: so sor rgyas bshad mdor bstan che //
T02D1410:254a-41: don kun gsal byed rgya cher 'gro la /
T02D1410:254a-42: de gnyis mngon shes thob rnams kyis //
T02D1410:254a-43: bya yis mkhas pas min pa nyid //
T02D1410:254a-44: de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag //
T02D1410:254a-45: de zhin rigs drug gis sdom pa'o //
T02D1410:254a-46: 'bras bu sgrub pa rgyu rnams kyis //
T02D1410:254a-47: rgyud ni rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02D1410:254a-48: de nyid bsdus pa sogs rnams ni //
T02D1410:254a-49: sgrub byed thabs kyi rgyud dag go //
T02D1410:254a-50: rgyud ni rgyun chags kun nas bshad //
T02D1410:254a-51: phyi ma snga ma las byung ba //
T02D1410:254a-52: de nyid gsang dang gsang chen te //
T02D1410:254b-0: phyi ma'i rgyud @254b du 'dod pa yin //
T02D1410:254b-1: gang zhig gsang ba rnam lnga ni //
T02D1410:254b-2: rtsa ba'i rgyud du de brjod bya //
T02D1410:254b-4: mngon par dbang bskur phyag rgya che //
T02D1410:254b-5: mngon brjod phyi ma la sogs dang //
T02D1410:254b-6: 'dus pa phyi ma nyid kyang ngo //
T02D1410:254b-8: shes rab thabs kyi ming las ni //
T02D1410:254b-9: 'dus pa dang ni sdom pa sogs //
T02D1410:254b-10: rtsa ba dang rgyu'i rgyud rnams ni //
T02D1410:254b-11: rdo rje mkha' 'gro rdor phreng sogs //
T02D1410:254b-12: bshad pa'i thabs kyis dad dag go //
T02D1410:254b-13: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D1410:254b-14: rgyan bdun gyis ni rigs pa yis //
T02D1410:254b-15: rgyud kyi rnam bshad rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D1410:254b-16: de phyir de la 'jug par bya //
T02D1410:254b-17: de bzhin du yang bshad rgyud ye shes rdo rje
T02D1410:254b-18: kun la btus par byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T02D1410:254b-20: bcom ldan 'das rgyan rnam pa bdun ji ltar lags //
T02D1410:254b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba //
T02D1410:254b-22: gleng bslang ba rnam pa lnga dang mtha' drug gi bshad pa dang /
T02D1410:254b-23: rigs pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D1410:254b-24: bshad pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D1410:254b-25: rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gnyis dang /
T02D1410:254b-26: gang zag rnam pa lnga'i slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang /
T02D1410:254b-27: bden pa rnam pa nyis kyis dgongs pa'o zhes so //
T02D1410:254b-28: rgyas par bshad pa yang 'dir mi dang rgyu mtshan dang byed pa po dang /
T02D1410:254b-30: dgongs pas bshad dang dgongs min dang /
T02D1410:254b-31: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don //
T02D1410:254b-32: sgra ji bzhin pa dang sgra ji bzhin pa min pa'o //
T02D1410:254b-35: yi ge'i don dang spyi'i dan sbas pa dang /
T02D1410:254b-44: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T02D1410:254b-46: rigs kyi bu kun rdzob ni mi brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
T02D1410:254b-47: de'i bden pa ni chu zla lta bu'o //
T02D1410:254b-48: don dam pa'i bden pa ni stong pa nyid chen po bco brgyad do //
T02D1410:254b-49: de'i bden pa ni mtha' ste gnas kyi rim pa'o zhes so //
T02D1410:254b-50: rdo rje phreng ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so sor rgyas par bshad pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:254b-51: rgyud kyi mtshan ni ming yin la /
T02D1410:254b-52: rgyu mtshan kye'o chags can gyi'o //
T02D1410:254b-53: 'di yi byed po rdo rje sems //
T02D1410:254b-54: tshad ni rim gyis la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:254b-55: dgos par bgrangs pa la sogs pa ni //
T02D1410:254b-56: sangs rgyas nyid kyang mchog yin no //
T02D1410:255a-1: chos kyi de nyid rab gsal byed //
T02D1410:255a-2: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
T02D1410:255a-3: zhes pa la sogs dgongs bshad do //
T02D1410:255a-4: dman la de nyid gsal ston pa //
T02D1410:255a-5: dgong spa min pas bshad pa ste /
T02D1410:255a-6: bdag med thams cad stong pa ru //
T02D1410:255a-7: dag go zhes sogs bstan pa'o //
T02D1410:255a-8: skal ngan la sbas padma dang //
T02D1410:255a-9: tsandan sogs bshad drang ba'i don //
T02D1410:255a-10: pad sogs btsun mo la sogs su //
T02D1410:255a-11: yang dag don ston nges pa'i don //
T02D1410:255a-12: bya ba spyod pa gnyis ka'i rgyud //
T02D1410:255a-13: rtog pa sogs su ji bzhin sgra //
T02D1410:255a-14: dkyil 'khor can sogs cho ga ni //
T02D1410:255a-15: skye bos gsal bar bstan pa'o //
T02D1410:255a-16: bshang ba gci ba la sogs sgra //
T02D1410:255a-17: 'jig rten bstan bcos phyi rol byas //
T02D1410:255a-18: yul sogs rjod byed sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1410:255a-19: rgyud du bstan pa sgra min pa'o //
T02D1410:255a-20: sgra don kho na yi ge'i don //
T02D1410:255a-21: spyi yi don gyi dbye ba gnyis //
T02D1410:255a-22: nyan thos 'gyod pa spong ba dang //
T02D1410:255a-23: bskyed pa gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1410:255a-24: sbas pa rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02D1410:255a-25: 'dod chags chos dang kun rdzob bden //
T02D1410:255a-26: ye shes gsum po rnam brtags pa'i //
T02D1410:255a-27: snying po 'dir yod phyir des de'o //
T02D1410:255a-28: 'od gsal ba ni rab ston dang //
T02D1410:255a-29: zung du 'jug pa rab rtogs byed //
T02D1410:255a-30: mthar thug rnam pa gnyis rab brjod //
T02D1410:255a-31: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig / rigs lnga bskyed pa'i rgyud yin te //
T02D1410:255a-32: rigs gcig gyur pa gleng gzhi yin //
T02D1410:255a-33: rdo rje sogs zung nges pa'i tshig / sgeg pa yang ni rgyu ru 'dod //
T02D1410:255a-34: ji bzhin sgra dang dgongs pa dang //
T02D1410:255a-35: de bzhin drang don bstan pa dang //
T02D1410:255a-36: yi ge'i don dang spyi yi don //
T02D1410:255a-37: tshogs la bshad pa mngon du'o //
T02D1410:255a-38: ji bzhin min dang nges don dang //
T02D1410:255a-39: de bzhin kho nar dgongs bshad dang //
T02D1410:255a-40: sbas dang mthar thug pa yang ni //
T02D1410:255a-41: slob ma bshad pa yin par 'dod //
T02D1410:255a-42: dngos po ma lus thos nas de //
T02D1410:255a-43: 'dzin pa la ni rnam par mkhas //
T02D1410:255a-44: skad cig gis ni brjod 'gyur ba //
T02D1410:255a-45: autpala zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02D1410:255a-46: gzung bya lhag par mang thos nas //
T02D1410:255a-47: ston pa yi ni nus med pa //
T02D1410:255a-48: bum pa'i ras bal sa bon bzhin //
T02D1410:255a-49: shes bya bang dkar gang zag brjod //
T02D1410:255a-50: dad dang ldan zhing snying rje shes //
T02D1410:255a-51: thos nas blo yi kha 'bye la //
T02D1410:255a-53: padma zhes bya'i gang zag ge //
T02D1410:255b-0: @255b thos pa nying [?] zhing nga rgyal ldan //
T02D1410:255b-1: rtsa ba med par mang du sma //
T02D1410:255b-2: rjes su gzung bar mi nus pa //
T02D1410:255b-3: tsandan zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02D1410:255b-4: tshul khrims bzang zhing mkhas la sgrin //
T02D1410:255b-5: shes rab ldan zhing rgyud gcig pa //
T02D1410:255b-6: thos nas legs par ston pa ni //
T02D1410:255b-7: rin chen zhes bya'i gang zag go //
T02D1410:255b-8: gang zag bzhi po 'di rnams la //
T02D1410:255b-9: tshogs pa bshad pa 'ba' zhig go //
T02D1410:255b-10: rin chen gang zag rtog dpyod pa //
T02D1410:255b-11: slob ma la bshad snod yin no //
T02D1410:255b-12: bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D1410:255b-13: phan don can gyi rgyud bstan bya //
T02D1410:255b-14: 'di nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams kun //
T02D1410:255b-15: drang bar bya'o gzhan du min //
T02D1410:255b-17: da ni slob ma rnams kyi don la the tshom
T02D1410:255b-18: gyis rab tu 'jug pa'i don du brjod bya ba
T02D1410:255b-19: la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D1410:255b-20: 'dir brjod bya ba ni shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'o //
T02D1410:255b-21: 'di'i yang so sor rtogs par byed pa po rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon par brjod pa'o //
T02D1410:255b-22: de dag phan tshun brjod bya rjod byed kyi mtshan nyid ni 'brel ba'o //
T02D1410:255b-23: dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni dgos pa'o //
T02D1410:255b-24: phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa ni 'dir dogs pa'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1410:255b-25: 'di rnams mngon par gzigs nas nyan thos kyi sdom
T02D1410:255b-26: pa dang bral ba'i gdul bya rnams kyi 'dod pa
T02D1410:255b-27: lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i bsam pas gsang
T02D1410:255b-28: chen gyi gnas kyi dpa' bo dang //
T02D1410:255b-29: dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor
T02D1410:255b-30: ba'i phag mos gsol ba btab pas sh'akya thub pas
T02D1410:255b-31: dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rtsa ba'i
T02D1410:255b-32: rgyud mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa las gzhung tshad
T02D1410:255b-33: bdun brgya pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1410:255b-34: bdag las / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1410:255b-35: pa'i don skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid
T02D1410:255b-36: sbyin pa po yang dag par bstan to //
T02D1410:255b-37: da ni bsdus pa'i don la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:255b-38: de la thog mar bzhugs pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa dang //
T02D1410:255b-39: de nas dam tshig gi spyod pa nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:255b-40: ston pa po dang gsol ba 'debs pa po nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:255b-41: rigs ldan ma'i don gyis dang /
T02D1410:255b-42: pho nya mo mchod pa nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:255b-43: 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgom pa nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:255b-44: byang chub kyi sems kyis mchod pa'i don gyis dang /
T02D1410:255b-45: sdig pa thams cad rnam par grol ba nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-1: pa nyid sgrub pa'i thabs nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-2: dam tshig skyong ba nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-3: dam tshig bye ba bsrung ba nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-4: bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-5: zla ba btung ba nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-6: dbang po gnyis kyis snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-7: lha'i bde ba nyid bsngags pa nyid kyis dang /
T02D1410:256a-8: lha dang mi'i bde ba nyid bsngags pa nyid kyis gnas pa ste le'u dang po la'o //
T02D1410:256a-9: de nas ri la sogs pa'i gnas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa ste /
T02D1410:256a-10: de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D1410:256a-11: zhabs kyis rgya cher bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas
T02D1410:256a-12: rgyud ji snyed par rtogs par bye ste mngas pa
T02D1410:256a-13: nyid kyi phyir 'dir ma brjod do //
T02D1410:256a-14: da ni rtogs sla ba nyid kyis bsdus pa'i don
T02D1410:256a-15: mdor bstan nas tshig gi don bshad pa'i don du
T02D1410:256a-16: // de nas 'di las zhes pa la sogs pas rgyud rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1410:256a-17: rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du 'di skad bdag
T02D1410:256a-18: gis zhes pa la sogs pas nges par bstan pa
T02D1410:256a-19: ma yin nam // 'dir de nas 'di las zhes pa la sogs pas ji ltar yin /
T02D1410:256a-20: 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin no zhe
T02D1410:256a-21: na 'di ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te
T02D1410:256a-22: gang gi phyir gsungs pa don la so sor rton
T02D1410:256a-23: gyi sgra ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur bar bya
T02D1410:256a-24: ba ni ma yin no zhes so //
T02D1410:256a-25: 'dir yi ge'i tshogs ming rnams kyis dngos po dang
T02D1410:256a-26: dngos po med par so sor rtog par byed do
T02D1410:256a-27: // 'dir dngos po dang dngos po med pa gcig
T02D1410:256a-28: la yang ming du mar 'gyur la de rnams kyi
T02D1410:256a-29: gcig gtso bor yang ma yin te /
T02D1410:256a-30: thams cad kyis dngos po gcig rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1410:256a-31: dper na bud med dang mi mo la sogs pa
T02D1410:256a-32: rnams kyi lang tsho ma'i dngos po rjod par byed
T02D1410:256a-35: nam mkha'i me tog gi dngos po med pa rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1410:256a-36: de bzhin du 'dir aa yig ni de bzhin nyid rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1410:256a-37: de bzhin du yang mchog gi dang po'i rgyud du
T02D1410:256a-38: aa yig ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste gdod
T02D1410:256a-39: ma nas ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes
T02D1410:256a-40: so // de'i phyir bdun pa'i mthas ae yig tu 'gyur te don nyid las dang po'o //
T02D1410:256a-41: rten dang brten pa dag tu brtags pa nyid lta bu nges par bstan pa ma yin no //
T02D1410:256b-0: de ltar yang rtog pa thams cad kun las btus pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud @256b du ;
T02D1410:256b-1: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1410:256b-2: thams cad sa yi dbang phyug mchog //
T02D1410:256b-3: ces pa la sogs pas bzhugs pa'i gnas so //
T02D1410:256b-5: nam mkha' bems min dang ba dang //
T02D1410:256b-6: zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D1410:256b-7: de bzhin du zung du 'jug pa la rten dang brten par brtags nas thams cad du gsungs so //
T02D1410:256b-8: des na gang du 'di skad bdag gis yod pa
T02D1410:256b-9: de ni rgyal ba'i bka' yin la gang du med
T02D1410:256b-10: pa de ni ma yin no zhes sangs rgyas pa
T02D1410:256b-11: rnams kyis brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1410:256b-13: legs par gzung ba'i chos la sngon rabs kyi //
T02D1410:256b-14: mkhas par rlom pas 'jig rten 'di cir 'gyur //
T02D1410:256b-15: sgra 'du byed 'dom mi sgras sbyar bya yi //
T02D1410:256b-16: don la gal te sdod po'i sgras dang de'o //
T02D1410:256b-17: mis dang sdong po'i sgra yis ni //
T02D1410:256b-18: tha dad don rtogs bya min te //
T02D1410:256b-19: kha cig tu ni mang po'i sgras //
T02D1410:256b-20: don gcig so sor rtogs par byed //
T02D1410:256b-21: kha cig tu ni sgra gcig gis //
T02D1410:256b-22: sna tshogs don rnams so sor rtogs //
T02D1410:256b-23: ae dang bha ga padma dag //
T02D1410:256b-24: bde ba'i gnas dang bde ldan dang //
T02D1410:256b-25: seng ge'i khri dang dmigs pa med //
T02D1410:256b-26: de bzhin nyid dang phar phyin 'dod //
T02D1410:256b-27: dper na sems can lta ba'i sgras //
T02D1410:256b-28: ral gri lan tsha ne tso rnams //
T02D1410:256b-29: de bzhin he ru ka yis sgras //
T02D1410:256b-30: mkha' 'gro ye shes bde thub pa //
T02D1410:256b-32: 'dir log pa'i thos pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal can
T02D1410:256b-33: rnams kyis grub pa'i mtha' la smod pa ltung ba
T02D1410:256b-35: mngon par brjod pa 'bum par yang /
T02D1410:256b-36: stong nyid snying rje gcig nyid du //
T02D1410:256b-37: rgyud gang du ni rab tu bstan //
T02D1410:256b-38: 'jig rten mgon po sgrub byed pa //
T02D1410:256b-39: rgyud nge sangs rgyas bstan pa'o //
T02D1410:256b-42: tshig gi don rjes su mtshams sbyar ba'i rgol ba'i lan gsungs so //
T02D1410:256b-43: kye'i rdo rjes ni 'khor lo sdom pa 'di ni shes par bya bar rgyal ba rnams kyis bstan //
T02D1410:256b-44: kye'i rdo rje ni de bzhin 'dus pa'i tshig la shes par bya ste de dag rgyud la'o //
T02D1410:256b-45: de nyid phyir na 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi cho gas rgyud ni shin tu gsal bar byed pa'i phyir //
T02D1410:256b-46: rgyud shes don du rnam par sgom pa lnga yi bdag nyid mthong ba rab tu bya //
T02D1410:257a-0: de nas 'di las zhes pa la sogs pa nas gnas zhes pa'i mthar thug pa bzhugs @257a * //
T02D1410:257a-1: pa'i gnas bshad pa rnam pa bzhis rnam par rgyas par bya ste /
T02D1410:257a-2: de nas te rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bar ma chad par ro //
T02D1410:257a-3: dpal he ru ka'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas
T02D1410:257a-4: rdo rje phag mo la bos par gyur pa kye
T02D1410:257a-5: rdo rje phag mo rtsa ba'i rgyud du rnal 'byor
T02D1410:257a-6: la sogs pa 'ang nges par brjod pa de nyid
T02D1410:257a-7: gsang chen bdun bshad par bya'i nyon cig / gzhung
T02D1410:257a-8: bsdus pas ni mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D1410:257a-9: rgyas pa las ni min ni gzhung bsdus pa 'dod
T02D1410:257a-10: pa la de kho na'i don du ji ltar bstan
T02D1410:257a-12: na'i yi ge rnam par brtags pa la'o //
T02D1410:257a-13: de'i rgyu ci yin zhe na /
T02D1410:257a-14: rtsa ba mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa ru gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:257a-15: snyigs ma lnga'i dus su 'dzam bu'i glong ba'i mi rnams dang /
T02D1410:257a-16: khyad par 'phags pa'i yul du tshe thung zhing shes
T02D1410:257a-17: rab dman pa 'byung bar gyur te rdo rje slob
T02D1410:257a-18: dpon gang yin pa de dag rtsa ba'i ltung ba
T02D1410:257a-20: dge slong rnams mi dge ba bcu byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1410:257a-21: khyim na gnas pa rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi rdzas
T02D1410:257a-22: nyes par longs spyod par byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1410:257a-23: // mkhas pa rnams ma thos pa'i rgyud 'chad par 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1410:257a-24: mkhas pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rgyud kyi dka'
T02D1410:257a-25: 'grel dang rgya cher 'grel byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D1410:257a-26: ro // rgyud don phyin ci log tu bstan nas dmyal bar 'gro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:257a-27: gang zhig sangs rgyas pa rmongs pa de rnams dad
T02D1410:257a-28: pa blun pa nyid kyis khyim na gnas pa'i slob
T02D1410:257a-29: dpon la bsnyen bskur byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:257a-30: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams la sun 'byin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:257a-31: slob ma gang yin pa de rnams bla ma dam pa la skyon tshol ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:257a-32: bla ma dam pa ma yin pa bza' ba dang
T02D1410:257a-33: gnyis su med pa rnams la bstod pa dang mchod
T02D1410:257a-35: bla ma mnyes par bya bar gsungs par gsung bzhin mi byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:257a-36: chos ston pa po rnams mi dge ba bcu la 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:257a-37: bud med rnams 'dod pa la shin tu brkam pa
T02D1410:257a-38: 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa 'di'i phyir thams cad
T02D1410:257a-39: du rgyas par bstan pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1410:257a-40: dpal he ru ka mnyam par sbyor //
T02D1410:257b-0: zhes pa ni phag mo dang lhan cig 'dus @257b pa'i he ru ka'i'o //
T02D1410:257b-1: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa ni mngon par
T02D1410:257b-2: 'dod pa thams cad ster ba po nyid kyi phyir
T02D1410:257b-3: ro // de nyid bla ma las zhes pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang /
T02D1410:257b-4: gzugs med par kun du spyod pa rnams kyi bde
T02D1410:257b-5: ba'i rgyu ni bla ma ste bde ba chen po'o
T02D1410:257b-6: // kyang ni yang dag par 'byung bar byed pa la'o //
T02D1410:257b-9: rgyud 'di rgyun chags zhes bya ste //
T02D1410:257b-10: phyi ma snga ma las byung ba //
T02D1410:257b-11: de nyid gsang ba gsang chen te //
T02D1410:257b-12: phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod //
T02D1410:257b-14: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom ni 'khor ro //
T02D1410:257b-16: dad ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu //
T02D1410:257b-17: ston pa dbang po 'khor dang ni //
T02D1410:257b-18: yul dang dus kyang nges bstan pa //
T02D1410:257b-19: rang nyid tshad mar rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D1410:257b-22: de nas zhes pa shes rab ma'i shin tu dga' ba'i bar ma chad pa'o //
T02D1410:257b-24: mdor bsdus pa las rgyas pa min ni phag mo dang 'dus pa las so //
T02D1410:257b-25: dpal he ru ka ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:257b-26: mnyam par sbyor ni bdag nyid dang de'i bha ga lhan cig pa'o //
T02D1410:257b-27: kun ni zhi ba la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D1410:257b-29: 'dod pa dang gzugs kyi yul gyi bde ba grub pa'o //
T02D1410:257b-30: bla ma ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi bde ba'o //
T02D1410:257b-31: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom ni /
T02D1410:257b-32: rtsa sum cu rtsa drug kun nas bsdus pa'o //
T02D1410:257b-33: gsang chen ni sa'i khams so //
T02D1410:257b-34: mchog gi ni de bzhin du chu'o //
T02D1410:257b-37: thams cad bdag nyid ni gnas pa /
T02D1410:257b-39: sangs rgyas kun bdag sdom pa ste //
T02D1410:257b-40: zhes kha sbyor 'byung ba'i rgyud du gsungs so //
T02D1410:257b-42: bzhugs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa der //
T02D1410:257b-43: thig le'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
T02D1410:257b-46: thig le zla ba khu ba sku //
T02D1410:257b-47: rnam par bcad pa rdul nyid gsungs //
T02D1410:257b-48: aa yig mun can thugs rab brjod //
T02D1410:257b-49: mkha' khams ae la rnam par gnas //
T02D1410:257b-50: zhes pa ni spyi'i don te /
T02D1410:257b-51: tshigs pa la bshad pa yang ngo //
T02D1410:257b-52: de nas 'di las zhes pa la sogs pa la
T02D1410:257b-53: gsang chen ni shes rab ma'i gsang ba'i gnas so
T02D1410:257b-54: // dpal he ru ka ni khu ba'o //
T02D1410:257b-55: mnyam par sbyor ni gtum mos lhan cig gcig nyid do //
T02D1410:258a-2: bla ma ni khyad par dga' ba'o //
T02D1410:258a-3: de mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom ste rang bzhin can rnams kyi tshogs /
T02D1410:258a-5: gsang chen ni rdo rje lha mo'i gnas so //
T02D1410:258a-6: mchog gi ni sbas pa'i dpe spangs pa'o //
T02D1410:258a-7: dgyes pa ni shes rab ma'i shin tu bde ba'o //
T02D1410:258a-8: thams cad bdag nyid ni rgyal ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1410:258a-9: rtag tu gnas ni btsun mo'i 'khor du 'jug bzhin pa la'o //
T02D1410:258a-10: de nas 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bar ma chad pa'o //
T02D1410:258a-11: gsang chen ni thams cad stong pa'o //
T02D1410:258a-12: mdor bsdus las ni rnam par mi rtog pa las so //
T02D1410:258a-13: rgyas pa min las ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rtog pa las so //
T02D1410:258a-14: dpal he ru ka mnyam par sbyor ni kun rdzob
T02D1410:258a-15: dang don dam pa'i bden pa dag snang ba med
T02D1410:258a-16: par sbyor ba'o // bla ma las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam las so //
T02D1410:258a-17: bla ma ni shes rab dang thabs kyi de nyid do //
T02D1410:258a-18: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1410:258a-19: gsang chen ni thams cad 'dus pa'o //
T02D1410:258a-20: mchog gi ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D1410:258a-21: dgyes pa ni stong pa chen po la'o //
T02D1410:258a-22: thams cad bdag nyid ni shin tu stong pa la'o //
T02D1410:258a-23: rtag tu gnas ni stong pa la ste thabs shes
T02D1410:258a-24: rab kyi gzugs kyis dus gsum du 'khor ba'i bar
T02D1410:258a-25: du gnas te rten dang brten pa dag gcig dag
T02D1410:258a-26: nyid kyis so // gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:258a-27: chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug lus //
T02D1410:258a-28: thams cad gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1410:258a-30: de bzhin du rtag tu gnas ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1410:258a-31: ma sgyu 'phrul chen po dka' bar spyod ma stong
T02D1410:258a-32: pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid ni dngos po
T02D1410:258a-33: dang dngos po med pa rnam par spang ba'o zhes
T02D1410:258a-35: da ni dam tshig gi spyod pa nus pa nan tan du byed pa'i don du gsungs /
T02D1410:258a-36: sems dpa' pho nya kun rang bzhin //
T02D1410:258a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog //
T02D1410:258a-39: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1410:258a-40: sgra yi tshul las rnam nges 'byung //
T02D1410:258a-41: dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul lo //
T02D1410:258a-42: zhes te pho nya mo ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams thams cad do //
T02D1410:258a-43: de'i rang bzhin ni chos kyi sku ste dag pa'i
T02D1410:258b-0: ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i @258b mtshan nyid
T02D1410:258b-1: gzhan gyi don byed pa po'o //
T02D1410:258b-2: sems dpa' ni khams gsum pa'i mtshan nyid de bshad pa'i rgyud du yang /
T02D1410:258b-3: sems can dag ni g-yo bar bshad //
T02D1410:258b-4: snod ni brtan pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:258b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje chen po'i rang
T02D1410:258b-7: bzhin gyi sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes
T02D1410:258b-8: bshad / de kho na bde ba'i mchog ste lhan
T02D1410:258b-9: cig skyes pa'i sku shes rab dang thabs rang gi
T02D1410:258b-10: bshad / don byed pa'o // ma 'dres pa la
T02D1410:258b-11: sogs pa chos sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T02D1410:258b-12: bshad / don byed pa'o // do // lhan cig
T02D1410:258b-13: skyes pa'i chos 'di dag gi rnal 'byor pa ni
T02D1410:258b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' ste yang dag par sbyor ba'o
T02D1410:258b-16: ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das ni de kho na
T02D1410:258b-17: tshangs pa sku'i rdo rje 'dzin te sprul pa'i sku'o
T02D1410:258b-19: gzugs kun nas gsal ba'i phyir bcom ldan te gzugs
T02D1410:258b-20: phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa
T02D1410:258b-21: nyid kyi phyir te gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:258b-22: phun tshogs gzugs dang dbang phyug nyid //
T02D1410:258b-23: de bzhin brtson dang grags pa ste //
T02D1410:258b-25: bsod nams phung po'i mthu las so //
T02D1410:258b-26: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom pa ni de
T02D1410:258b-27: kho na rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa
T02D1410:258b-28: nyid kyi phyir / dbang bskur ba'i sangs rgyas su blta bar bya'o //
T02D1410:258b-29: sgra'i tshul ni sngags kyi sku ste 'di las gsum
T02D1410:258b-30: yang dag par sbyor ba las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D1410:258b-31: sku gzhom du med pa'i sgra'o //
T02D1410:258b-32: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du yang //
T02D1410:258b-33: dper na rnga las ma brdungs pa //
T02D1410:258b-35: de bzhin rgyal ba'ang lhun grub tu //
T02D1410:258b-36: ston par byed pa nyid du 'byung //
T02D1410:258b-37: rnam nges 'byung ni sngags kyi lha nyid de yang
T02D1410:258b-38: 'jig rten gsum nyid du nges par phyung ste gdul
T02D1410:258b-39: ba rnams la sgra kun du gsal ba'i phyir ro
T02D1410:258b-40: // dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul ni lus 'di
T02D1410:258b-41: nyid dam tshig gi spyod pa'i yul du rtogs par
T02D1410:258b-43: dam tshig gi spyod pa ni 'chang bzhin par brjod par bya'o //
T02D1410:258b-45: gzhan la thabs kyis byed pa ni //
T02D1410:258b-46: de bzhin kho na 'gro ba'i gnyen //
T02D1410:258b-48: byis pa'i spyod yul blta bar bya //
T02D1410:259a-1: gsol ba 'debs pa po brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:259a-2: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' //
T02D1410:259a-3: thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas //
T02D1410:259a-4: bsrub bya srub byed sbyor ba las //
T02D1410:259a-5: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
T02D1410:259a-9: sku gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa gtsang zhing dag pa'i gzugs rang bzhin dang /
T02D1410:259a-10: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1410:259a-11: sprul pa rnams kyis tha dad du 'jug pa can
T02D1410:259a-12: thams cad stong pa dbyings kyi ngo bo can no
T02D1410:259a-13: // 'jig rten gsum du rnyed par dka' ni bsod nams dman pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1410:259a-14: thog ma dbus mtha' yang dag gnas ni chos thams
T02D1410:259a-15: cad la dus gsum du yang dag gnas pa yang
T02D1410:259a-16: ngo // de bzhin du yang ye shes kyi tshogs dang bral ba rnams kyi yul ma yin pa'o //
T02D1410:259a-17: dgongs pa pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1410:259a-18: bsrub bya srub byed sbyor ba las ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang /
T02D1410:259a-19: bsrub bya chos 'byung du bshad do //
T02D1410:259a-20: srub byed rdo rjer brjod par bya //
T02D1410:259a-21: sbyor ba dbyings dang ye shes yin //
T02D1410:259a-22: bdud rtsi lta bur mchog tu 'byung //
T02D1410:259a-23: dngos su sangs rgyas nyid du byed //
T02D1410:259a-25: bsam gtan la sogs kyi sgra dag las /
T02D1410:259a-26: bsam gtan gyi sogs kyis kyang /
T02D1410:259a-27: 'di nyid du nges par ston pa'i bzlas pa dang /
T02D1410:259a-31: bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'o //
T02D1410:259a-33: rnal 'byor nyid cho ga ye shes /
T02D1410:259a-34: rgyud du gsungs pas mnyan par gyis //
T02D1410:259a-35: zhes pa'i rnal 'byor ni gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:259a-36: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1410:259a-37: rnal 'byor zhes par mngon brjod bya //

T02D1410:262b-10: zhes pa phyag rgya chen mo'i don du'o //
T02D1410:262b-11: 'di'i tshig snga ma la sogs pa ni dpal 'dus
T02D1410:262b-12: pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga par gsungs pa
T02D1410:262b-13: / rdo rje skyil krung gis sems ni /
T02D1410:262b-14: nor bu'i nang du chud pa lta //
T02D1410:262b-15: rgyu mthun la sogs bde ba rdzogs //
T02D1410:262b-16: dri med nyid par kho nar de'o //
T02D1410:262b-18: des na rdo rje skyil krung ni bha gar lingga
T02D1410:262b-19: bzhag nas byang chub kyi sems rdo rje nor bu'i
T02D1410:262b-20: nang du chud pa ni yid ni nang du chud
T02D1410:262b-21: pa'o // lhan cig skyes pa'i sems nang du chud pa des /
T02D1410:262b-22: 'dod pa'i dngos grub phyag rgya chen mo rnam pa'i
T02D1410:262b-23: mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang
T02D1410:262b-24: / snying rje'i snying po can bde ba chen po'i
T02D1410:262b-25: thabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa bsgom par
T02D1410:262b-26: / bya'o // nyi ma'i snang ba ye shes kyi
T02D1410:262b-27: phyag rgya la dmigs pa zung du 'jug pa'i rnal
T02D1410:262b-29: ji srid du nor bu'i rtse mo nas spyi bor
T02D1410:262b-30: dri ma med pa nyid thob par gyur pa de
T02D1410:262b-31: srid du mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba de bsgom par
T02D1410:262b-32: bya'o // de las rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus dang
T02D1410:262b-33: ldan pa rnams kyis skye ba 'di nyid la sangs
T02D1410:262b-36: las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang //
T02D1410:262b-37: ye shes phyag rgya sogs dmigs dang //
T02D1410:262b-38: phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas //
T02D1410:262b-41: ji srid byang chub sems 'dor ba //
T02D1410:262b-42: skye gnas las thob rgyun ma chad //
T02D1410:262b-43: de srid du ni rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1410:262b-44: mi bya kun du dga' ba mchog //
T02D1410:262b-45: bde ba'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis //
T02D1410:262b-46: ldan pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan ni //
T02D1410:262b-47: ji srid khu ba brtan gyur pa //
T02D1410:262b-48: bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya //
T02D1410:262b-49: lte bar rgyu mthun nyid du brjod //
T02D1410:262b-50: snying gar rnam par smin par dran //
T02D1410:262b-51: mgrin par skyes bu byed pa nyid //
T02D1410:262b-52: spyi bor dri med nyid rab gsal //
T02D1410:263a-2: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus dag tu //
T02D1410:263a-3: zla ba nya la des bsgrub bya //
T02D1410:263a-5: 'dir 'dod pa ni dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po'o //
T02D1410:263a-6: dngos grub ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i stong pa
T02D1410:263a-7: nyid chen po rnal 'byor pa'i rang rig par bya
T02D1410:263a-8: ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D1410:263a-9: 'gyur ba dang g-yo ba'i dngos grub dag dang /
T02D1410:263a-10: mchog gi dngos grub phyag rgya chen mo sangs rgyas
T02D1410:263a-11: kyi yon tan ma lus par ster bas sangs rgyas
T02D1410:263a-12: kyi gzugs brnyan sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid bsgom par
T02D1410:263a-13: bya'o zhes so // yang na phyi'i yan lag med
T02D1410:263a-14: pa la lag pa'i phyag rgya gsor bas ye shes
T02D1410:263a-15: kyi phyag rgya dang lhan cig gzugs gcig tu gyur
T02D1410:263a-16: pa thams cad stong pa sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan
T02D1410:263a-17: nye bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom
T02D1410:263a-18: par bya'o gsungs pa yang skyon dang bcas pa'i phyag
T02D1410:263a-19: rgya yongs su spang par bya'o //
T02D1410:263a-20: phyag rgya bzang mo bde ba bsgom pa'i don du gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1410:263a-22: med pa lag pa'i sbyor ba yi //
T02D1410:263a-23: phyag rgya rang la rag las pa //
T02D1410:263a-24: sems kyi nor bu spangs pa yi //
T02D1410:263a-26: rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog //
T02D1410:263a-27: yang dang yang du gsor byed pa //
T02D1410:263a-28: zhes kun spangs rnams la gsungs so //
T02D1410:263a-29: yang na las kyi phyag rgya med na ye shes
T02D1410:263a-30: kyi phyag rgyas rnam par rtogs pa snyoms par zhugs
T02D1410:263a-31: pa phyag rgya chen mo rnam par mi rtog pa
T02D1410:263a-33: skye dgu'i bdag po'am rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1410:263a-34: de bzhin du las dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya
T02D1410:263a-35: ni rab tu chags pas mchog gi dga' ba'i gnas
T02D1410:263a-36: skabs 'phags pas ci yang mi smra ba'i dngos pos
T02D1410:263a-37: bsgom par bya'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1410:263a-38: da ni bde ba chen po'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:263a-39: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1410:263a-40: byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya //
T02D1410:263a-42: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas sgrub pa chen po'i rnal
T02D1410:263a-43: 'byor dbang bskur bas rnam par bsgom par bya ba
T02D1410:263a-44: phyag rgya la rjes su chags par byed pa'i yid
T02D1410:263a-45: byin gyis brlab pa'i don du rang rdzas thig le
T02D1410:263a-46: rnams kyi ro myong bas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1410:263a-47: mchod pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:263a-48: phyi rol du sangs rgyas gzi brjid ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1410:263b-0: la @263b sogs par gnas pa'i sems kyi thig le
T02D1410:263b-1: rnams kyis ming med kyis ji srid du gsang bar
T02D1410:263b-2: 'phangs pa la'o // rang rdzas thig le 'pho ba
T02D1410:263b-3: med pa'i ye shes rnams kyi de bzhin du nor
T02D1410:263b-4: bu'i bu gar phat yig gis 'pho ba med pa'i
T02D1410:263b-5: ye shes kun du gnas pas sangs rgyas rnams mnyes
T02D1410:263b-6: 'phangs pa la'o // par byed do // mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du rab tu gsungs pa /
T02D1410:263b-7: rang rdzas mdzes pa nyid kyi rdzas //
T02D1410:263b-8: stong dang shin tu stong pa dang //
T02D1410:263b-9: stong pa chen po'i rgyu de yis //
T02D1410:263b-10: thams cad stong pa mngon sum du //
T02D1410:263b-11: byas las bde chen skad cig gis //
T02D1410:263b-12: mchod par bya phyir rdzogs par bya //
T02D1410:263b-17: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //
T02D1410:263b-18: thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang //
T02D1410:263b-19: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1410:263b-20: de ltar the tshom med pa nyid //
T02D1410:263b-22: mthong ba ni nu ma dang skra dang ldan ma'o //
T02D1410:263b-23: reg pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya lha'i gzugs kyis rtogs pa de'i'o //
T02D1410:263b-24: de la 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rim pa ji ltar gsungs pas //
T02D1410:263b-25: phag mo de rnam par bsgoms nas sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1410:263b-26: aom a'a: h'um ho ham ksha: sku dang gsung dang
T02D1410:263b-27: thugs dang lte ba dang gtsug tor dang gsang ba
T02D1410:263b-29: de nas go cha gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs nas //
T02D1410:263b-30: padma dang rdo rje dag la aom bam bsgom par bya //
T02D1410:263b-31: yan lag la dgod par byas pas dpag tu med
T02D1410:263b-32: pa zil gyis mnan nas h'um phat bya zhing dga'
T02D1410:263b-34: thos pa ni zab mo'i chos so //
T02D1410:263b-37: mthong ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni dag pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'o //
T02D1410:263b-38: de las rgyu mthun pa'i bde ba la reg pa'o //
T02D1410:263b-39: de nyid thos pas te shin tu dga' ba'i sgra dang bla ma'i zhal snga nas thos so //
T02D1410:263b-40: kyang yig las rdzogs pa drug gi bsnyen pa dang
T02D1410:263b-41: sbyin pa la sogs pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba las
T02D1410:263b-42: grol zhing mi dge ba spangs pas grol bar 'gyur
T02D1410:263b-43: ro // mtshams med pa la sogs pa byas pa'i sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:263b-45: sdig pa grol ba bsod nams bskyed pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1410:263b-46: de las cir 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa //
T02D1410:264a-0: @264a * // rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nams mchog //
T02D1410:264a-1: dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa'o //
T02D1410:264a-2: sngags bzlas pa dang bsam gtan dang /
T02D1410:264a-3: bde ba yis kyang bsgrub par bya //
T02D1410:264a-5: rnal 'byor pa nyid ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo grub pa /
T02D1410:264a-6: sa bdun pa'i dbang po nyid /
T02D1410:264a-7: de nas sa brgyad pa'i dbang po nyid /
T02D1410:264a-9: de bzhin du gsung rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D1410:264a-10: gnas pa'i sngags pas brgyad pa'i dbang phyug ces so
T02D1410:264a-11: // yang na sa bcu pa'i dbang po nyid de
T02D1410:264a-12: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i ye shes las skyes pa
T02D1410:264a-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
T02D1410:264a-14: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa nyid kyang
T02D1410:264a-15: sgrub par byed do zhes pa'i don ni sgrub pa'i
T02D1410:264a-17: sngags kyi bzlas pas ni sngags rnams gsungs te /
T02D1410:264a-19: aom sumbha ni sumbha hum h'um phat /
T02D1410:264a-20: aom grihna grihna hum h'um phat /
T02D1410:264a-21: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1410:264a-22: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga p'a na badzra hum h'um phat /
T02D1410:264a-23: ces pa zhla bzhi pa'i sngags so //
T02D1410:264a-24: aom na mo bha ga pa te p'i re sh'a ya /
T02D1410:264a-25: ma h'a ka lp'agni sanni bh'a ya /
T02D1410:264a-26: dza ta mu ku totka ta ya /
T02D1410:264a-27: damsht'a ka ra lo gri bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya /
T02D1410:264a-28: sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a ya pa
T02D1410:264a-29: ra shu p'a sho dya ta sh'u la kha tp'am
T02D1410:264a-31: by'a ghr'a dzi n'a mpa ra dha r'a ya /
T02D1410:264a-32: ma h'a dhu mbr'andha k'a ra pa pu sh'a ya /
T02D1410:264a-33: zhes pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags so //
T02D1410:264a-34: aom ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru bandha
T02D1410:264a-35: bandha tr'a sa ya tr'a sa yaksho bha ya ksho
T02D1410:264a-36: bha ya / hroom hroom hra: hra: phem phem phat phat /
T02D1410:264a-40: ba sa ru dhi r'antra m'a l'a pa lambi ne /
T02D1410:264a-41: grihna grihna sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzanggam
T02D1410:264a-42: sa rbam p'a ta rdza ya ta rdza ya a'a
T02D1410:264a-46: h'am h'am h'im h'im h'um h'um /
T02D1410:264a-47: ki li ki li si li si li hi li hi li dhi li dhi li hum h'um phat /
T02D1410:264a-48: zhes pa rkang pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i sngags so //
T02D1410:264a-49: yi ge'i grangs steng du ni dgu bcu rtsa bdun no //
T02D1410:264a-51: aom yig la sogs pa nas hum h'um phat kyi yi ge'i mthar thug pa rtsa ba'i sngags so //
T02D1410:264a-52: de bzhin du yang snying po la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1410:264a-53: kyang shes rab dang thabs la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1410:264b-0: rtogs par bya'o // 'di rnams kyi rab tu @264b brjod pa'i bzlas pas so //
T02D1410:264b-1: bsam gtan gyis kyang ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
T02D1410:264b-2: la sogs pa rnam par rtog pa'i bsam gtan gyis
T02D1410:264b-3: so // kyang yig las phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1410:264b-4: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gtor ma sbyin pas kyang ngo //
T02D1410:264b-5: bde ba yis kyang ni las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1410:264b-6: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i 'gyur ba dang g-yo ba'i bde bas so //
T02D1410:264b-7: kyang yig las dam tshig bskyang bas 'og min gyi
T02D1410:264b-8: srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i bdag po la bcu gnyis
T02D1410:264b-9: rnams kyis 'di nyid kho nar 'grub par byed do
T02D1410:264b-10: zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1410:264b-11: rnal 'byor pa nyid ni rdo rje 'chang nyid do //
T02D1410:264b-12: de nyid kho na mchog ste gnyis su med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D1410:264b-13: bsod nams ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1410:264b-14: dag byed ni ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1410:264b-15: sdig pa 'jig byed pa ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1410:264b-16: sngags bzlas pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D1410:264b-17: rim pa min pas gsungs pa'i yan lag gsum gyis
T02D1410:264b-18: yan lag drug po rnams rtogs par bya ste /
T02D1410:264b-19: de rnams kyis kyang bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1410:264b-20: byis pa las dang po pa rnams kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa la yang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:264b-21: 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pas yan lag drug gi sgrub thabs so //
T02D1410:264b-22: 'dir phyag rgya chen mo'i sgo nas yan lag drug brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:264b-24: mchog gi yan lag drug rnams kyis //
T02D1410:264b-27: sor sdud de bzhin bsam gtan dang //
T02D1410:264b-28: srog rtsol de nas 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1410:264b-29: rjes su dran dang ting nge 'dzin //
T02D1410:264b-31: dpal dus kyi 'khor lor yang nges par bstan pa /
T02D1410:264b-32: so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can
T02D1410:264b-33: bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o
T02D1410:264b-34: // bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod
T02D1410:264b-35: pa dga' dang g-yo med bde brtse gcig sems pa'o
T02D1410:264b-36: // // srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam na
T02D1410:264b-37: gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa
T02D1410:264b-38: // // dag tu 'gyur // thig ler srog ni
T02D1410:264b-39: rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste
T02D1410:265a-1: bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
T02D1410:265a-2: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med
T02D1410:265a-3: bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge
T02D1410:265a-5: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs pa /
T02D1410:265a-6: 'dir so sor sdud pa zhes bya ba ni lus
T02D1410:265a-7: la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams kyi 'brel
T02D1410:265a-8: pas rnam par shes pa rab tu 'jug pa med
T02D1410:265a-9: pa ste / stong pa'i gzugs kyi yul rnams la
T02D1410:265a-10: gzhan mig la sogs pa rnam pa lnga po rnams
T02D1410:265a-12: sha la sogs pa'i mig rnams kyis stong pa nyid la dmigs par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1410:265a-13: de nas de nyid la blta ba ni shes rab po //
T02D1410:265a-14: rtog pa ni sems kyi dngos po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1410:265a-15: dpyod pa ni de'i don nges pa'o //
T02D1410:265a-16: dga' ba ni gzugs la chags pa'o //
T02D1410:265a-17: g-yo med bde ba ni stong pa nyid dang lhan
T02D1410:265a-18: cig sems gcig tu byed pa g-yo med bde ba
T02D1410:265a-19: mchog las bsgom pa zhes pa bsam gtan yan lag
T02D1410:265a-20: lnga'o // de nas srog gi rtsol ba zhes pa g-yon pa dang /
T02D1410:265a-21: g-yas pa'i lam bsgyel bas cig car nyid du 'bab pa ste sems kyis bzlas pa'o //
T02D1410:265a-22: de nas 'dzin pa zhes pa thig ler te dpral
T02D1410:265a-23: bar srog ni rab tu zhugs shing phyi rol du
T02D1410:265a-24: rgyu ba med par yang dag par sdom pa'o //
T02D1410:265a-25: de nas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba rang
T02D1410:265a-26: gi 'dod pa'i lha mthong ba rnam par rtog pa
T02D1410:265a-27: dang bral ba'o // de nas ting nge 'dzin zhes
T02D1410:265a-28: bya ba shes rab rang gi sems kyis so sor
T02D1410:265a-29: snang ba des lhan cig pa'i mi 'gyur ba'i bde
T02D1410:265a-31: pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir gzung
T02D1410:265a-32: ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i sems zhi ba'i
T02D1410:265a-33: bde ba chen po zhes pa yan lag drug gi
T02D1410:265a-34: sgrub thabs so // 'bras bu ni dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa /
T02D1410:265a-35: so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang
T02D1410:265a-36: rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis
T02D1410:265a-37: rlob / mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par
T02D1410:265a-38: 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas
T02D1410:265a-39: rlob / dag pa'o // srog gi rtsol bas dag
T02D1410:265a-40: pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang
T02D1410:265a-41: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod /
T02D1410:265a-42: bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu
T02D1410:265b-0: @265b la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs
T02D1410:265b-1: kyis so // rjes su dran pa'i legs par dag
T02D1410:265b-2: pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye
T02D1410:265b-4: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag
T02D1410:265b-5: 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par
T02D1410:265b-7: lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa phyag rgya chen po
T02D1410:265b-8: sgom pa so sor sdud pas bcu drug las yongs
T02D1410:265b-9: su rdzogs pa'am / gang gi tshe lo phyed kyis gzung bya sems dang /
T02D1410:265b-10: 'dzin pa po'i sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe
T02D1410:265b-11: tshig gi mchod sbyin pa la sogs pa sbyin par
T02D1410:265b-12: byed de sha'i mig tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:265b-13: gang gi tshe bsam gtan dag pa de'i tshe mig
T02D1410:265b-14: mi 'dzums pa lha'i mig dang lha'i rna bar 'gyur
T02D1410:265b-15: ro // gang gi tshe rtag tu dbu mar 'bab
T02D1410:265b-16: pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab
T02D1410:265b-18: rlung bcu 'gags pa las sems thig ler gnas pa
T02D1410:265b-19: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang bral ba stong pa
T02D1410:265b-20: nyid rab tu thob pa de'i tshe bdud la sogs
T02D1410:265b-22: gang gi tshe stong pa nyid la chags pa stobs
T02D1410:265b-23: bcu nyid thob pa sgrib pa med pa'i sems 'dod
T02D1410:265b-24: pa'i gnas skabs bcu thob pa de'i tshe 'od zer
T02D1410:265b-26: ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba de gang gi cho
T02D1410:265b-27: lo gsum dang phyogs gsum gyis gtsug tor du phyin
T02D1410:265b-28: pa dri ma med pa thob pa de'i tshe ye
T02D1410:265b-29: shes kyi lus te dus der rin po che la
T02D1410:265b-31: mkha' 'gor ma rdo rje gur du 'bras bu ni /
T02D1410:265b-32: 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du //
T02D1410:265b-33: ji srid rdo rje'i lus dang ldan //
T02D1410:265b-34: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //
T02D1410:265b-35: ma lus lus pa med par 'grub //
T02D1410:265b-36: blo dang ldan pa ye shes ldan //
T02D1410:265b-37: de yi rjes su thams cad 'brang //
T02D1410:265b-39: don dam pa la sogs pa 'di'i lam sgom pa'i
T02D1410:265b-40: nye bar bstan pa rgyud rnams su bcom ldan 'das

T02D1410:265b-45: sangs rgyas kun bde rnal 'byor pas thob 'gyur //
T02D1410:265b-48: de bzhin sems kyi 'od gsal rtog pa yi //
T02D1410:266a-2: de nyid du ni brkyang ma dag dang ni //
T02D1410:266a-3: ro ma gcig tu sbyar bas mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1410:266a-4: zhes te nges pa'i don to //
T02D1410:266a-5: da ni dam tshig bskyang ba brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:266a-6: legs par mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos //
T02D1410:266a-7: rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya //
T02D1410:266a-8: zhes pa 'dis dam tshig dpal 'dus par brjod pa rnams dang /
T02D1410:266a-9: rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs su
T02D1410:266a-10: mu stegs pa rnams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa
T02D1410:266a-11: dang zhi ba nyid dang drag po rnams kyi bya
T02D1410:266a-12: ba de rnams 'jig rten gyi rab tu 'jug pa
T02D1410:266a-13: las bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du sdom pa
T02D1410:266a-14: dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas bskyang bar bya'o //
T02D1410:266a-16: ngo bo nyid kyis kun 'byung ba //
T02D1410:266a-17: khams gsum dag na rnam par spyod //
T02D1410:266a-18: sems can kun la phan 'dod pa sa //
T02D1410:266a-19: dam tshig mtha' dag spyad par bya //
T02D1410:266a-21: rang gi bdag po nyid kho nas dang po'i dus
T02D1410:266a-22: can gyi tshangs pa la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen
T02D1410:266a-23: po rnams snod rnams kyis lhan cig skyes pa rang
T02D1410:266a-24: bzhin sna tshogs kyi 'jug pas sems can gyi don
T02D1410:266a-25: du 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i phyir ro //
T02D1410:266a-26: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi dam tshig thams cad kun du spyod par bya'o zhes pa 'di'i don to //
T02D1410:266a-28: rang gzhan chos ni sun mi 'byung //
T02D1410:266a-31: pha rol smra ba gang yang rung //
T02D1410:266a-32: mtshan ma'i dbye bas rnam par gnas //
T02D1410:266a-33: de 'dir brnyas par mi bya ste //
T02D1410:266a-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul yin //
T02D1410:266a-36: tshangs pa sku yi rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1410:266a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa 'di las bya'o //
T02D1410:266a-39: dam tshig bye bas dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1410:266a-41: zhes pa dam tshig bye ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya ste gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:266a-42: dkyil 'khor nges sdom dus dang ni //
T02D1410:266a-43: brda dang sngags dang phyag rgya dag / lha rnams dang ni grub mtha' la //
T02D1410:266a-44: rgyal ba rnams kyi dam tshig bsgrags //
T02D1410:266a-47: srid pa de phyin ci log tu gyur pa des mngon par 'dod pa'i don du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:266a-48: dam tshig yang dag par bsrungs pa las dngos grub bo zhes so //
T02D1410:266a-50: lha rnams srin po'i gzugs can gyis //
T02D1410:266b-0: dam @266b tshig las ni nyams par byed //
T02D1410:266b-1: ba byung la sogs sar mthong nas //
T02D1410:266b-2: srin po rnams ni ring du 'gro //
T02D1410:266b-3: lha rnams bshad pa sogs mthong nas //
T02D1410:266b-4: rang gi gnas ni rnam par 'dor //
T02D1410:266b-6: 'di las dam tshig rnams dkyil 'khor la sogs par bsnyen pa bya'o //
T02D1410:266b-7: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas la sogs pa lha zhi

T02D1410:266b-12: gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur te sgrub pa po rnams
T02D1410:266b-14: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:266b-15: mi phyed lam la gnas pa yis //
T02D1410:266b-16: dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya //
T02D1410:266b-17: go ku la sogs rtag tu bza' //
T02D1410:266b-19: dam tshig bzhi ni chang btung ba dang /
T02D1410:266b-22: bud med dang 'grogs pas khu ba myang ba yang ngo //
T02D1410:266b-23: sngags kyi spyod pa la brten nas rtag tu bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1410:266b-24: rigs su 'dzin pa gzhom pa'i phyir du lha rnams tshim par bya'o //
T02D1410:266b-25: khyim pa rnams kyi yul dang rigs kyi tha snyad kyis so //
T02D1410:266b-26: dge tshul la sogs pa rnams kyis bza' bar mi bya'o //
T02D1410:266b-28: de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed //
T02D1410:266b-29: phyi rol bdud rtsi lnga mdzes pa //
T02D1410:266b-30: sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga pur bcas //
T02D1410:266b-31: tsandan dmar po dang sbyar ba //
T02D1410:266b-32: tshogs kyi dbus su rab bzhugs ni //
T02D1410:266b-33: thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin //
T02D1410:266b-34: zhes pa bdud rtsi lnga bza' ba nges par bstan to //
T02D1410:266b-38: tsandan dmar po ni bshad pa'o //
T02D1410:266b-39: tshogs kyi dbus su rab zhugs ni gci ba'o //
T02D1410:266b-40: bshad pa'i rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gror gsungs pa /
T02D1410:266b-41: dbang po thams cad rnam grol ba //
T02D1410:266b-42: tshogs kyi dbang por gang zhig 'gyur //
T02D1410:266b-44: sbyar ba ni sgron ma lnga sbrang rtsi la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D1410:266b-45: thams cad rdor mtshan mtshan ma 'dzin ni hra ti yig bkod pa'i sngags pas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1410:267a-0: sbyor ba ni rgya cher 'grel du gsungs pa'i ril @267a * //
T02D1410:267a-1: bu'i cho ga brjod pa thog mar rang gi bdud rtsi rnams dang /
T02D1410:267a-2: go ku la sogs pa rnams kyi sha ji ltar
T02D1410:267a-3: rnyed pa bzung nas de gnyis zos pa'i zla ba'am
T02D1410:267a-4: dus gzhan la bu ma skyes pa'i gzhon nu ma'i
T02D1410:267a-5: dbang po gzung ba la dga' ba byas nas h'um
T02D1410:267a-6: phat ces pas byang chub kyi sems phyung nas padma'i
T02D1410:267a-7: snod du rdo rjes gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1410:267a-8: gnyis pa la ro la mchod pa byas nas rkang
T02D1410:267a-9: gsum pa la lo bcu gnyis ma la mchod pa
T02D1410:267a-11: bzhi pa rang gi gci ba'o //
T02D1410:267a-12: lnga pa la bshad ba gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1410:267a-13: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i 'phel bsam sha ka bcu lnga'o //
T02D1410:267a-14: de bzhin du drug pa la sogs pa'i tshes lnga la mi dang /
T02D1410:267a-15: rta dang glang po che dang /
T02D1410:267a-17: ba lang gi sha rnams gzung bar bya ste ma
T02D1410:267a-18: sha bzhi'i bdag nyid kyi cha gcig la sogs pa'i
T02D1410:267a-19: phel bas ma sha ka drug cu'o //
T02D1410:267a-20: bcu gcig pa la zas ma zos pa la chang
T02D1410:267a-21: 'thungs te skyug par byas nas des ma sha ka
T02D1410:267a-22: bdun cu rtsa lnga'i bdud rtsi dang /
T02D1410:267a-23: sbrang rtsi bco lnga rnams kyis lhan cig tu btags

T02D1410:267a-26: ma shi ba lhan cig bsregs par khru gang gru
T02D1410:267a-27: gsum pa'i dong brus nas der bcug ste mchod par

T02D1410:267a-29: zhes pas gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1410:267a-30: de na gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1410:267a-31: aom shr'i he ru ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1410:267a-32: aom sumbha zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtor ma
T02D1410:267a-33: byin nas bdud rtsi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bsngags
T02D1410:267a-34: pa'i ral gri bzhag nas mchod par bya'o //
T02D1410:267a-35: yi ge bcu pas bsrung ba byas nas lha'i sngags
T02D1410:267a-36: kyis rang gi khyim du bcu gnyis pa la thun
T02D1410:267a-37: bzhir zhal bzhi pa'i sngags dang /
T02D1410:267a-38: bcu gsum pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang /
T02D1410:267a-39: bcu bzhi pa la ka ra ka ra la sogs pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1410:267a-40: de nas nyi ma gzas gzung ba dang bton nas
T02D1410:267a-41: mi'i zhag gis mon sran sde'u'i tshad tsam gyi ril
T02D1410:267a-42: bur bya'o // gang gis nye bar bstan pa las
T02D1410:267a-43: longs spyod bsang gtor byas nas gzhag par bya ste
T02D1410:267a-44: de yis thams cad du dag pa'o //
T02D1410:267a-45: dam tshig gi ril bu'i cho ga'o //
T02D1410:267b-0: da ni tshogs kyi 'khor lor zhi ba'i btung ba rgyas par 'chad @267b do zhes /
T02D1410:267b-1: ming med mthe bong gdong dag gis //
T02D1410:267b-2: rnal 'byor rig pas bza' bar bya //
T02D1410:267b-3: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs pas //

T02D1410:267b-5: zhes sbyangs pa'i chang gis gtso bo la drug skyes

T02D1410:267b-9: dang por bla ma la phul nas //

T02D1410:267b-11: de mthar phyag rgya la byin nas //
T02D1410:267b-12: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin du myang //
T02D1410:267b-14: zhi ba'i btung ba yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D1410:267b-15: pa mu stegs pa rnams kyi sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams

T02D1410:267b-21: la 'gyur te / to // mu stegs pa rnams
T02D1410:267b-22: kyi de nyid mchog tu gzi brjid can nyid las

T02D1410:267b-24: ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes
T02D1410:267b-26: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rdo rje rtse mor yang /
T02D1410:267b-27: rdo rje lta bu'i rnam 'gyur can //
T02D1410:267b-28: byang chub sems ni mchog gyur pa //
T02D1410:267b-29: sku gsum yongs su mthar thug pa //
T02D1410:267b-30: byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya //
T02D1410:267b-32: byang chub kyi sems yang dag par gnyis su med
T02D1410:267b-33: pa nges par brten par bya ba'i ro myang ba'i
T02D1410:267b-34: dam tshig rgyas par bstan pa ni /

T02D1410:267b-37: zhes pa ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi gang
T02D1410:267b-38: yin pa bha ga'i rdul la son pa dga' ba
T02D1410:267b-39: thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'di ni zhes pa dgongs
T02D1410:267b-40: pa'o // bdud rtsi khu ba de nyid g-yo bas lnga nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1410:267b-41: 'di ni rnal 'byor pas gcig pur bkod nas dang
T02D1410:267b-42: phyag rgya mas bslabs pa de las kyang bsnyen pa
T02D1410:267b-43: bya'o // dngos grub thams cad rab 'jug pa ni rnal 'byor ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:267b-44: mchod bzhi de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1410:267b-45: dpa' bo gnyis med snyoms par 'jug / snyoms par zhugs la de nyid 'dzin //
T02D1410:267b-46: zhes pas dam tshig bzhi rgyas par bstan te //
T02D1410:267b-47: kun du spyod pa'i rgyud du yang //

T02D1410:268a-7: phyag rgya ma lnga rnams kyis lhan cig snyoms par
T02D1410:268a-8: 'jug pa byas nas snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtha' la
T02D1410:268a-9: dga' ba bzhi'i dga' ba la thun mtshams bzhir nan
T02D1410:268a-10: tan bya'o // lte ba dang snying ga dang /

T02D1410:268a-12: spyi bo'i steng du dga' ba dang /
T02D1410:268a-15: lhan cig skyes pa de nam mkha' zhes rgyud phyi mar ro //

T02D1410:268a-22: rdzas kyang lhag par dbrog par bya //
T02D1410:268a-24: 'bras bu ni dpal dus kyi 'khor lor //
T02D1410:268a-25: rgyal po ri bong 'dzin pa gcig bu 'chi ba'i
T02D1410:268a-26: 'jigs pa 'phrog pa thams cad dus su bsten par
T02D1410:268a-27: bya // shes rab chos 'byung dag la gnas pa'i
T02D1410:268a-28: nyin mor byed dang lhan cig rnal 'byor ldan pas
T02D1410:268a-29: bya // smos ci dgos // zhes so //
T02D1410:268a-30: lha dang mi yi bde ba nyid //
T02D1410:268a-31: bsdus byas nas ni kun nas so //
T02D1410:268a-32: rdo rje mchog gi cha yis ni //
T02D1410:268a-33: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02D1410:268a-34: zhes pas ni bde ba chen po rgyas par 'chad de /
T02D1410:268a-35: lha dang ste lha rnams kyi dang /
T02D1410:268a-36: mi rnams kyi bde ba bsdus par byas nas te
T02D1410:268a-37: gal te mtshungs par bya ba de bzhin du yang
T02D1410:268a-38: stong pa nyid dang snying rje gnyis su med pa
T02D1410:268a-39: shes rab dang thabs lhan cig skyes pa la 'jig
T02D1410:268a-40: rten pa'i dgod pa la sogs pa'i bde ba de
T02D1410:268a-41: rnams kyis bcu drug gi char yang mi phod dper
T02D1410:268a-42: yang mi 'gro'o // de dag gi bde ba ni bshad pa'i rgyud du yang /

T02D1410:268a-44: mngar bas rjes su bsten pa dang //

T02D1410:268a-48: bde las skyes pa bde ba thob //

T02D1410:268a-52: slar yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ru //
T02D1410:268a-53: byang chub sems de'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1410:268a-54: rdo rje'i rang bzhin can gyi cha //
T02D1410:268b-0: phra mo @268b spro ba rab brjod pa //

T02D1410:268b-3: rang bzhin kho nar de grub po //
T02D1410:268b-4: 'di yi rang bzhin brjod pa ni //
T02D1410:268b-5: zhal mchog ma ni khyod la bshad //
T02D1410:268b-8: bsdus pa'i don gyis yongs su bcad pa ste dang po'o /
T02D1410:268b-10: // / da ni bde ba chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas rgyas par gsungs pa //

T02D1410:268b-12: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang //
T02D1410:268b-13: gdod nas grub dang dur khrod du //
T02D1410:268b-14: der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1410:268b-16: 'dir ri bo ru rengs pa la sogs pa dang gter gyi dngos grub sgrubs par bya'o //
T02D1410:268b-17: de bzhin du tshang tshing ste /
T02D1410:268b-18: shing 'khrigs par dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang la sogs pa dang rin po che'i dngos grub po //
T02D1410:268b-19: sman ljongs te 'khri shing gis g-yogs par zhi ba
T02D1410:268b-20: la sogs pa dang bcud len gyi dngos grub po

T02D1410:268b-23: dang yig las sa'i khyim mam phug tu 'jig rten gsum nyid dang /

T02D1410:268b-31: sman ljongs ni rgyas pa'i rked pa la'o //
T02D1410:268b-32: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram ni rje rigs la sogs pa'i skye bo'o //

T02D1410:269a-7: sa gzhi ni gsang bar khyab par bya'o //

T02D1410:269a-10: bri bar bya ni sems kun du rdzogs par bsgom par bya ba ste nges pa'i don to //

T02D1410:269a-12: dur khrod so phag ni ba bla rnams kyis so //
T02D1410:269a-13: spyod par byed pa 'jug pa po dang ldan pas //

T02D1410:269a-16: yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa ni rigs pa'o //

T02D1410:269a-18: sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro //
T02D1410:269a-19: zhes pas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid gsungs so //
T02D1410:269a-20: yan lag dur khrod thal bas byug / phyi mo chen pos rnam par brgyan //

T02D1410:269a-22: kha tv'am ga ni lag na gnas //
T02D1410:269a-23: zhes pas 'di'i spyod lam gsungs pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //

T02D1410:269a-25: ha 'og he ru ka dran bya //
T02D1410:269a-26: mkha' la rdo rje'i gur bsams nas //
T02D1410:269a-27: rdo rje chu skyes der dgod bya //
T02D1410:269a-28: 'khor lo'i dbus su bdag nyid dang //

T02D1410:269a-30: rdo rje'i ra ba yang dag ldan //

T02D1410:269a-32: phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su yang //

T02D1410:269a-35: gdug spyod rnams kyis mi phyed do //

T02D1410:269b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya //

T02D1410:269b-18: mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing //

T02D1410:284b-29: de la rgyud ni rab bstan bya //
T02D1410:284b-31: ye shes ni 'dod pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1410:284b-33: sprul pa sku yi lus can du //
T02D1410:284b-34: gang tshe sgrub pa po 'gyur ba //
T02D1410:284b-35: de tshe de yi snod shes nas //
T02D1410:284b-36: de ni ye shes nga rab smra //
T02D1410:284b-37: sprul pa ni 'dir rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D1410:284b-38: mngon par dbang bskur ba bdun gyis dbang bskur ba'i sgrub pa po'o //
T02D1410:284b-40: dus dang tshod ni rnam par grol //
T02D1410:284b-41: gtsang sbra'i kun du spyod pa spangs //
T02D1410:284b-42: rang gi sgyu dang sngags sbyor ba //
T02D1410:284b-43: sems can kun gyi don la brtson //
T02D1410:284b-44: ye shes ni de'i sgrub thabs so //
T02D1410:284b-46: sprul pa ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgrub pos bdun gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1410:284b-47: ye shes ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1410:284b-49: grub pa padma badzra pa'i zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa //
T02D1410:284b-50: kun nas dri med rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa yi //
T02D1410:284b-51: yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje bum pa ltar bshad pa //
T02D1410:284b-52: so so'i bdag nyid rig blo cho ga bzhin rig nas //
T02D1410:285a-2: de la sems ni rnam par rtog bcas dogs shing sems par 'gyur //
T02D1410:285a-3: zla ba'i rnam pa sangs rgyas kyi sna tshogs longs spyod pa can gyi sku /
T02D1410:285a-4: bde ba'i rang bzhin kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems de brjod par bya'o //
T02D1410:285a-5: gang yang gnas skabs der khyad par dga' ba'i ming
T02D1410:285a-6: skad cig 'char ba bha ga'i dbus su son pa
T02D1410:285a-7: de / yungs kar ming du rnam par gzhag pa /
T02D1410:285a-8: brten pa sprul pa'i sku zhes de la sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs so //
T02D1410:285a-9: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa //
T02D1410:285a-10: thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D1410:285a-11: dpal he ru kar spyod las bdag /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
T02D1410:285a-12: ces rdzogs pa'i 'bras bur gsungs so //
T02D1410:285a-14: de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du gsungs pa /
T02D1410:285a-15: thub kho na'i bco brgyad pa'o //
T02D1410:285a-16: chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin //
T02D1410:285a-17: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T02D1410:285a-18: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod //
T02D1410:285a-19: gang gis srid pa ji srid par //
T02D1410:285a-20: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag / mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku re ni //
T02D1410:285a-21: thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad //
T02D1410:285a-23: gnyis ni gzugs med pa ste bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka ni rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1410:285a-25: dpe byad brgyad cu ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:285a-26: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa de /
T02D1410:285a-27: shes rab ma bcom ldan 'das ma /
T02D1410:285a-31: phag mo dmar mo dang sngon mo can no zhes
T02D1410:285a-32: pa sku gsum ma dor bstan pa ste sgra ji
T02D1410:285a-33: bzhin pa'o // dpal he ru ka sbyor las bdag / bdag ni zung 'jug ces pa ste //
T02D1410:285a-34: sdod pa lhan cig skyes pa sgom pa po'o //
T02D1410:285a-36: da ni bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i mdo brjod par bya'o //
T02D1410:285a-37: dang por phung po la sogs pa yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1410:285a-38: de nas thugs ka'i lha'i sa bon no //
T02D1410:285a-40: smon lam gdab pa dang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'o //
T02D1410:285a-41: de nas rang bzhin dag pa la sogs pa nas ji srid pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1410:285a-42: de nas gur bcing ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1410:285b-0: phur bus gdab pa dang brdung @285b ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:285b-1: de'i steng du lhun po la sogs pa lha'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
T02D1410:285b-2: phyi nas go chas kun du bsrung ba dang phyag rgya dang sngags kyis dgug pa dang /
T02D1410:285b-3: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kun du tshim nas /
T02D1410:285b-4: ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu gzhug pa dang /
T02D1410:285b-5: mngon par dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1410:285b-6: de bzhin du mchod pa dang /
T02D1410:285b-8: thams cad rnam par dag pa yang ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D1410:285b-9: da ni mngal skyes kyi rim pas rab tu 'jug pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bstan par bya ste /
T02D1410:285b-10: thog mar re zhig srung ba'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1410:285b-12: rnam par thar pa dag par byas nas stong pa nyid bsgoms te /
T02D1410:285b-13: ha ya ra wa la las skyes pa'i nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1410:285b-14: de'i steng du sum las skyes pa'i lhun po la
T02D1410:285b-15: rtag pa khang pa brtsegs pa dur khrod dang ldan
T02D1410:285b-16: pa la sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i gdan

T02D1410:285b-18: rdzogs par byang chub pa'i bcom ldan 'das dang po'i

T02D1410:285b-22: de'i 'od zer gyi lha mo'i glus dpa' bo rab tu sad cing bslang ste /
T02D1410:285b-23: dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1410:285b-24: ye shes kyi 'khor lo gzhug cing /

T02D1410:285b-27: rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1410:285b-28: yang na sgong skyes kyi rim pas rnam pa lnga las skyes pa'i dpa' bo /
T02D1410:285b-29: sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa /
T02D1410:285b-30: 'khor lo dang bcas pa bsgoms nas ye shes kyi
T02D1410:285b-31: 'khor lo dang mngon par dbang bskur ba gzung zhing
T02D1410:285b-32: bsgom par bya'o // de nas thig le'i rnal 'byor dang /

T02D1410:285b-34: sku'i dkyil 'khor ba rnam par phyung nas /
T02D1410:285b-35: gtor ma byin te bdag nyid tshim par bya'o zhes so //
T02D1410:285b-36: de nas rin chen dbang po'i sbyor bas bya ba dang /
T02D1410:285b-39: bdud rtsir byas nas bza' ba lto ba'i me la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1410:285b-40: de nas nyi ma gung la yang /
T02D1410:285b-41: ji skad gsungs pas bsgoms nas /
T02D1410:285b-42: lag pa g-yon pas myur ba dang bul ba ma
T02D1410:285b-43: yin pa dang phyi mo dman pa ma yin pa

T02D1410:286a-42: lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1410:286a-43: gong bu las 'das bsgom pa de //
T02D1410:286a-44: sems nyid du ni mi bsgom mo //
T02D1410:286a-45: bdag gi rnal 'byor ba yi sbyor //
T02D1410:286a-46: rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1410:286a-47: rab zhugs ro ni mnyam par 'gyur //

T02D1410:286a-49: shin tu dga' ba'i gnas su 'gyur //
T02D1410:286a-50: chos dbyings dag pa'i grong khyer du //

T02D1410:286b-3: rnal 'byor kun la mchog gyur pa //
T02D1410:286b-4: phyag rgya che las gzhan med do //

T02D1410:286b-6: mya ngan 'das pa'i de nyid bstan //

T02D1410:286b-22: thog ma med pa nas gnas pa'i ham yig gi

T02D1410:286b-38: las rnams bshad bya de nyon cig / gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas pa yis //
T02D1410:286b-39: dpag tshad bye bar de lding 'gyur //
T02D1410:286b-41: sngon du bye bsgrub par byed pas //

T02D1410:287a-3: 'di khang bzangs dang shing la 'dzegs te /

T02D1410:296b-0: @296b dpa' bo'i longs spyod sa gzhi yin //

T02D1410:296b-2: rnal 'byor pa yi sdom pa mchod //

T02D1410:296b-4: ma bzhin du phan par 'dod pa //
T02D1410:296b-5: sring mo bzhin du mnyes gshin pa zhes brjod pa ni dam tshig can du lung nyid las so //
T02D1410:296b-6: bud med kyi rtags la slar yang rtags nyid do //
T02D1410:296b-8: dpa' bo zhes pa ni lung las gang gi tshe
T02D1410:296b-9: nges par rnam par zab po ni dpa' bo de'i
T02D1410:296b-10: longs spyod bya ni dbyig 'dzin te /
T02D1410:296b-12: 'dzin par byed do ste byas nas so //
T02D1410:296b-14: de las gnas su byas nas /
T02D1410:296b-15: yang dag pa yang dag pa'i rnam pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1410:296b-16: rang gi sems la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1410:296b-17: sdom pa ni dri ma med pa'i don du yang /
T02D1410:296b-18: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku gsung thugs //
T02D1410:296b-19: ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa dang /
T02D1410:296b-21: spros pa med pa'i dbyig gnyen zhabs kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:296b-22: de nyid zag pa med pa'i dbyings //
T02D1410:296b-23: bsam gyis mi khyab dge dang brtan //

T02D1410:296b-25: thub pa chen po'i chos zhes bshad //
T02D1410:296b-28: 'gro gnyis dngos po mthong nas nga //

T02D1410:296b-30: shin tu kha sbyor rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1410:296b-31: m'a ma k'i med mi bskyod med //
T02D1410:296b-33: lugs bzlog pa yi blta ba dang //
T02D1410:296b-34: bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur ba nyid //
T02D1410:296b-35: gdong ni rtag par smin ma g-yo //
T02D1410:296b-36: mkha' 'gro rnams su the tshom med //

T02D1410:296b-39: g-yon pa'i yan lag gis blta ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1410:296b-40: bdud rtsi dang bcas pa zhu bar ldan pa zhes pa dpa' ma'i lha'o //
T02D1410:296b-41: rtag pa ni rab tu dang po'o //
T02D1410:296b-43: bzhin ni rab dang mig kyang dri ma med //
T02D1410:296b-44: gtam ni rgyun chags snyan par yang smra zhing //

T02D1410:296b-46: skye bo dngos la rjes chags mtshan ma'o //
T02D1410:296b-49: rnam 'gyur bskor ba shes byas te //
T02D1410:296b-50: ri mo gsum pa yongs su zlum //

T02D1410:297a-5: rnam 'gyur bskor ba mdzes pa ste //

T02D1410:297a-7: yang na yongs su zlum pa nyid ni 'bru'i rnam pa ste /

T02D1410:297a-9: glo bur du zlog par byed pa ni /

T02D1410:297a-13: de rnams kyi khyim du rang rang gi mtshan ma
T02D1410:297a-14: rdo rje'i rnam pa me long dang bcas pa dang
T02D1410:297a-19: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi me long dang bcas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1410:297a-20: rang gi mtshan ma rigs kyi mtshan ma'o //

T02D1410:297a-27: mo'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyir shes par bya'o
T02D1410:297a-28: // 'dir snga ma phyed kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams rtogs la /
T02D1410:297a-29: phyi ma phyed kyis ma mo bdun po'i gzugs so //
T02D1410:297a-30: rgyal mtshan dang mdung thung kha sbyor ni rdo rje padma sbyor ba'o //
T02D1410:297a-33: de bzhin du dgra sta dang yang dag par ldan pa'i me long ngo //
T02D1410:297a-35: de nas 'di las gsang mchod kyi //

T02D1410:297a-44: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi //

T02D1410:297a-46: rtag tu 'og steng dngos grub ster //

T02D1410:297a-48: lha mo mthong dang reg pas kyang //
T02D1410:297a-49: pho nya mo de dngos grub ster //

T02D1410:297a-52: ces pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs gsungs so //
T02D1410:297a-53: pho nya mo rnams ni nu ma dang skrar ldan pa /
T02D1410:297a-54: zhi ba la sogs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba //
T02D1410:297b-0: @297b dngos grub sbyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'i gzugs yongs su bsgyur ba gsum sbyin pa'o //
T02D1410:297b-1: bdag dang pho nya mo ni mngon par dbang bskur ba //

T02D1410:297b-4: phyag rgya chen po'i rgyur gyur pa'i ye shes zhes bshad pa'i dngos sgrub ster ba'o //
T02D1410:297b-5: phyag rgya chen mo dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
T02D1410:297b-6: rgyur gyur pa ston ka'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
T02D1410:297b-7: lha mo gsum po rnams kyi sku rnams kyis rtse
T02D1410:297b-8: bar byed pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgom par
T02D1410:297b-9: bya zhing shes par bya'o / nyin dang mtshan mo
T02D1410:297b-11: thabs dpal bla ma'i zhal las so //
T02D1410:297b-12: 'grub 'gyur ni sangs rgyas nyid du nye bar 'gro ba'o //
T02D1410:297b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du yang //
T02D1410:297b-14: dngos med dngos med kyang med pa'ang //
T02D1410:297b-15: des kyang sangs rgyas nyid du brjod //
T02D1410:297b-18: rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi pho nya mo gang
T02D1410:297b-19: yin pa de rnams 'o byed pa dang 'khyud pas
T02D1410:297b-20: rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1410:297b-21: rnal 'byor gnas kyi khyad par las //
T02D1410:297b-22: zhes pa ni rigs sum cu rtsa drug po rnams
T02D1410:297b-23: kyi rigs ldan ma ni sum cu rtsa sum cu
T02D1410:297b-24: rtsa bdun pa'o // de bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud du yang /
T02D1410:297b-25: 'dir rdo rje phag mo ni rigs ldan ma'o //
T02D1410:297b-26: rigs med ma ni g-yung mo'o //
T02D1410:297b-29: l'a ma ni rgyal rigs ma'o //
T02D1410:297b-30: dum skyes ma ni rje rigs ma'o //
T02D1410:297b-31: gzugs can ma ni bram ze'o //
T02D1410:297b-32: bya rog gdong ma ni kla klo ma'o //
T02D1410:297b-33: 'ug gdong ma ni phyag bdar mkhan ma'o //
T02D1410:297b-34: khyi gdong ma ni gdol pa mo'o //

T02D1410:298a-26: de rnams bskor bas ci zhig bya //
T02D1410:298a-31: rnam pa sna tshogs dga' ba rnams //

T02D1410:298a-34: mtshan bral nges par mtshon par bya //

T02D1410:298a-40: mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan

T02D1410:298a-48: byed pa bcing pa'i sbyor ba yis //

T02D1410:298b-0: khyogs dang @298b grub mo yis kyang ni //

T02D1410:298b-3: rdo rje aa ralli rgyud du /

T02D1410:298b-5: padmar rdo rje gzhug bya min //
T02D1410:298b-7: padma chen po der phyin nas rdo rje gzhug par bya'o zhes pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1410:298b-8: ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs pa nyid //

T02D1410:298b-13: sbyor dang kun sbyor de rjes 'gro //

T02D1410:298b-15: 'dod khams gnas pa'i bud med ces pa'i don to //
T02D1410:298b-16: de bzhin du lha mo dang klu mo dang /
T02D1410:298b-17: de bzhin 'dab chags mo dang lha min mo dang mi yang ste /
T02D1410:298b-19: spre mo dang ni khyi mo yang //
T02D1410:298b-20: bong mo de bzhin rnga mo skyes //
T02D1410:298b-21: ri dags mo dang ra ma nyid //
T02D1410:298b-22: phag mo ba min las byung ba //
T02D1410:298b-23: bdag nyid he ru ka kho nas //
T02D1410:298b-27: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni //

T02D1410:298b-30: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
T02D1410:298b-31: chung ma pho nya mo can gnas //

T02D1410:298b-35: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1410:298b-37: pho nya mo de dbang gyur las kyi phyag rgyar
T02D1410:298b-38: 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med
T02D1410:298b-39: dam tshig ste // rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D1410:298b-40: phul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma
T02D1410:298b-42: don dam pa'i bsnyen par yang //
T02D1410:298b-43: de bzhin 'dir ni ldan khyod med pa bsnyen par bya //
T02D1410:298b-44: ji ltar chags pas mngal ni 'dzin par mi byed de //
T02D1410:298b-45: mngal nas 'dod min skye ba'i kha na mthong 'gyur //
T02D1410:298b-46: skye bo'i kha na ma thos 'jig rten pha rol nyams //
T02D1410:298b-48: gang gis sngags 'di sbyin byed pa //
T02D1410:298b-50: gang yang de yi cho gar 'gyur //
T02D1410:298b-51: zhes pa ni bsten pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa'o //
T02D1410:298b-52: gang la sngags gang yod pa de shin tu chags

T02D1410:298b-54: do // de'i ni sgrub pa po'i dngos grub kyi cho ga de nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:298b-56: de nas rnal 'byor rgyud du ni //
T02D1410:298b-57: rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad //
T02D1410:298b-58: he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor mchog /

T02D1410:299a-3: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ni nges par byed ba phrag drug go //
T02D1410:299a-4: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ni bye ba phrag bcu drug go zhes so //
T02D1410:299a-5: dpal he ru ka ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes nye bar bstan pa'o //
T02D1410:299a-7: rdo rje theg par nyer bstan pa'i //
T02D1410:299a-8: ngag de dngos grub go 'phang nyid //
T02D1410:299a-9: ma thos pa yi chos bstan pas //
T02D1410:299a-10: sems can srid las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D1410:299a-11: bstan bya bla med ston byed pa //
T02D1410:299a-12: mi snang la sogs grub par byed //
T02D1410:299a-13: 'jig rten gsum na gang cung zad //
T02D1410:299a-14: de kun skad cig las grub 'gyur //
T02D1410:299a-17: ye shes kyi sku ste sku bzhi 'chang ba'o //
T02D1410:299a-18: gzungs brnyan gyi chos kyi gzugs nyid kyis /

T02D1410:299a-20: longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la

T02D1410:299a-25: nyan thos dang lha dag gis blta bar bya ba ste 'og min la sogs par ro //
T02D1410:299a-26: de bzhin du sprul ni mi rnams kyis blta bar bya ba ste /
T02D1410:299a-27: rdo rje btsun mo'i bha gar sems can rnams smin pa'i don du'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D1410:299a-29: rtag par dngos grub rnams kyang skyong ba dang /

T02D1410:299a-34: mi mo'i spyod pa legs par srub //
T02D1410:299a-35: tshangs par spyod pa'i de bzhin zhal //
T02D1410:299a-36: 'dren pa'i rtsa yi kun spyod de //

T02D1410:299a-38: rnal 'byor pa gang de srung byed //
T02D1410:299a-39: myur du dngos grub de thob 'gyur //
T02D1410:299a-41: dngos grub rnams ni 'dod pa dang /
T02D1410:299a-42: gzugs dang phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rnams 'dzag pa ste /
T02D1410:299a-44: mi g-yo ba'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid rnams te /
T02D1410:299a-45: 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa'i skye
T02D1410:299a-46: bo rnams kyi rgyu'i byang chub kyi sems rtag tu

T02D1410:299b-2: dam tshig ni khu ba'i thig le bzhi rnams so //

T02D1410:299b-6: 'dod la rnam par rmongs pa yis //
T02D1410:299b-7: pho nya mo gzhan kun sbyor 'gro //
T02D1410:299b-8: zhes klog pa ni gzhan no / gnyis su med
T02D1410:299b-9: pa ni thig le bzhi po rnams nya'i mthar gnyis
T02D1410:299b-10: su med pa'i rnam par byed pa'o / thogs pa

T02D1410:299b-13: mi mo'i spyod pa legs par srub pa ni /
T02D1410:299b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma kun du bzang mo ni //
T02D1410:299b-15: mi mo'i de'i spyod pa bzhi ste /
T02D1410:299b-17: brtan pa rnams kyi spyod pa bzhi //
T02D1410:299b-19: byang chub sems dpa' so so rnams kyis sems can gyi don du /

T02D1410:299b-25: 'og tu son pa bzhi po rnams kyi rtsa ba'i kun spyod ni /
T02D1410:299b-26: mkha' 'gro gdong gi kun spyod la ste /
T02D1410:299b-27: rdo rje nor bu las bkug nas khu ba steng du 'gro ba zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1410:299b-28: 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar thug pa'i dngos grub
T02D1410:299b-29: kyi rgyu rtag tu smon pa dang 'jug pa'i byang
T02D1410:299b-31: dam tshig ni myos byed dang go ku la sogs
T02D1410:299b-32: pa dang rigs ma yin pa la sogs pa la

T02D1410:299b-35: rigs gzhan zhi ba la sogs pa'i mngon par dbang
T02D1410:299b-36: bskur ba de sangs rgyas pa'i dam tshig sun 'byin
T02D1410:299b-37: pa gzhan gyis dam tshig spyod pa rnams 'jig rten
T02D1410:299b-38: pa'i dngos grub kyi don du 'dod par mi bya'o
T02D1410:299b-39: // gnyis su med pa ni pho nya mo dang
T02D1410:299b-40: dpa' bo dag gi dus gcig tu bde ba byang
T02D1410:299b-41: chub sems kyi ro myang ba'o //
