T02D1410:300a-6: // 'dren pa ni byang chub kyi sems 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1410:300a-7: rgas pa la sogs pa 'joms pa'i ched du'o //
T02D1410:300a-8: dam tshig brgyad po 'di rnams ni //

T02D1410:300a-13: bsgrub la yang dag rnams gnas pas //

T02D1410:300a-17: thun mong rgyud rnams thams cad du //

T02D1410:300a-19: dad pa tsam gyis blang bya yi //
T02D1410:300a-20: mig dang lag par ma yin no //
T02D1410:300a-21: zhes pa bsnyen pa la don smod par byed pa
T02D1410:300a-22: 'dis ci zhig ces rigs pa rnams kyis gzhan du
T02D1410:300a-23: ma yin no // gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:300a-24: rdzas kyi nus pa bsam mi khyab //
T02D1410:300a-26: de phyir sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur zhes so //
T02D1410:300a-27: bdud rtse lces blang bar gsal lo //
T02D1410:300a-28: dag dang ma dag rnam dag pa //
T02D1410:300a-29: sgrub po rnam pa gsum du gnas //
T02D1410:300a-30: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang //
T02D1410:300a-31: gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi //
T02D1410:300a-32: zhes pas slob ma rnam pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02D1410:300a-33: dag pa ni thar pa don du gnyer ba rang gi lus la sogs pa gtang ba'o //
T02D1410:300a-34: ma dag pa ni rang lhag par gnas pa'i don du gnyer ba'o //
T02D1410:300a-35: rnam par dag pa ni phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor
T02D1410:300a-36: la sogs pa don du gnyer ba de nyid bla
T02D1410:300a-38: gsal byed ni dbang po 'bring bo'o //
T02D1410:300a-39: yon tan dang ldan pa ni rin po che'i gang zag bden pa don du gnyer bar gsal lo //
T02D1410:300a-40: sgrub pos gsum po 'di rnams la //
T02D1410:300a-41: mchod pa bya phyir brnyes mi bya //
T02D1410:300a-42: sgrub pa po rnams brnyas mi bya //
T02D1410:300a-43: mchod par bya zhing gus par bya //
T02D1410:300a-45: zhes pas bla ma dang sems can dag mnyes par

T02D1410:300a-47: las 'das pa'i kun du spyod pa shes pa nyid
T02D1410:300b-0: kyi phyir ro // bla mar @300b yang /

T02D1410:300b-4: phag mo'i rigs las yang dag byung //
T02D1410:300b-5: lung dang grub pa'i bstan bcos rnams //
T02D1410:300b-6: de bzhin mdo yi mthar skyes rnams //

T02D1410:300b-8: shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba //
T02D1410:300b-10: slob mas phyir brnyas par mi bya //

T02D1410:300b-12: gal te slob ma phyir zhing de //
T02D1410:300b-13: slob dpon la ni gang brnyas pa //

T02D1410:300b-15: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur //
T02D1410:300b-18: bla ma'i grib ma chung ma dang //
T02D1410:300b-19: mchil lham sten dang sngas rnams la //
T02D1410:300b-20: rmongs chen gang zhig 'gom byed na //

T02D1410:300b-23: slob ma bla ma'i bka' 'gom pa'ang //
T02D1410:300b-25: 'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar gnas //
T02D1410:300b-26: sgyu dang g-yo yi rab sbyor gyis //
T02D1410:300b-27: gus pas log pa bsal byas nas //
T02D1410:300b-28: za khyed mdze dang nad chen dang //
T02D1410:300b-29: dmyal ba la sogs rnams skye //
T02D1410:300b-30: de ltar shes nas slob ma des //
T02D1410:300b-31: bla ma la gus mchog tu gzhol //
T02D1410:300b-32: bla ma'i bka' ni rab skyong byed //
T02D1410:300b-34: 'dir rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rdo rje gur du yang //
T02D1410:300b-35: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs //
T02D1410:300b-37: phyag rgya chen po rab sbyor ba //

T02D1410:300b-40: sgrub pa po legs pa rnams mchod par bya yis rnam par 'tshe bar mi bya'o //

T02D1410:300b-42: sems can kho na rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1410:300b-43: sangs rgyas pa yis 'dod pa'i lha //
T02D1410:300b-45: dam tshig dang slob ma yongs su brtag pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1410:300b-47: // / de nas rnal 'byor dngos grub rnams //
T02D1410:300b-48: sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dbye shes nas //
T02D1410:300b-49: myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'i //
T02D1410:300b-50: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bshad par bya //

T02D1410:301a-4: mtshan nyid dang dbye ba ni rnal 'byor ma'i brda
T02D1410:301a-5: dang rigs dang kun du spyod pa la sogs pa'o

T02D1410:301a-8: pho nya ral gri'i so bsten dang //
T02D1410:301a-9: dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa //
T02D1410:301a-10: rtag tu rab myos mar gsungs pa //
T02D1410:301a-11: rnal 'byor pa grong dang grong khyer la sogs par song ba ste kun spyod du yang /
T02D1410:301a-12: ji ltar he ru ka dpal shes //
T02D1410:301a-13: ji ltar 'dod bzhin yongs su rgyu //
T02D1410:301a-15: rnal 'byor ma de'i mchod pa dang h'um gi gzugs dang brda dang brda can dang /
T02D1410:301a-16: khyim lnga la sogs pa'i grong du gnas pa nyid
T02D1410:301a-17: kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgrub par bya
T02D1410:301a-18: ste / gang las thams cad du g-yon ma'i 'jug par 'gyur ba lhur len pa'o //
T02D1410:301a-19: ral gri'i so ni rnam par 'joms pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1410:301a-20: gang las mchod par byas pa dang mchod par 'dod pa nges par sreg par byed do //
T02D1410:301a-21: nges par rlom pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1410:301a-23: pho nya mo 'khrig pas legs par 'grogs pa las sgrub pa pos dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1410:301a-24: bzlas brjod bsam gtan sogs bral bas //
T02D1410:301a-25: yun mi ring bar nyid grub byed //
T02D1410:301a-26: rnal 'byor pa rnams sngags phyag rgya //
T02D1410:301a-27: sna tshogs mchod pa rab 'jug pa //
T02D1410:301a-28: rdo rje mchod pa las gzhan med //
T02D1410:301a-29: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02D1410:301a-32: dngos grub skad cig gcig gis rdzogs par byang chub pa'o //
T02D1410:301a-34: rnal 'byor bzang mo'i spyod pa yis //
T02D1410:301a-35: gnyis med ye shes sems ldan pas //
T02D1410:301a-36: skad cig gcig gis rdzogs byang chub //
T02D1410:301a-37: mchog tu rtag pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D1410:301a-39: yun mi ring ba ni skad cig gcig gis sgrub par byed pa ste /
T02D1410:301a-40: mthar thug pa'i rten yongs su gyur ba'i sangs rgyas
T02D1410:301a-41: nyid rdo rje'i mchod pa bud med dang 'grogs pa'o
T02D1410:301a-42: // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:301a-43: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs las shin tu rnam dag bde ba nyid //
T02D1410:301a-44: yang dag thob ste dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'jig par byed //
T02D1410:301a-45: skye ba 'di nyid la yang rang gi lus kyis ni //
T02D1410:301b-0: bdud ni @301b bcom pa de dang 'di la ngo mtshar ro //
T02D1410:301b-1: bud med skye gnas 'grogs las ma nyams bde ba ni //
T02D1410:301b-2: skal ldan rnams kyis de thabs sbyor bas blang bar gyis //
T02D1410:301b-4: pho nya'i lam la dga' ba ni dag pa'o //
T02D1410:301b-5: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson //
T02D1410:301b-6: tsva ru rtag tu bza' bar bya //
T02D1410:301b-7: rig mas lhan cig de nyid 'chang //
T02D1410:301b-9: kha sbyor 'byung ba'i rgyud du yang //
T02D1410:301b-10: mi khyi'i skyugs pa bsres dang sha //
T02D1410:301b-11: rdo rje'i chu dang sbrang rtsir ldan //
T02D1410:301b-12: rnam snang mdzad dang kun du bsres //
T02D1410:301b-13: rnal 'byor bas ni rtag tu bza' //
T02D1410:301b-15: de nyid 'chang ni de'i de nyid stong ba nyid
T02D1410:301b-16: dang snying rje tha mi dad pa de 'chang ba'o
T02D1410:301b-19: rigs rnams kun las spyad par bya //
T02D1410:301b-20: bza' min par ni mi brtag go / dbyer med pho nya mo de yi //
T02D1410:301b-21: de nyid las kun rnam par gnas //
T02D1410:301b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spros pa med pa'i spyod pa gsungs te /
T02D1410:301b-23: rigs kun la ni rigs lnga po rnams la'o //
T02D1410:301b-24: dbyer med ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T02D1410:301b-25: de nyid las ni rang bzhin las so //
T02D1410:301b-26: kun du rnam par gnas pa ni mthong ba'o //
T02D1410:301b-27: sgrub pa rnam pa gnyis rab brjod //
T02D1410:301b-28: pho nya mo gcig po 'di las gzhan sna tshogs gzugs dang /
T02D1410:301b-29: pho nya mo de bskul ba'i dngos grub yang dag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1410:301b-30: 'di yang pho nya mo gcig mtshan nyid thams cad
T02D1410:301b-31: dang ldan pa las gzhan sgrub pa po la gus
T02D1410:301b-33: gnyis pa phyag rgya chen mo'o //
T02D1410:301b-35: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyang //
T02D1410:301b-36: yang dang yang du bsten bzhin pa //
T02D1410:301b-37: rnal 'byor gdon mi za bar skye //
T02D1410:301b-39: dngos grub yang dag par gnas pa la ni dngos grub la mtshan gnyis 'dir gsungs pa /
T02D1410:301b-40: bla ma brgyud rim las thob pa //
T02D1410:301b-41: mngon par dbang bskur sngags legs ldan //
T02D1410:301b-42: phyag rgya kun sbyor las tshul khrims //
T02D1410:301b-43: yongs rdzogs ye shes lus las skye //
T02D1410:301b-44: zhes pas tshogs gsum nges par ston par byed do //
T02D1410:301b-45: bla ma brgyud pa dang drug rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1410:301b-46: 'khor lo skyes pa'i bsod nams so //
T02D1410:301b-47: rim pas thob pas ni bsod nams kyis so //
T02D1410:301b-48: mngon par dbang bskur ni bzhi pa thob pa'o //
T02D1410:302a-0: @302a * // sngags legs ldan ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pa 'dis so //
T02D1410:302a-1: bla ma rnams kyi rjes su zhes pa 'dis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gsungs so /
T02D1410:302a-2: tshul khrims ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs te tshul khrims kyi spyod pa'o //
T02D1410:302a-4: tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1410:302a-5: rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod pa ni //
T02D1410:302a-7: gsungs pa yang tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyi don du
T02D1410:302a-8: bud med rnams kyi mkha'i padmar smad par mi bya'o
T02D1410:302a-9: zhes so // yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshogs gsum po
T02D1410:302a-10: rnams kyis ye shes lus skye ste thams cad mkhyen
T02D1410:302a-11: zhes so // pa nyid do // gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:302a-12: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa ni //
T02D1410:302a-13: byang chub sems dpang rab tu brjod //
T02D1410:302a-14: tshogs gsum yongs su rdzogs pa ni //
T02D1410:302a-15: ston pa thams cad mkhyen par brjod //
T02D1410:302a-16: ces te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:302a-17: nad par sngar langs sems dag nyid //
T02D1410:302a-18: lus la ma lus byas nas ni //
T02D1410:302a-19: yan lag las 'das mtshon cha rnams //
T02D1410:302a-20: lus la gnas pa kun du spyod pa gsungs te /
T02D1410:302a-21: sems dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror gsungs pa'i dgongs
T02D1410:302a-22: su gsol zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje
T02D1410:302a-23: sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ba'o //
T02D1410:302a-24: rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:302a-25: sems ni ma skyes pa la yang //
T02D1410:302a-28: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
T02D1410:302a-29: phung po khams dang skye mched dang //
T02D1410:302a-30: gzung bya 'dzin pa po spangs pa //
T02D1410:302a-31: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pa //
T02D1410:302a-32: rang sems gdod nas ma skyes pa //
T02D1410:302a-33: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1410:302a-36: ma lus pa ni lus pa med pa ste /
T02D1410:302a-37: byas nas ni so sor byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1410:302a-38: 'di lta ste kun spyod du gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1410:302a-39: tshor ba'i phung po la rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1410:302a-40: 'du shes kyi phung po la padma gar gyi dbang
T02D1410:302a-41: phyug go /'du byed kyi phung po la rdo rje
T02D1410:302a-42: rgyal po'o // rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1410:302b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la dpal he ru ka @302b rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:302b-1: mig dag la gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:302b-2: rna ba dag la zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:302b-3: sna dag la phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:302b-5: reg la ser sna rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:302b-6: skye mched thams cad la dbang phyug rdo rje'o //
T02D1410:302b-7: sa'i khams la ltung byed ma'o //
T02D1410:302b-8: chu'i khams la gsod byed ma'o //
T02D1410:302b-10: rlung gi khams la gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1410:302b-11: nam mkha'i khams la padma'i dra ba can ma'o //
T02D1410:302b-12: de ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams
T02D1410:302b-13: la lha'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya ste thams cad
T02D1410:302b-15: lung dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1410:302b-17: lung ni dor bar mi bya zhing //
T02D1410:302b-18: dkon mchog gsum shes dor mi bya //
T02D1410:302b-19: thogs med lus la gnas pa ni //
T02D1410:302b-20: bstan bcos bshad pa mthong ba'i phyir //
T02D1410:302b-21: ril bu kha ru gzhug par bya //
T02D1410:302b-22: lus kyi dag byed byas nas ni //
T02D1410:302b-23: de nas phyag rgya kun du spyad //
T02D1410:302b-25: dag byed byas nas ni rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D1410:302b-26: yang na dang por gsang sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:302b-27: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharmm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham zhes bsam par bya'o //
T02D1410:302b-28: rang gi snying gar ra yig bskal pa'i me ltar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1410:302b-29: de las byung ba'i rdo rje nyi ma 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa /
T02D1410:302b-30: de'i steng du h'um chen po 'jig pa'i me dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:302b-31: rdo rje des slar yang rdo rje las byung ba'i
T02D1410:302b-32: he ru kar bsam par bya'o zhes bshad pa'i rgyud
T02D1410:302b-33: du'o // phyag rgya kha cig la sogs pa //
T02D1410:302b-34: rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan bya //
T02D1410:302b-35: mtshon char brjod la 'gom mi bya //
T02D1410:302b-36: dam tshig gnas gang smad mi bya //
T02D1410:302b-37: mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya //
T02D1410:302b-38: de yis lhan cig bde ba bya //
T02D1410:302b-39: grol ba'i don du bde ba gzung //
T02D1410:302b-41: mngon par brtson pa ni sgrub pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1410:302b-42: de yis ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis so //
T02D1410:302b-44: grol ba'i don ni skye ba 'di kho na la bde ba byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1410:302b-45: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:302b-46: dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa //
T02D1410:302b-47: byang chub sems ni lhung gyur na //
T02D1410:302b-48: phung po rnam shes brgyal gyur la //
T02D1410:303a-3: da ni dur khrod la sogs par mtshan mo rgyu ba gsungs pa /
T02D1410:303a-4: de nas dam tshig spyod byas nas //
T02D1410:303a-5: slar yang rnam 'khrul sems dpa' nyid //
T02D1410:303a-6: mtshan mo gcer bur yongs su rgyu //
T02D1410:303a-7: rtag tu gnas dang dmar bar 'gyur //
T02D1410:303a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas thog mar rang gi
T02D1410:303a-9: khyim du mnyam par bzhag pas dam tshig gi spyod
T02D1410:303a-12: dang por mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1410:303a-13: 'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya //
T02D1410:303a-14: nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la //
T02D1410:303a-15: yid la 'dod pa'i brtul zhugs spyad //
T02D1410:303a-16: sems can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur //
T02D1410:303a-17: dpa' bo chen po rgyu bar byed //
T02D1410:303a-19: rnam 'khrul sems can thams cad ni /
T02D1410:303a-20: rnam par 'khrul ba'i gnas skabs kyi lus kyi bya ba'o //
T02D1410:303a-21: slar yang bsam gtan las nus pa bskyed nas /
T02D1410:303a-22: phyi nas spyod pa kun du brtsam mo //
T02D1410:303a-23: rang sems bskul pa'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1410:303a-24: yid ni brtan nam g-yo'am ci //
T02D1410:303a-26: nag po he ru ka / dmar po phag mo'i
T02D1410:303a-27: dngos por 'gyur ro zhes pa drang ba'i don to
T02D1410:303a-28: // nag po 'jigs pa'i phung por gnas pa de'i
T02D1410:303a-29: tshe ma chags pa thams cad stong pa sgom pa
T02D1410:303a-31: mgul rgyan gtsug phung dpung rgyan dang //
T02D1410:303a-32: rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa can //
T02D1410:303a-33: mgrin par mgo bo'i phreng ba 'phyang //
T02D1410:303a-34: 'og pag sil sil sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D1410:303a-35: ral pa'i cod pan dar dbyangs dang //
T02D1410:303a-36: skra sogs phyin ci log gis brgyan //
T02D1410:303a-37: rdo rje padma kha tv'am bcas /
T02D1410:303a-38: cang te'u h'um gi sgra sgrogs pa //
T02D1410:303a-40: dpal ldan rgyal bu gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs kyi lam gsungs pa /
T02D1410:303a-41: rdo rje padma bcas pa ni /
T02D1410:303a-43: shing las byung ba'i rdo rje byas //
T02D1410:303a-44: de bzhin shing byung dril bu ni //
T02D1410:303a-45: bzung nas rtag tu yongs su rgyu //
T02D1410:303a-46: he ru ka nyid rab sgrub ched //
T02D1410:303a-47: mi yi rus pa'i mgul pa'i rgyan //
T02D1410:303a-48: sogs byas ral pa'i cod pan sogs //
T02D1410:303a-49: phyin log ro yi skra las skyes //
T02D1410:303a-51: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1410:303a-52: go cha gsum gyis brgyan pa dang //
T02D1410:303a-53: srog chags yan lag pags pa gyon //
T02D1410:303a-54: bde ba don gnyer bde bskyang bya //
T02D1410:303b-0: @303b mchod phyir thogs pa spangs nas ni //
T02D1410:303b-1: he ru ka dpal gtsang sbrar gnas //
T02D1410:303b-2: phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:303b-3: sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson //
T02D1410:303b-5: dpa' bo zhes pa ni dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi
T02D1410:303b-6: rnams kyis lus kyi khams la lhag par gnas par
T02D1410:303b-8: thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kun //
T02D1410:303b-9: lus kyi khams la brtags pa'o //
T02D1410:303b-10: go cha gsum ni shes rab dang thabs dag gi go cha gnyis so //
T02D1410:303b-11: dpa' mo rnams kyi yang spyi bo la sogs par
T02D1410:303b-12: rab gtum ma rnams so zhes 'di nyid du 'chad
T02D1410:303b-13: par byed do // de bzhin du yang spyi bor rab gtum ma'o //
T02D1410:303b-14: spyi gtsug tu gtum pa'i mig can ma'o zhes pa
T02D1410:303b-15: la sogs pa'i nga rgyal brjod la bsam par bya'o
T02D1410:303b-16: // rgyud du lhag par gnas pa las gzhan dpa' bo drug shes rab dang thabs gsungs so //
T02D1410:303b-17: dpa' bo rnams brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:303b-18: de bzhin du bla mar yang sen mo dang so dag la thod pa'i dum bu'o //
T02D1410:303b-19: skra dang spu dag la keng rus chen po'o //
T02D1410:303b-20: pags pa dang dri ma la keng rus so zhes
T02D1410:303b-21: bya ba la sogs pa lha mo rnams dgod pa
T02D1410:303b-23: de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams nas //
T02D1410:303b-24: tsham dam sngags kyis legs par bsrung //
T02D1410:303b-25: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags nyid ldan //
T02D1410:303b-26: tshangs par spyod pas rtag tu bza' //
T02D1410:303b-29: bskyod par bya ba ni 'gro ba'o //
T02D1410:303b-30: bde ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:303b-32: rnal 'byor bde ldan sdug bsngal bral //
T02D1410:303b-34: mchod phyir thogs skud pa las skyes pa yang dag par spangs nas /
T02D1410:303b-35: skra las skyes pa bcang bar bya'o //
T02D1410:303b-36: gtsang sbra 'di dag dpal he ru ka'i rgyud du rnam pa gsum du gnas so //
T02D1410:303b-37: thal ba dang ni mchod phyir thogs //
T02D1410:303b-38: dus kun du ni rnam par gnas //
T02D1410:303b-39: rigs dang rigs min ngor mi blta //
T02D1410:303b-40: gtsug tor 'ching bar byed pa spang //
T02D1410:303b-41: zhes pa'i rigs ni bram ze la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:303b-42: rigs ma yin pa ni gtum mo la sogs pa 'ching bar byed pa'o //
T02D1410:303b-43: rigs dang rigs ma yin pa rang bzhin gcig pa dang gcer bu dang skra grol ba yang ngo //
T02D1410:304a-2: gnyis pa zla ba yin par 'dod //
T02D1410:304a-3: gsum pa rnal 'byor ma lhan cig / zas gcig tu ni za ba yin //
T02D1410:304a-4: zhes pho nya mo nyid kyis lhan cig pa'o //
T02D1410:304a-5: rdo rje aa ralli ru ya /
T02D1410:304a-6: gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs //
T02D1410:304a-7: tshul khrims kun spyod yon tan ldan //
T02D1410:304a-8: phrag dog rmongs chags la sogs spang //
T02D1410:304a-9: de bzhin sgrin zhing ngo tsha shes //
T02D1410:304a-11: rang nyid gsang sngags rig pa ste //
T02D1410:304a-12: thabs cig rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad //
T02D1410:304a-14: zla ba ni myos byed do //
T02D1410:304a-16: zla ba 'thungs nas rtag pa yi //
T02D1410:304a-20: bshad pa sha chen zos nas ni //
T02D1410:304a-21: dga' ba lhan cig myos byas 'thung //
T02D1410:304a-22: sems gnas 'chi med khang pa ru //
T02D1410:304a-23: 'dren pa dpa' bo bsgom par bya //
T02D1410:304a-24: sgrub po gtsang sbra 'di yis ni //
T02D1410:304a-25: dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D1410:304a-26: gtsang sbra 'di tsam nyid kyis ni //
T02D1410:304a-31: yid 'dis dngos grub dri ma gsum dang bral ba'o //
T02D1410:304a-32: chu la sogs pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1410:304a-34: zla ba nya dang 'phos pa dang //
T02D1410:304a-35: ches dang ches la brtag par bya //
T02D1410:304a-36: rnal 'byor dri ma bsal ba'i khrus bya 'am //
T02D1410:304a-37: yang na mi bya'o zhes so //
T02D1410:304a-38: bya ba gzhan la sogs pa yang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:304a-39: brjod pa bzlas pas kun du bshad //
T02D1410:304a-40: yan lag bskyod sogs phyag rgya ste //
T02D1410:304a-41: lha yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni //
T02D1410:304a-42: gang phyir rtag tu gnas par bya //
T02D1410:304a-43: mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya //
T02D1410:304a-44: 'jig rten bya ba gang la gnas //
T02D1410:304a-45: rdor sems go 'phang thob don du //
T02D1410:304a-46: phyin ci log gis gnas par bya //
T02D1410:304a-47: rigs bzhi la ni slong mo spyad //
T02D1410:304a-48: mkhas pas phru ba chag par ni //
T02D1410:304a-49: bza' bya chu klung 'gram du ni //
T02D1410:304a-50: rang sems rab tu gsal bar bya //
T02D1410:304a-51: byi la'i rkang pa tsam gyis ni //

T02D1410:307b-1: sindhu ra de zangs kyi snod du gzhag par bya'o //

T02D1410:307b-13: dus dang / khron pa dang nye bar bud med

T02D1410:307b-15: dus dang / bar bya'o // sngags kyang bzlas par bya'o //

T02D1410:307b-24: // / nang gi gtor ma gsungs pa //

T02D1410:307b-26: ri bong can zhu thig le 'chang //
T02D1410:307b-27: mya ngan 'das byung dpa' ba ni //

T02D1410:307b-31: brjod do // chags la zhen pa zhes so //

T02D1410:307b-34: he ru ka dpal mya 'das byung //

T02D1410:307b-36: dag pa'i chos kyi sprul pa ni //
T02D1410:307b-37: phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin /
T02D1410:307b-39: dpa' bo sngon po 'am dgongs pa'o //
T02D1410:307b-40: sangs rgyas sogs rnams dpa' kun rnams //
T02D1410:307b-42: zla ba 'dus pa legs gnas pa'i //
T02D1410:307b-43: spyod pa'i spun ni mchod par bya //
T02D1410:307b-44: spyod pa'i spun ni rdo rje spun rnams so //
T02D1410:307b-45: zla ba 'dus pa legs gnas pa ni dam tshig can du gsal lo //
T02D1410:307b-46: spun rnams kyis dang rang gi bu rnams kyis lhan
T02D1410:307b-47: cig tu bde ba dang sdug bsngal rjod par byed
T02D1410:308a-1: dang phyag rgya la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1410:308a-2: ye shes rab tu gsal bar bya ba ni ma
T02D1410:308a-4: de rnams kyis pha ma dang 'brel pa de rnams la gsang sngags sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D1410:308a-6: lha mo sbas pa de gzung bya //
T02D1410:308a-7: pha dang bu yis yid brtan min //
T02D1410:308a-9: de rnams kyi lhan cig tu ts'a ru bza' bar mi bya'o //
T02D1410:308a-10: dam tshig spyod pa sun 'byin pa 'di rnams la sngags la sogs pa sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D1410:308a-11: nye bar bstan pa nyams mi bya //
T02D1410:308a-12: zhes te 'brel bar gyur pa de rnams kyis dang
T02D1410:308a-13: slob dpon gyi bu dad pa med pa rnams dam
T02D1410:308a-14: tshig gi spyod pa mun zhes la ba'i na bza'
T02D1410:308a-16: dam tshig ces pa ni bsrung bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1410:308a-17: de rnams kyang sbyin par mi bya zhing /
T02D1410:308a-18: de rnams la de kho na nyid kyang ngo //
T02D1410:308a-20: dam tshig la gnas pa rnams la don ji lta
T02D1410:308a-21: ba bzhin du nye bar bstan pa la sogs pa
T02D1410:308a-22: sbyin par bya'o // pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la //
T02D1410:308a-24: zhes pa ni nye bar bstan pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T02D1410:308a-25: don dam pa'i bden pa zung 'jug go //
T02D1410:308a-26: la sogs pa'i sgra las rdo rje bzlas pa dang phra mo rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1410:308a-27: dam tshig gnas pa ni dam tshig gcig pa'i slob ma bzang po rnams la'o //
T02D1410:308a-28: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud du yang //
T02D1410:308a-29: g-yo can la min rgyan po rnams la min //
T02D1410:308a-30: dam tshig sdang la yod pa ma yin no //
T02D1410:308a-31: bla ma la gus rnam par dul ba dang //
T02D1410:308a-32: phrag dog chags pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T02D1410:308a-33: dkyil 'khor rab zhugs slob ma bzang po la //
T02D1410:308a-34: rdo rje theg pa'i 'dren pa po la ni //
T02D1410:308a-35: de la rgya chen mchog 'di ni //
T02D1410:308a-36: de nyid mchog ni bstan par bya //
T02D1410:308a-38: gang yang rgas pa'i dngos por gnas //
T02D1410:308a-39: gang yang rtog ge dga' ba'i mi //
T02D1410:308a-40: dge slong dngos por gnas pa gang //
T02D1410:308a-41: de la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02D1410:308a-43: pho nya mo ni phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D1410:308a-45: pho nya mo ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1410:308a-47: gzhan ni dam tshig dang bral ba'o //

T02D1410:308b-1: gang rim pa las 'da' bar byed pa ni skye
T02D1410:308b-2: gnas dman la dga' bas gnas pa la legs pa'i
T02D1410:308b-3: rnam pa la sbyin par mi bya'o //

T02D1410:308b-7: pho nya mo ni bud med de //
T02D1410:308b-8: rnal 'byor sdom pa'i rgyud du yang /
T02D1410:308b-9: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
T02D1410:308b-10: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D1410:308b-11: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas grub 'gyur //
T02D1410:308b-12: zad par gyur pa ni dman pa'i theg pa la brten pa'o //
T02D1410:308b-13: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:308b-14: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1410:308b-15: rig ma'i brtul zhugs bla na med //

T02D1410:308b-19: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod par yang //

T02D1410:308b-21: 'da' ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //
T02D1410:308b-22: skye gnas dman la dga' bar gnas //
T02D1410:308b-23: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba min //
T02D1410:308b-25: 'ang gi sgra las mthar skyes mo bsten du yang
T02D1410:308b-26: shin tu bzod cing khyad par 'phags pas bsten par

T02D1410:308b-32: lhan cig rdzas kyis the tshom med //
T02D1410:308b-33: ces pas ma bsten pa'i nyes dmigs gsungs te /
T02D1410:308b-34: 'dod pa can de rnams kyis ma bsten pa las khros pa rnams kyis dka' thub ste /
T02D1410:308b-35: brtul zhugs la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:308b-36: sbyin pa'i bdag po'i 'khor lo las skyes pa'i bsod nams dang /
T02D1410:308b-37: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub dang rdzas rnams kyis
T02D1410:308b-38: lhan cig pa'i chos la sogs pa da las kyang
T02D1410:308b-40: nya la rnal 'byor ma bsten bya //
T02D1410:308b-41: tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'am brgyad pa gnyis //
T02D1410:308b-42: bcu bzhis dang nya la yang //
T02D1410:308b-43: de yi chos la rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1410:308b-44: sngags pas btung bas mchod par bya //
T02D1410:308b-46: sbyin bdag gi 'khor lo la yang gdon mi za
T02D1410:308b-47: bar 'dod pa sbyin pas phyag rgya sbyin par bya'o
T02D1410:309a-0: nor gyis rgyu rnyed 'gag pa med @309a * //
T02D1410:309a-2: bsod nams mang po'i rgyu ru de rnams rab sbyin bya //
T02D1410:309a-3: rtag pa'i dngos grub rgyu ru gsang ba'i yan lag ni //
T02D1410:309a-4: slob dpon chen po'i go 'phang rgyu ru dbul bar bya //
T02D1410:309a-5: rnam pa gzhan du bsod nams phyin ci log tu 'gyur //

T02D1410:309a-7: mar me'i brgyad 'gyur shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chang //
T02D1410:309a-8: chang gi brgyad 'gyur na chung ma la rab sbyor te //

T02D1410:309a-13: rnams kyang gsang ba'i sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin
T02D1410:309a-14: bya // bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams dang
T02D1410:309a-15: lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang
T02D1410:309a-16: bya // rgyal rigs mo // rje mo dmangs mo
T02D1410:309a-17: mthar skyes rnams ma mig dang lag pa dang bral
T02D1410:309a-18: rnam chu sna ni chad ma rnams //
T02D1410:309a-19: mtha' dag byang chub rgyu ru thabs dang shes rab

T02D1410:309a-22: bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri ma dag dang rnam par

T02D1410:309a-25: rkang pa g-yon pa sngon du 'dor //

T02D1410:309a-33: g-yon pa tshim byed za bar byed //

T02D1410:309a-36: lag pa la dgod par byas la myos byed lag

T02D1410:309b-53: 'dir rgyas par bya ba ma yin no zhes bcom

T02D1410:309b-57: rnal 'byor ba'i brtul zhugs kyis rdzogs pa ni bde

T02D1410:309b-65: rigs kyi kun du spyod pa zhes pa ni yul

T02D1410:309b-69: rigs bzhi kun du spyod pa ni spros pa med

T02D1410:310a-28: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu btung bar bya'o //

T02D1410:310b-1: mchog gzhan theg pa thun mong ni //
T02D1410:310b-2: sems med sems ni bde ba che //

T02D1410:313b-44: phyi rol gnyis gnyis las rnam grol //

T02D1410:313b-49: gnyis gnyis ni rtag par rtog pa'o //

T02D1410:314a-16: tsandan gyis ni nye bar byugs //
T02D1410:314a-17: me tog sil ma gcal du bkram //
T02D1410:314a-18: dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni //

T02D1410:314a-20: phyogs bcing bar ni bya ba'o //
T02D1410:314a-21: de nas rdza rnga bcing byas nas //
T02D1410:314a-22: ri mi dgu pa shin tu zlum //
T02D1410:314a-23: bcu drug sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i //
T02D1410:314a-24: yi ge'i phyir mo mnyam bsgribs nas //
T02D1410:314a-25: der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya //
T02D1410:314a-26: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1410:314a-27: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis //
T02D1410:314a-28: sgrub pos dbyangs dang yi ge yis //
T02D1410:314a-29: de rnams gcig dman lnga bcu yis //
T02D1410:314a-30: thub pa'i grangs kyi nang chud par //
T02D1410:314a-32: rdza rnga bcing ba ni ngos gnyis nas ri mo
T02D1410:314a-33: brgyad rnams kyis gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu'i bdag
T02D1410:314a-34: nyid kyi re mig rdza rnga'i rnam par bya'o //

T02D1410:314a-37: lnga pa'i dbyang skyis bye ba las //

T02D1410:314a-42: nyi shu bzhi pa bha yig go //

T02D1410:314a-44: gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyor ba'o //

T02D1410:314a-46: lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:314a-47: nyi shu lnga pa yang dag gzung //
T02D1410:314a-49: sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang //
T02D1410:314a-50: sbyor bor bco lnga pa dang ldan //

T02D1410:314a-54: lnga pa yis ni yang dag ldan ni h'um ngo //
T02D1410:314a-55: lnga pa yis ni yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:314b-0: yi ge mchog tu mdzes @314b pa'o //

T02D1410:314b-3: phyag 'tshal dang por yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:314b-4: rkang pa dang por yang dag 'dod //
T02D1410:314b-5: ces pa nyi shu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1410:314b-7: phyag 'tshal dang po ni rkang pa'i dang por aom yig go //
T02D1410:314b-8: nyi shu gcig gis dman pa gzung //

T02D1410:314b-10: gsum po'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan //

T02D1410:314b-12: sum cu drug par yang dag ldan //

T02D1410:314b-15: nyi shur gcig gis dman pa la me'i bu yis ni 'og tu ra yig gos so //
T02D1410:314b-16: gsum pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan ni gri'o //
T02D1410:314b-18: sum cu drug pas 'og tu ste hna'o //

T02D1410:314b-25: nyi shu gnyis pa yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:314b-26: nyi shu bdun pa yang dag ldan //

T02D1410:314b-30: gsum pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan //

T02D1410:314b-32: gnyis pa'i sngags dang yang dag ldan //

T02D1410:314b-34: nyi shu rtsa gcig re mig gnas //

T02D1410:314b-36: zhes pa la nyi shu pa ni k'a li la ltos nas so //
T02D1410:314b-37: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ni ya'o //
T02D1410:314b-38: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni ya'o //

T02D1410:314b-40: sgrub pa mchog ni btu bar bya //

T02D1410:314b-44: bzhi pa mtha' yis yang dag sbyar //

T02D1410:314b-49: rkang pa gsum par brjod par bya //

T02D1410:314b-53: de nas sum cu drug pa nyid //

T02D1410:314b-55: bcu gsum pa yi dbyangs kyis spras //
T02D1410:314b-56: re mig las ni bcu pa nyid //

T02D1410:315a-2: de nas nyi shu gsum pa'o //

T02D1410:315a-6: bcu gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis sbras pa ho'o //
T02D1410:315a-7: bcu pa bha ste lugs las bzlog pa ha la sogs pa nas so //
T02D1410:315a-8: nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o //
T02D1410:315a-10: gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan //

T02D1410:315a-17: rkang pa bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //

T02D1410:315a-24: h'um phat yi ge mthar sbyar ba //

T02D1410:315a-27: rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni //

T02D1410:315a-31: ces pa ni rgyud rnams kun la ni bya ba dang /
T02D1410:315a-34: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:315a-35: sku brgyad yang dag ldan pa ni //
T02D1410:315a-36: dkyil 'khor nyid ni srung don dang //
T02D1410:315a-37: sems can rnams kyang khyad par las //
T02D1410:315a-38: 'dis ni sgrub pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1410:315a-41: khro bo bzhi ni gnod mdzes kyi sngags 'di'o //
T02D1410:315a-42: sku brgyad ni rkang pa brgyad de gsal lo //
T02D1410:315a-43: rdo rje bzlas pas bsgrub bya ba //
T02D1410:315a-45: chags pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02D1410:315a-46: gzhan du nam yang ma yin no //
T02D1410:315a-47: zhes pas rdo rje bzlas pa gsungs so //
T02D1410:315a-49: don gyi rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa yi //
T02D1410:315a-50: rang bzhin med pas mdzes pa yis //
T02D1410:315a-51: dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis brtags pa //
T02D1410:315a-52: rdo rje bzlas par de brjod bya //
T02D1410:315a-54: don gyi rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa yis //
T02D1410:315a-55: rang bzhin med pas mdzes pa yin //
T02D1410:315a-56: ma ning dag gi gnas zhugs pa //
T02D1410:315a-57: sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas //
T02D1410:315a-58: zhes 'bum phrag lnga par yang ngo //
T02D1410:315a-59: tha dad yi ge slong mo ste //
T02D1410:315a-60: de 'don pa ni za ba yin //
T02D1410:315b-0: gang zhig bzlas @315b par dga' ba de /
T02D1410:315b-2: dgongs pa lung ston du yang //
T02D1410:315b-3: dang po'i yi ge'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1410:315b-4: rtag tu dbugs ni brngub par bya //
T02D1410:315b-5: brgyad pa'i mtha' yis yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:315b-6: au yig gis ni thig les brgyan //
T02D1410:315b-7: rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs gtong byed //
T02D1410:315b-8: mdzes pa'i bzlas par 'di brjod bya //
T02D1410:315b-10: dngos grub thams cad ni zhi ba can la sogs pa'i dngos grub ste /
T02D1410:315b-11: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02D1410:315b-12: srog 'bab pas las kyi dngos grub po //

T02D1410:315b-19: rdo rje las skyes yin par bshad //

T02D1410:315b-21: zhal bzhi pa'i sngags 'di ni rdo rje las skyes
T02D1410:315b-22: te zhe sdang gi ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'o
T02D1410:315b-24: khyi rta glang po zangs gtsug can //

T02D1410:315b-26: gtor ma sbyin sreg bya ba rnams //

T02D1410:315b-29: rgyal srid kun yang sgrub par byed //
T02D1410:315b-30: gsang sngags sbyin sreg 'bum gyis ni //
T02D1410:315b-31: sgrub pa po yis the tshom med //

T02D1410:315b-35: zangs kyi gtsug phud can ni khyim bya'o //
T02D1410:315b-36: rnam dpyod med par ni gdon mi za bar ro //
T02D1410:315b-37: zas ni sbyin par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
T02D1410:315b-38: med na bag zan la sogs pa las byas pa srog song ba'i phyugs kyi sha'o //

T02D1410:315b-45: rgyan 'jig rten du bstan la chos kyi sku'i mtshams
T02D1410:315b-46: kyi tshu rol sems can rnams kyi thod pa la

T02D1410:315b-49: zer gyis kun du 'gengs pa bkra shis pa thob
T02D1410:315b-50: par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dung la sogs pa
T02D1410:315b-51: 'ba' zhig bkra shis pa nyid ma yin no //
T02D1410:315b-52: de'i mgul rgyan la sogs pa bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D1410:315b-53: dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1410:316a-2: / phyi mo lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:316a-3: bsod nams kun gyi rgya mtsho che //
T02D1410:316a-4: zhes te 'di'i don 'di ltar yang dag par sangs
T02D1410:316a-5: rgyas ni seng ge dang 'phrog byed la sogs pa
T02D1410:316a-6: rnams kyi yang gtso bo ste /
T02D1410:316a-8: bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa //
T02D1410:316a-9: grags pa bkra shis snyan grags dge / dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
T02D1410:316a-10: kun dga' chen po dga' ba che //
T02D1410:316a-12: de'i phyir yang rnam dpyod med par yid 'phrog pa
T02D1410:316a-13: ni tha snyad du rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o
T02D1410:316a-15: phyag rgya thod pa kha tv'am ga dpa' rnams dpa' las skyes par bshad //
T02D1410:316a-16: dpa' las skyes pa ni rdo rje rigs la sogs pa las skyes pa'o //
T02D1410:316a-17: bshad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'o //
T02D1410:316a-18: rgyud mdor bstan par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang /

T02D1410:316a-20: bya rgod phung po'i ri chen por //
T02D1410:316a-21: ston pa po gnas nges pa ru //
T02D1410:316a-22: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02D1410:316a-23: sangs rgyas gsang sngags rang bzhin dag / dpal ldan 'bras spungs ston par 'gyur //
T02D1410:316a-26: gnod mdzes kyi las kyi cho ga'o //
T02D1410:316a-27: da ni lag pa la dgod pa gsungs pa //
T02D1410:316a-28: sgrub pa po yi lag g-yon gyis //
T02D1410:316a-29: brda ni lnga po bstan par bya //
T02D1410:316a-30: 'di ni dpa' bo'i gsung la ste //
T02D1410:316a-31: brda rnams kyi ni rab 'jug pa'o //
T02D1410:316a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sor mo lnga ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:316a-33: 'gro kun g-yon las byung ba yi //
T02D1410:316a-34: g-yon pa'i kun spyod rnam par gnas //
T02D1410:316a-35: mthe bong la ni rnam snang gnas //
T02D1410:316a-36: sdigs mdzub rin chen 'byung ldan gnas //
T02D1410:316a-37: gung mo'i yan lag 'od dpag med //
T02D1410:316a-38: ming med ral gri 'chang bar gnas //
T02D1410:316a-39: mthe chung dpal ldan mi bskyod pa //
T02D1410:316a-40: lag pa'i dbus su rgyal ba'i bdag / de ltar dpa' bo dgod pa ni //
T02D1410:316a-41: g-yon pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yin no //
T02D1410:316a-42: lag pa'i rgyab tu rtag tu sbyar //
T02D1410:316a-43: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam du 'gro //
T02D1410:316a-45: g-yon pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa las //
T02D1410:316a-47: g-yon pa ni kun rdzob las 'od gsal ba'o /
T02D1410:316b-1: lag pa dgod pas tshim pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1410:316b-2: 'di rnams zung 'jug gi sa bon rnams kyis so //
T02D1410:316b-3: de bzhin du kun spyod du aom bam /
T02D1410:316b-8: phat phat ces p'am b'am h'am y'am hr'im mem hra h'im h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1410:316b-11: ser po dang sngon po dang ;
T02D1410:316b-19: dud ka'o zhes pa lag pa'i mchod pa la gcig
T02D1410:316b-20: tu mthe chung la sogs par gang gi tshe lag
T02D1410:316b-21: pa dag phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i dbye
T02D1410:316b-22: bas de'i tshe g-yon pa'i 'jug pas dgod pa nye
T02D1410:316b-23: bar bstan pas dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' dang
T02D1410:316b-26: gshin rje ma dang rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D1410:316b-27: rmongs byed ma dang 'od dpag med /
T02D1410:316b-28: skyod byed ma dang he ru ka / skrag byed ma dang rin chen dbang po //
T02D1410:316b-29: gtum mo dang rta mchog / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa g-yon du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1410:316b-30: mngon brjod du gsungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni ho: hr'i: aa: bhrum /
T02D1410:316b-31: mthe chung la sogs pa'i nang du bam mo //
T02D1410:316b-32: de bzhin du g-yas la mthe bong la sogs pa la l'am m'am p'am t'am kham /
T02D1410:316b-33: nang du wam de ser po dang /
T02D1410:316b-37: cher ser ba rnams g-yas la'o //
T02D1410:316b-43: sa ni spyan mar bshad pa ste //
T02D1410:316b-44: chu yi khams ni m'a ma k'i //
T02D1410:316b-45: me ni dkar mo zhes bshad do //
T02D1410:316b-46: rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1410:316b-47: stong pa rdo rje dbyings phyug ma //
T02D1410:316b-48: 'gyur med shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02D1410:316b-49: mthe bong la sogs thams cad du //
T02D1410:316b-50: sngon bzhin rim mthar ma lus brjod //
T02D1410:316b-51: gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing //
