T02D1410:330a-43: bdag gi lus la rnam bkod do //
T02D1410:330a-44: sa la ku sha'i stan la nyal //
T02D1410:330a-45: yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can //
T02D1410:330a-46: ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad par bzlas //
T02D1410:330a-47: rmi lam du ni bya ba kun //
T02D1410:330a-48: ston par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D1410:330a-50: rnal 'byor ma rnams aom hri: zhes bya ba la
T02D1410:330b-0: sogs pas 'khor lo @330b bsgom pa dang bzlas pas
T02D1410:330b-1: thams cad byed de sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:330b-2: bu mo'i lus kyi tshogs sngags kyis bgrang phreng la mngon par bsngags par bya'o //
T02D1410:330b-3: ral gri dang mar me dang mthe bong dang /
T02D1410:330b-4: me long la bltas pas pra phab pa mthong ste
T02D1410:330b-5: dge ba dang mi dge ba gang cung zad yod
T02D1410:330b-6: pa 'dir ston par byed do zhes pas rdo rje'i
T02D1410:330b-7: skar ma 'am snang ba gsungs so //
T02D1410:330b-8: dpal kye'i rdo rje la sogs par gsungs pa'i cho
T02D1410:330b-9: gas shes par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o
T02D1410:330b-10: // de nas yi ge pa yis sngags //
T02D1410:330b-11: rnam bkod 'khor lo'i dbye ba las //
T02D1410:330b-12: lag g-yas nyi ma'i dbus su ni //
T02D1410:330b-13: stong phrag gcig tu mngon bsngags nas //
T02D1410:330b-14: gang gis lag pa ston par byed //
T02D1410:330b-15: de ni nges par 'gugs par byed //
T02D1410:330b-17: rnam bkod lag pa g-yon pas de //
T02D1410:330b-18: shel gyi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D1410:330b-19: phyogs bcur rnam par 'byor bar byed //
T02D1410:330b-20: ces pa ni 'byung po la sogs pa 'bros par byed pa'o //
T02D1410:330b-22: gang gis lag pa ston par byed pa de nad
T02D1410:330b-23: la sogs pas gzir ba de rnams kyi nad thams
T02D1410:330b-24: cad las grol bar 'gyur te the tshom med do
T02D1410:330b-25: // dug dang gdon dang rims dang gzer dang mdze
T02D1410:330b-26: la sogs pa yang 'joms par byed do zhes pa
T02D1410:330b-28: ba lang sha ni mngar gsum btags //
T02D1410:330b-29: gal te sngags rig gcer bu gang //
T02D1410:330b-30: mtshan mo gsang ba ru ni gnas //
T02D1410:330b-31: stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:330b-32: sngags pas nang par dus su ni //
T02D1410:330b-33: gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1410:330b-34: sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu rnams kyis //
T02D1410:330b-36: zhes pas sbyin sreg gsungs so //
T02D1410:330b-37: mngar gsum ni sbrang rtsi 'o ma ka ra'o //
T02D1410:330b-39: yang na gsang sngags rgyal po che //
T02D1410:330b-40: gnas ni gang du bsam par bya //
T02D1410:330b-41: sbyin sreg 'bum gyis gnas de ru //
T02D1410:330b-42: rgyal srid 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D1410:330b-43: ces pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:330b-44: dkar po yis ni zhi bar byed //
T02D1410:330b-45: dmar pos dbang du 'gyur bar byed //
T02D1410:330b-46: nag pos myur du gsod par byed //
T02D1410:330b-47: ser pos nges par gnon par byed //
T02D1410:331a-0: ces pa kha dog gsungs te sgra @331a * //
T02D1410:331a-2: lag pa g-yon dang g-yas pa la //
T02D1410:331a-3: zla nyi mun pa can dang me //
T02D1410:331a-4: spyi bor bcings pa mthong ba dang //
T02D1410:331a-5: byed par 'gyur te gzhan du min //
T02D1410:331a-6: ji srid khu tshur ma bkrol ba //
T02D1410:331a-7: mtshon cha myur du gnod par byed //
T02D1410:331a-9: dud 'gro la sogs pa yi gzhi //
T02D1410:331a-11: g-yas pa la ni lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur
T02D1410:331a-12: bcings nas sngags bzlas pas mi la sogs pa'i 'khrul
T02D1410:331a-13: 'khor la sogs pa gnon par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:331a-15: yang na bya ba thams cad ni //
T02D1410:331a-16: sgrub par gyur pa bsgrub par bya //
T02D1410:331a-17: dri bzangs me tog 'bras bu dang //
T02D1410:331a-18: bdug pa so rtsi bzang po'i zas //
T02D1410:331a-20: lus kyi sbyor ba dang por 'gyur //
T02D1410:331a-21: sbyor ba gnyis pa nus pa ste //
T02D1410:331a-22: gsum pa rgyal srid longs spyod nyid //
T02D1410:331a-23: bzhi pa mtho ris gnas pa yin //
T02D1410:331a-24: sum cu rtsa drug pho nya mo //
T02D1410:331a-25: de 'grub der ni the tshom med //
T02D1410:331a-26: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas //
T02D1410:331a-29: 'dir sngags pa'i lus kyi longs spyod ni lus mdzes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:331a-30: bsam gtan grub pa la nus pa //
T02D1410:331a-32: ngag gi 'jal ba rgyal sred ces te yid la mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1410:331a-33: bzhi pa ni bud med bzang mo'i bde ba'o //
T02D1410:331a-35: yang na rnal 'byor ma drug sngags //
T02D1410:331a-36: 'khor lo lag pa g-yon par gnas //
T02D1410:331a-37: gang gi lag pa de bstan pa //
T02D1410:331a-38: de ni nges par 'gugs par byed //
T02D1410:331a-39: 'khor lo'i yi ge la sogs ni dmar por gsal lo //
T02D1410:331a-40: tsandan dmar po'i rdul dang ni //
T02D1410:331a-41: de bzhin skye tshe lan tshva dang //
T02D1410:331a-42: bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes rdul //
T02D1410:331a-43: gcig tu byas nas btags par bya //
T02D1410:331a-44: rnal 'byor ma rnams sngags dang ni //
T02D1410:331a-45: lag pas mnye ba byas nas ni //
T02D1410:331a-46: de nas mtshan mo gdol ba'i mer //
T02D1410:331a-47: ro bsregs me la phye ma bsregs //
T02D1410:331a-48: bsgrub byar mngon phyogs gyur nas ni //
T02D1410:331a-49: sbyor ba'i di ni brtsam par bya //
T02D1410:331a-50: ji srid chig brgyar sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:331a-51: de srid nges par 'gugs par byed //
T02D1410:331a-52: ces pa sngags brjod pas bsgrub bya rmya shing rmugs
T02D1410:331b-0: par gyur pa rlung dang me'i dkyil @331b 'khor la
T02D1410:331b-1: gnas pa phyag gi zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang
T02D1410:331b-2: lha rnams kyi 'od zer gyis snying phug nas /
T02D1410:331b-3: de nas bud med de'i skye gnas lcags kyus phug
T02D1410:331b-4: nas zhags pas mgrin pa bcings nas gcer bur mngon
T02D1410:331b-5: du phyogs nas zhabs kyi 'og tu lhung bar 'gyur
T02D1410:331b-6: par bsam par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o
T02D1410:331b-7: // sa yi mgon po bdag nyid dang //
T02D1410:331b-8: nor yang dbang du 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1410:331b-9: rdul de nyid ni yang dag blang //
T02D1410:331b-10: lcags kyi phye ma rnam par bsre //
T02D1410:331b-11: dur khrod ras la gtums nas ni //
T02D1410:331b-12: lan bdun bzlas te bzhi mdo ru //
T02D1410:331b-13: sor mo brgyad du sa brkos nas //
T02D1410:331b-14: dgra yi ming dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:331b-15: gang gi ming smos sbas pa de //
T02D1410:331b-16: myur du bsgrub bya de gnon gyur //
T02D1410:331b-17: ba yi 'o mas grol don du //
T02D1410:331b-18: de nas phyi ma de bkru bya //
T02D1410:331b-20: de zhes pa bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi'o //
T02D1410:331b-21: de la gnas pa'i yang na'o //
T02D1410:331b-23: phye ma de nyid blangs nas ni //
T02D1410:331b-24: smyo byed lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:331b-25: yi dags gos su de btums nas //
T02D1410:331b-26: dgra yi ming ni kun du bri //
T02D1410:331b-27: gcig tu byas nas brgyar bzlas te //
T02D1410:331b-28: dur khrod du ni me sba bya //
T02D1410:331b-31: zhes te rang gi gnas su 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1410:331b-32: lnga zhes pa ni da ngu ra'i rtsa ba dang
T02D1410:331b-33: sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras
T02D1410:331b-34: bu'o // yi dags ni shi ba'o //
T02D1410:331b-36: zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i khrag gis gro ga la ming kun du bri bar bya'o //
T02D1410:331b-37: sum mdor bzlas pa byas te mthe bos mnan na dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:331b-38: rang zhes pa ming med mthe bos mnan pa'o //
T02D1410:331b-39: rkang pas mnan par byas nas ming med kyis bzlas par bya'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:331b-40: de nas las mchog bshad par bya //
T02D1410:331b-41: dag gis dngos grub rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1410:331b-42: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog dmar //
T02D1410:331b-43: ba yi 'o mar ldan pas kyang //
T02D1410:331b-44: nyin zhag so sor sngags bzlas pas //
T02D1410:331b-45: zhi ba'i lingga'i spyi bor bsnun //
T02D1410:331b-46: nyi ma bdun du mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1410:331b-47: brgya rtsa brgyad po nyid kyis so //
T02D1410:331b-48: de nas nyi ma brgyad pa la //
T02D1410:331b-49: me tog de rnams blangs nas su //
T02D1410:331b-50: chu klung chen po'i chur zhugs nas //
T02D1410:331b-51: de dag re re dor bar bya //
T02D1410:332a-1: gyis kyang ni thams cad rnams //
T02D1410:332a-2: gsang sngags bzlas nas dor bar bya //
T02D1410:332a-3: chu klung dor ba'i me tog gang //
T02D1410:332a-4: rgyun las ldog na sgrub pa pos //
T02D1410:332a-5: de ni chu dang ldan pa blang //
T02D1410:332a-6: smos ma reg pa de 'thungs na //
T02D1410:332a-7: sgrub pa po de'i ngag gis ni //
T02D1410:332a-8: dngos grub 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D1410:332a-9: ces te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:332a-10: lag pa skye gnas phyag rgya bcings //
T02D1410:332a-11: brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya //
T02D1410:332a-12: sngags pa bsgrub byar mngon phyogs nas //
T02D1410:332a-13: bsgrub bya yi yang lto bar gnas //
T02D1410:332a-14: blo ldan de yid la gnas pa //
T02D1410:332a-15: thun gsum mthe chung ba skyong bar bya //
T02D1410:332a-16: mtshan mo bdun gyis rgyal po sogs //
T02D1410:332a-17: brgya byin sogs rnams nges par 'gugs //
T02D1410:332a-18: zhes te mthe chung ni lce'o //
T02D1410:332a-20: tsandan dmar po'i rdul gyis ni //
T02D1410:332a-21: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas nas //
T02D1410:332a-22: tsha ba gsum gyis rnam par byugs //
T02D1410:332a-23: spra tshil gyis ni rab byug bya ;
T02D1410:332a-24: / sgrub pos de yi gsang gnas su //
T02D1410:332a-25: zangs ma'i kha ba kyis de phug nas //
T02D1410:332a-26: seng ldeng mdag me du med la //
T02D1410:332a-27: nyi ma bdun du nges par gdung //
T02D1410:332a-28: sngags kyis lan cig bzlas pa yis //
T02D1410:332a-29: bsgrub bya myur du 'gugs par byed //
T02D1410:332a-30: bsgrub bya'i ming ni sngags spel ba //
T02D1410:332a-31: gi wang ro yi sen rtsi yis //
T02D1410:332a-32: gro ga'i 'dab ma la bri bya //
T02D1410:332a-33: rgyal po'i gnas dang sde nyid bcas //
T02D1410:332a-34: spra tshil gyis ni 'dab ma dkri //
T02D1410:332a-35: seng sdeng me yis gdung bar bya //
T02D1410:332a-36: ji srid spra tshil ma zhu ba //
T02D1410:332a-37: de srid bar du gdung bar bya //
T02D1410:332a-38: rgyal po nges par myur du 'gugs //
T02D1410:332a-39: bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes rdul //
T02D1410:332a-40: tsandan dmar po dang bsres pa //
T02D1410:332a-41: dur khrod thal ba dang lhag ma //
T02D1410:332a-42: gcig tu byas nas sgrub pos ni //
T02D1410:332a-43: seng lder mdag me du med la //
T02D1410:332a-44: rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis ni //
T02D1410:332a-45: mnyes nas gdung ba'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:332a-46: ji srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub //
T02D1410:332a-47: brgyal zhing sems dang bral ba dang //
T02D1410:332a-48: rnam par rmongs shing nyon mongs pas //
T02D1410:332a-49: phyugs dang de bzhin pho nya mo //
T02D1410:332a-51: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma ni //
T02D1410:332a-52: rlan bcas dpung pa'i tshad tsam ni //
T02D1410:332a-53: blangs nas de la sngags bris te //
T02D1410:332a-54: ro bsregs me ru de gzhug bya //
T02D1410:332b-0: ji srid de @332b ni ma tshig pa //
T02D1410:332b-1: de nas myur bas blangs nas ni //
T02D1410:332b-2: rigs pas lan bdun bzlas byas nas //
T02D1410:332b-3: bsgrub bya'i ming nas de bskor bya //
T02D1410:332b-4: bud med mchog gang rjes dran nas //
T02D1410:332b-5: rlung gi shugs kyis de 'gugs byed //
T02D1410:332b-6: g-yon gyi 'jug pas de slar yang //
T02D1410:332b-7: bskor bas zhi bar byed pa yin //
T02D1410:332b-8: ka ra b'i ra mar me tog / rgyal la gi wang gis byugs te //
T02D1410:332b-9: chu klung chen por zhugs nas ni //
T02D1410:332b-10: lte ba tsam du chu ru gnas //
T02D1410:332b-11: lag pa kha sbyor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1410:332b-12: de nas stong phrag gcig tu bzlas //
T02D1410:332b-13: lag pa gnyis kyis phye mar brlags //
T02D1410:332b-14: chu yi lhan cig btung bar bya //
T02D1410:332b-15: rnal 'byor pa ni tshig grub pa //
T02D1410:332b-16: de nas de yis dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D1410:332b-17: rgyal po rgyal po'i btsun mo yang //
T02D1410:332b-19: lha dang lha min mir bcas rnams //
T02D1410:332b-20: khros pa'i tshig gis gsod par byed //
T02D1410:332b-21: tshar bcad rjes 'dzin la sogs pa //
T02D1410:332b-22: thams cad tshig gis byed pa yin //
T02D1410:332b-23: zhes pa las sna tshogs gsungs te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:332b-24: de nas gzhan ni rab 'chad byed //
T02D1410:332b-25: bud med kun du rmongs byed pa //
T02D1410:332b-26: ka ra b'i ra'i me tog ni //
T02D1410:332b-27: rigs pas lan bdun bzlas pa rnams //
T02D1410:332b-28: de rnams kha sbyor byas nas ni //
T02D1410:332b-29: skye gnas dbus su nges par sbyar //
T02D1410:332b-30: gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1410:332b-31: gsang sngags brgya phrag gcig bzlas bya //
T02D1410:332b-32: sgrub pa de dag rnams kyi ni //
T02D1410:332b-33: gcig ni phung pos blangs nas su //
T02D1410:332b-34: de yis mi mo gang la bsnun //
T02D1410:332b-35: de ni mod la dbang du 'gyur //
T02D1410:332b-36: zhes te rigs pas zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags kyis so //
T02D1410:332b-37: kha sbyor byas pa ni mig btsums pa'i dga' ba med pa'o //
T02D1410:332b-38: dmar po ni ka ra b'i ra'i me tog go //
T02D1410:332b-39: gnyis med ces pa bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po gnyis gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1410:332b-41: de nas yi ge ha lnga yi //
T02D1410:332b-42: las ni 'chang byed de nyid las //
T02D1410:332b-43: gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis //
T02D1410:332b-44: myur du dngos grub rab 'jug byed //
T02D1410:332b-45: ces pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:332b-46: h'im h'im h'um hoo ha: zhes pa sngags bstan pa'o //
T02D1410:332b-47: shes rab dag pa tsam gyis yon tan phyed do //
T02D1410:333a-2: /'di dag dgod par bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i lag pa dag brtan par mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1410:333a-3: bsgrub bya la mngon du phyogs par gyur pas de'i
T02D1410:333a-4: ming nas bskul ba dang ldan pas de'i khrag 'gugs
T02D1410:333a-5: par byed de dgra bo mod la 'chi bar 'gyur
T02D1410:333a-6: ro // 'di dag ni ha yig dbus mang byas
T02D1410:333a-7: nas gzhan gyi ming dang ldan pa bkod pas kha
T02D1410:333a-8: nas khrag 'dzag par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1410:333a-9: sdigs mdzub dang ming med kyi thod par gnas pa'i
T02D1410:333a-10: khrag rab tu mnye bar bya ste ji srid de
T02D1410:333a-11: skad bzhin par 'gyur gyi bar du'o //
T02D1410:333a-12: de nas bsgrub bya de rnams 'jig go //
T02D1410:333a-13: g-yon pa'i ming med kyi rtse mo nas mnyes na de nas 'tsho'o //
T02D1410:333a-14: chang 'thungs nas gal te khros pas mig dmar por
T02D1410:333a-15: gyur pas bzlas par bya ste rgyal po sde dang
T02D1410:333a-16: dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa yang myur du
T02D1410:333a-18: myos byed ni chang la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:333a-19: de bzhin du shun pa dang bu ram dang bcas pas so //
T02D1410:333a-20: gang cung zad bya ba de sbrang rtsis mchog tu
T02D1410:333a-21: btags nas chu rnams kyis sbyar ba yang mkhas pas
T02D1410:333a-22: chang rnam pa gsum du shes par bya'o //
T02D1410:333a-23: bu ram so ba bcos pa'i chang //
T02D1410:333a-24: mkhas pas dh'a h'a k'i la gnas //
T02D1410:333a-25: mnye bya zos shing 'thungs pa gang //
T02D1410:333a-26: de de myos byed ces bshad do //
T02D1410:333a-28: de nas rnam pa sna tshogs shes //
T02D1410:333a-29: mkha' 'gro ma la gtor ma sbyin //
T02D1410:333a-30: sgrub po dngos grub la brtson pas //
T02D1410:333a-31: gsang sngags bzlas pa rab tu bya //
T02D1410:333a-32: zhes pas bsnyen pa gsungs so //
T02D1410:333a-33: bzlas pa zhes pa nye bar mtshon pa ste sbyin sreg la sogs pa 'di nye bar bsdus so //
T02D1410:333a-34: ri bong la sogs pa'i spu'i skud pa la stong
T02D1410:333a-35: phrag mngon par bsngags nas gang gi mgul pa la
T02D1410:333a-36: bcings na mi de de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro
T02D1410:333a-37: // ka ra b'i ra'i me tog la //
T02D1410:333a-38: stong phrag gcig tu mngon bsngags nas ;
T02D1410:333a-39: / de yis sbrum ma la reg na //
T02D1410:333a-41: sdigs mdzub la mngon par bsngags te sdigs mdzub bstan na de rnam par 'joms par byed do //
T02D1410:333a-42: sgrub pa po'i g-yon pa'i ming med kyis reg na 'tsho bar byed do //
T02D1410:333b-2: gang gis bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1410:333b-5: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi rig pa chen po bzlas par
T02D1410:333b-6: bya zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pas 'bum bzlas pa
T02D1410:333b-7: bsgrubs pas 'byung po rnams dbang du byed do zhes
T02D1410:333b-8: pa sngon du bsnyen pa gsungs pa phag mo'i sngags
T02D1410:333b-10: da ni mngon par brjod pa bla mar gsungs pa'i
T02D1410:333b-11: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste
T02D1410:333b-12: / stong par bsgoms nas rang gi snying gar zla
T02D1410:333b-13: ba la gnas pa'i sna tshogs su chu skyes kyi
T02D1410:333b-14: / steng du / a'a li k'a l'i'i dbus su
T02D1410:333b-15: yam las skyes pa'i phag mo rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1410:333b-16: ma dmar mo phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig pa spyan
T02D1410:333b-17: gsum pa mche ba gtsigs pa skyil krung phyed pas
T02D1410:333b-18: gar byed bzhin pas gnas pa shin tu mdzes pa
T02D1410:333b-19: phyag g-yon gyi mthar skra grol ba sna tshogs padma
T02D1410:333b-20: la rnam par bzhugs pa zhal mche ba gtsigs pa
T02D1410:333b-21: / steng du / // zla ba phyed pas nye
T02D1410:333b-22: bar mdzes pa cod pan la rdo rjes mtshan pa
T02D1410:333b-23: dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed pa
T02D1410:333b-24: drag mo thod pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D1410:333b-25: dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba can //
T02D1410:333b-26: g-yon du thod pa khrag dang bcas //
T02D1410:333b-27: g-yas su rdo rje sdigs mdzub byed //
T02D1410:333b-28: bskal pa'i me ltar kun du 'bar //
T02D1410:333b-29: khrag la dgyes shing khrag 'dzag mo //
T02D1410:333b-30: spyan dmar 'od zer dmar po ste //
T02D1410:333b-31: sangs rgyas lnga yis rgyan du byas //
T02D1410:333b-32: yang na padma dmar po yi //
T02D1410:333b-33: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil krung can //
T02D1410:333b-34: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
T02D1410:333b-35: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1410:333b-36: rdo rje dril bu snyoms par 'jug / thabs ni 'tshir zhing 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1410:333b-37: yang na g-yas brkyang dmar por bcas //
T02D1410:333b-38: skra ni gyen du bcings shing brdzes //
T02D1410:333b-39: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan mnan //
T02D1410:333b-40: rgyan byad dmar gnas shin tu rmugs //
T02D1410:333b-41: de ltar lha mo sna tshogs mtshon //
T02D1410:333b-42: sna tshogs dbyibs dang kha dog ste //
T02D1410:333b-43: snying la ye shes ting 'dzin sems //
T02D1410:333b-44: bsams nas sems ni mtshon par bya //
T02D1410:333b-45: ji ltar 'khor lo lnga bdag nyid //
T02D1410:334a-0: @334a * // bha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
T02D1410:334a-1: de nas 'khor lo bzhi bdag nyid //
T02D1410:334a-2: de lta bu sogs mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1410:334a-3: yang na yud kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1410:334a-4: brjod pa'i sa bon sogs dran bya //
T02D1410:334a-5: sa bon 'od zer spros pa yis //
T02D1410:334a-6: 'gro ba'i don ni sgrub pa dang //
T02D1410:334a-7: bar ma gsal ba'i ye shes dang //
T02D1410:334a-8: rnam shes mchog gi lus can rnams //
T02D1410:334a-9: thun mtshams bzhi ru bsgoms pa las //
T02D1410:334a-10: sa 'og sa stengs kun blta bya //
T02D1410:334a-11: bdag po rnam gnyis de ji srid //
T02D1410:334a-12: mthong bar sa la rnam par spyad //
T02D1410:334a-13: nges par sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02D1410:334a-14: dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur //
T02D1410:334a-15: go cha chen pos yang dag bsrung //
T02D1410:334a-18: mi'i rus pa'i phur pa sor drug pa byas nas
T02D1410:334a-19: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dgra'i sgor gzugs par bya
T02D1410:334a-20: ste de'i rigs rgyud zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:334a-21: ba lang gi zhing ngam ma he dang glang po che dang rta'i ra bar sba bar bya ste /
T02D1410:334a-22: gang dang gang gi rus pas phur pa byas na de'i rigs rgyud nyams par byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D1410:334a-24: brgyad lhag pa'i brgya bzlas pa las so //
T02D1410:334a-26: de nas rgyal po dbang du bya bar 'dod par
T02D1410:334a-27: gyur na sgrub pa pos sa'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs
T02D1410:334a-28: brnyan byas nas sor brgyad kyi sa ru gzhug par
T02D1410:334a-29: bya'o // nyi ma dang po la ma du lungga'i
T02D1410:334a-30: me tog gsum dang me tog bsres la sbyin sreg
T02D1410:334a-31: bya zhing nyis 'gyur du 'phel bar bya'o //
T02D1410:334a-32: stong phrag brgyad de srid mi bdag dbang du gyur gyi bar sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1410:334a-33: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di nyid kyis //
T02D1410:334a-34: rmugs dang de bzhin rengs pa dang //
T02D1410:334a-35: rmongs dang skems pa nyid kyang ni //
T02D1410:334a-37: ces te sa la ni rgyal po'i sgo ru'o //
T02D1410:334a-40: sha dang ldan pa'i sbyin sreg gis /
T02D1410:334a-42: skyes pa bud med du bya bar 'dod pas //
T02D1410:334a-43: skyes pa'i zhes pa de nyid kyi'o //
T02D1410:334a-44: rkang pa'i pags pa dang sen mo ni 'dir cha mnyam par bya'o //
T02D1410:334a-45: rkang pa ni ltogs pa de nyid kyi'o //
T02D1410:334b-0: kanda @334b ka ri'i me tog dang 'bras bu gnyis
T02D1410:334b-1: cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag gis
T02D1410:334b-2: btags par bya'o // nyi ma bcu gcig ji srid par grib nas bskam par bya'o //
T02D1410:334b-3: nyi ma bcu gnyis pa la gang gi mgo bor
T02D1410:334b-4: phye ma byin pa'i skyes pa de nges par bud
T02D1410:334b-5: med du 'gyur te yang dag par 'o mas bkrus
T02D1410:334b-7: ltogs pa ni bya rog chen po'o //
T02D1410:334b-8: khrag rnams zhes spangs pa gsum pa'i don to //
T02D1410:334b-9: mgo la zhes pa mgo la zhes thob po //
T02D1410:334b-11: yang na khyi ru bya bar 'dod pas rgyal gyi
T02D1410:334b-12: lcags ne le'i mgo bor bzhag nas zhag bdun du
T02D1410:334b-13: sngags stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1410:334b-14: nyi ma brgyad pa la slar yang gur gum gyis
T02D1410:334b-15: mnyam par byas nas sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o
T02D1410:334b-16: // de nas gang gi mgo bor de'i thal ba byin pa'i skyes pa de khyir 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:334b-17: slar gso ba la mtshan mo mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o zhes so //
T02D1410:334b-18: rgyal ni skar ma rgyal la lcags kyi dri ma'o //
T02D1410:334b-19: brgyad ces pa brgyad lhag pa'i stong phrag go //
T02D1410:334b-22: rdzas nyid 'dir rdzas ma yin par bya bar 'dod
T02D1410:334b-23: na gser shing gi 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa
T02D1410:334b-24: brgyad byas na gang gi tshe /
T02D1410:334b-25: mi de'i rdzas ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:334b-26: slar gso ba la ni sngags aa ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:334b-27: gser shing ni smo byed do //
T02D1410:334b-28: ltas su byung bar bya bar 'dod pas gang bya
T02D1410:334b-29: chen po'i tshang gis sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma
T02D1410:334b-30: bdun pa la 'dir ltas su 'byung bar 'gyur te
T02D1410:334b-31: sa la'o // slar gso ba la ni phub ma'i
T02D1410:334b-32: sbyin sreg byas na nges par ltas ngan zhi bar
T02D1410:334b-33: sa la'o // 'gyur ro // spel tshig gi dbye
T02D1410:334b-34: bas brgyad lhag pa rnams bzlas pas zhi'o zhes pa
T02D1410:334b-36: zla ba gzas zin pa na byi la'i spu rnams ro bsregs pa'i mer bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1410:334b-37: gang gi ming nas smos pa sngags kyis mi de byi lar 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:334b-38: thal ba mgo bor blugs pa de 'o mas bkrus na zhi'o //
T02D1410:334b-39: bya rog gi rgyus pas srad bu byas nas sngags
T02D1410:334b-40: kyis mngon par bsngags te mgul par bcings pa'i mi
T02D1410:335a-1: can gang dang gang nyid kyis skud pa mgul pa
T02D1410:335a-2: la bcings te brgya rtsa ba brgyad bzlas na mi
T02D1410:335a-4: mgul pa'i skud pa bkrol bas kyang grol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:335a-5: rang gi so ba la mngon par bsngags nas pha rol gyi so ba rnams su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1410:335a-6: so ba phyed kyis kyang bdag nyid la mngon par
T02D1410:335a-7: dbang bskur nas mtshan mo bdun du bsngags bzlas pa
T02D1410:335a-8: byas te / de nas so ba 'gugs par byed do //
T02D1410:335a-9: rang gi so ba la lan bdun bzlas nas so //
T02D1410:335a-11: sna tshogs pa'i las rab 'byam gyi cho ga'o //
T02D1410:335a-12: de nas gzhan ni rab 'chad byed //
T02D1410:335a-13: mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas chen po //
T02D1410:335a-14: rin chen lnga yi rang bzhin dge //
T02D1410:335a-15: ri bo bzang pos bris nas ni //
T02D1410:335a-16: de yang steng du rtag bzlas bya //
T02D1410:335a-17: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1410:335a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pas phyi rol gyi mchod pa gsungs so //
T02D1410:335a-19: ri bo ni sum las skyes pa'i lhun po'o //
T02D1410:335a-20: lnga zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dbyings su gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1410:335a-22: rten dang brten pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1410:335a-23: bhee ramba la sogs par gnas //
T02D1410:335a-24: bla ma brgyud rim ji lta bar //
T02D1410:335a-25: de ltar shes nas chog shes pas //
T02D1410:335a-26: ri yi mgo dang ge sar dang //
T02D1410:335a-28: de yi dbus gnas dpa' bo ni //
T02D1410:335a-29: 'dod don thams cad sgrub pa po //
T02D1410:335a-30: zhes pa drang ba'i don to //
T02D1410:335a-31: gtsug tor la sogs pa'i padma ni lnga'o //
T02D1410:335a-32: bzang po ni gsang ba'i padma gcig pu'o //
T02D1410:335a-33: sna tshogs chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa rdo rje
T02D1410:335a-34: nor bur gnas pa la sogs pa brgyad pa ze'u
T02D1410:335a-35: 'bru dang bcas pa la nyi ma'o //
T02D1410:335a-36: au m'a ra dang de rang dbang phyug chen po dag rdul dang khu ba'o //
T02D1410:335a-37: 'dir he ru ka ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1410:335a-38: de dag 'gags pa ni gang ba'o //
T02D1410:335a-39: rdo rje phag mo ni de la snang ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de zla ba'am //
T02D1410:335a-40: zla ba can gyi dbye ba med pa'i chos can
T02D1410:335a-41: ma sgom par byed pas skye bo zhes pa nges
T02D1410:335a-42: pa'i don to // mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang //
T02D1410:335a-43: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
T02D1410:335a-44: rab gtum la sogs nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1410:335b-0: bya @335b rog gdong sogs ma mo brgyad //
T02D1410:335b-1: ces pa 'dis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dag pa gsungs so //
T02D1410:335b-2: kun spyod du yang lus rjes su dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1410:335b-3: de bzhin du gzhan yang rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1410:335b-4: rdo rje sems sogs dpa' bo ni //
T02D1410:335b-5: lugs las bzlog pas rab tu bstan //
T02D1410:335b-6: zhes pas 'khor lo lngas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so //
T02D1410:335b-7: mkha' la 'gro ma nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1410:335b-8: zhes pa le'u bzhi par gsungs so //
T02D1410:335b-9: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1410:335b-10: drang ba'i don gyis go sla'o //
T02D1410:335b-11: nges pa'i don gyis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa
T02D1410:335b-12: rnams lte ba la sogs pa'i 'khor lor sa la
T02D1410:335b-14: rab gtum la sogs pa rnams rtsa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1410:335b-15: bzhi'i sen mo dang so la sogs pa 'bab pa'o
T02D1410:335b-16: // bya rog gdong la sogs pa rnams sgo'i rtsa rnams te /
T02D1410:335b-17: kha'i dri ma la sogs pa 'bab pa'o //
T02D1410:335b-18: dpa' bo rnams kyang so dang sen mo la sogs pa 'bab pa'o zhes so //
T02D1410:335b-19: dang por rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02D1410:335b-20: de nas dpa' bo rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1410:335b-21: padma gar gyi dbang phyug nyid //
T02D1410:335b-22: de bzhin he ru ka dpal che //
T02D1410:335b-23: nam mkha'i snying po rta mgrin dang //
T02D1410:335b-24: de bzhin rin chen rdo rje mchog / stobs po che zhes brgyad pa ni //
T02D1410:335b-25: sku yi 'khor lor gnas pa ste //
T02D1410:335b-26: lugs las bzlog par gsungs pa'o //
T02D1410:335b-27: mig ngan rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid //
T02D1410:335b-28: rdo rje bzang dang shin tu bzang //
T02D1410:335b-29: rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid dang yang //
T02D1410:335b-30: dpa' chen rdo rje ral pa dang //
T02D1410:335b-31: myu gu can zhes bya ba ste //
T02D1410:335b-32: brgyad po gsung gi 'khor lor gnas //
T02D1410:335b-33: rdo rje'i lugs dang rdo rje'i 'od //
T02D1410:335b-34: 'od dpag med dang lha dgra dang //
T02D1410:335b-35: de bzhin nyid du mche rnam gtsigs //
T02D1410:335b-36: keng rus keng rus chen po mchog / thod pa'i dum bu can rnams ni //
T02D1410:335b-37: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad //
T02D1410:335b-38: brgyad po thugs kyi rdo rjer gnas //
T02D1410:335b-39: dpa' bo gcig pu'i don du ni //
T02D1410:335b-40: ji skad gsungs bzhin kha dog dbyibs //
T02D1410:335b-41: bsgom par bya zhing mchod par bya //
T02D1410:335b-42: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:335b-43: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dpa' bo rnams //
T02D1410:336a-2: zhes pas shes rab dang thabs nyid du gsungs so //
T02D1410:336a-3: de la gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa bong bu dang rnga mo dang /
T02D1410:336a-4: ra dang byi la'i gdong can zhes brjod do //
T02D1410:336a-5: pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug ni mtshan ma
T02D1410:336a-6: lngas mtshan ma la chags pa dang cung zad dgod
T02D1410:336a-7: pa yongs su 'khyud pa gcer bu nyid dang skra
T02D1410:336a-8: grol ba spu langs pa yang ngo zhes te sgra
T02D1410:336a-9: ji bzhin pa'o // sngar brjod pa yi cho ga yis //
T02D1410:336a-10: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1410:336a-11: dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya //
T02D1410:336a-12: dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin //
T02D1410:336a-13: zhes te sngar brjod pa ni rtsa ba dang bshad pa'i rgyud du brjod pas so //
T02D1410:336a-14: rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang tho rangs rang gi snying
T02D1410:336a-15: gar zla ba'i dbus su aa yig gis zla ba'i
T02D1410:336a-16: dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams nas de'i steng du h'um
T02D1410:336a-17: yig rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1410:336a-18: de nas byams pa'i sems byas nas //
T02D1410:336a-19: phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D1410:336a-20: zhes pa'i cho gas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gnas dgod pas so //
T02D1410:336a-21: de bzhin du kun spyod du /
T02D1410:336a-22: mkha' 'gro de bzhin l'a ma dang //
T02D1410:336a-23: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
T02D1410:336a-24: padma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod //
T02D1410:336a-25: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed ma //
T02D1410:336a-26: zhal gcig ma la phyag gnyis ma //
T02D1410:336a-27: sna tshogs gzugs can rnam sgeg ma //
T02D1410:336a-28: phyogs bral gyi ni bzhi po la //
T02D1410:336a-29: lnga yis gang ba'i thod pa nyid //
T02D1410:336a-30: sum yig la sogs yang dag sbyar //
T02D1410:336a-31: yul dang yul du rnam gnas pa //
T02D1410:336a-32: drangs pa 'khor lo'i snying por gnas //
T02D1410:336a-33: rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod //
T02D1410:336a-35: da ni mngon par brjod pa bla mar gsungs pa'i
T02D1410:336a-36: dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro la sogs pa bsgom pa
T02D1410:336a-37: brjod par bya ste 'di lta ste /
T02D1410:336a-38: dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni //
T02D1410:336a-40: sna tshogs kha dog ge sar ldan //
T02D1410:336a-42: de la dbus su h'um yig ni //
T02D1410:336a-43: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1410:336a-44: bcom ldan zhal bzhi sngo dang ser //
T02D1410:336a-45: dmar dang ljang zhal spyan gsum pa //
T02D1410:336a-46: bcu gnyis phyag ste g-yas brkyang gnas //
T02D1410:336a-47: 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan mo //
T02D1410:336b-0: zhabs kyi mthil @336b gyis kun du mnan //
T02D1410:336b-1: dam tshig rdo rje phag mos 'khyud //
T02D1410:336b-2: phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu'o //
T02D1410:336b-4: de nas gzhan ni rab 'chang byed //
T02D1410:336b-6: dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni //
T02D1410:336b-7: gsung gi 'khor lo yongs bsgom bya //
T02D1410:336b-8: rtsibs brgyad kha dog dmar po la //
T02D1410:336b-9: padma snga ma de bzhin nang //
T02D1410:336b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' yongs bsgyur bas //
T02D1410:336b-11: gsung gi rdo rje yongs su bsgom //
T02D1410:336b-12: zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1410:336b-13: zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro //
T02D1410:336b-14: de nas mchog sgrub pa'i cho gar 'gyur te /
T02D1410:336b-16: kha dog sna tshogs yid 'phrog par //
T02D1410:336b-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su //
T02D1410:336b-18: padma'i rgyal po rnam par bsam //
T02D1410:336b-19: zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa /
T02D1410:336b-20: phyag gnyis kyis rtse mo lnga gdengs pa'i rdo rje padma dang dril bu'o //
T02D1410:336b-21: phyag gzhan gnyis kyis tshogs bdag gi pags pa'i na
T02D1410:336b-22: bza' 'chang ba g-yas kyi phyag rnams su mdung dang
T02D1410:336b-23: lcags kyu dang gri gug dang cang te'u g-yon rnams
T02D1410:336b-24: su kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i
T02D1410:336b-25: mgo bo dang dgra sta rnams so //
T02D1410:336b-26: kha tv'am ga yang mchod phyir thogs kyi tshul gyis steng du rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa dang /
T02D1410:336b-27: dril bu rab tu 'chang ba ba dan gsum pas
T02D1410:336b-28: mtshan pa dbus su sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshon pa
T02D1410:336b-29: 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o //
T02D1410:336b-30: rgyu ma'i thod pa phyag tu gnas pa'o //
T02D1410:336b-31: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i zhal phag mo dmar mos 'khyud pa /
T02D1410:336b-32: dkyil 'khor phyi ru rnam pa lnga'i //
T02D1410:336b-33: yi dags rnams kyis de bzhin bskor //
T02D1410:336b-34: phyi ru dur khrod mi bzad pa //
T02D1410:336b-35: kha dog sna tshogs mchog gi mchog / shing mchog sna tshogs kyis yid 'ong //
T02D1410:336b-36: ce spyang bcas pas shin tu 'jigs //
T02D1410:336b-37: bya rog 'ug pa bya dkar rgod //
T02D1410:336b-38: ce spyang de bzhin ro bsregs dang //
T02D1410:336b-39: keng rus dang ni mdung gis phug /'phyang dang phyed tshig pa dang mgo //
T02D1410:336b-40: mgo thod dang ni rje ngar dang //
T02D1410:336b-41: mgo med lag dang mgo bo dang //
T02D1410:336b-42: sbrul ni sna tshogs yid 'ong dang //
T02D1410:336b-43: mig sna de bzhin rnga bo che //
T02D1410:336b-44: seng ge phag dang stag rnams dang //
T02D1410:336b-45: ra dang lug dang de bzhin du //
T02D1410:337a-2: rnga mo sna tshogs dam tshig mchog / myos byed rnam pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02D1410:337a-3: de bzhin chang gi btung ba mchog / dpa' bo 'dus pa bzang mo yi //
T02D1410:337a-4: rnal 'byor ma rnams sna tshogs mchog / thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin zhing //
T02D1410:337a-5: gri gug dang ni cang te'u mchog / lha yi rol mo sna tshogs dang //
T02D1410:337a-6: bza' dang bca' ba ro yi mchog / rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud //
T02D1410:337a-7: gzhib bya ba ldag bya ba mchog dam pa //
T02D1410:337a-8: rnam pa de lta'i dur khrod du //
T02D1410:337a-9: gnod sbyin ro langs srin po rnams //
T02D1410:337a-12: /'bar ba dang bcas nyi ma mtshungs //
T02D1410:337a-13: dkyil 'khor rdo rje rin chen gyis //
T02D1410:337a-14: shin tu dga' ba thug med sgrub //
T02D1410:337a-16: da ni gnas brjod pas sgrub thabs brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:337a-17: 'di la bsnyen pa dang nye bar sgrub pa dang
T02D1410:337a-18: sgrub pa chen po ste yan lag bzhi gnas so
T02D1410:337a-19: // rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor dang shin
T02D1410:337a-20: tu rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po ste bzhi'o
T02D1410:337a-21: // // mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
T02D1410:337a-22: de nyid kyi ni snying gar bsgom //
T02D1410:337a-23: bsnyen pa rnal 'byor rab tu brtags //
T02D1410:337a-25: nye bsnyen rjes su rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D1410:337a-26: dpa' bo'i yan lag dgod pa yis //
T02D1410:337a-27: rnal 'byor gyis ni sgrub pa brtsam //
T02D1410:337a-28: dag pa'i bzlas pa grub chen gyis //
T02D1410:337a-32: dang po'i mgo bo'i ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar
T02D1410:337a-33: gnas pa ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' la dmigs pa
T02D1410:337a-34: rnal 'byor bsgoms nas sprul pa rnams kyis blang ba'i
T02D1410:337a-35: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sa bon yan lag
T02D1410:337a-36: dgod par byas nas thig le'i rnal 'byor dang phra
T02D1410:337a-37: mo'i rnal 'byor dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
T02D1410:337a-38: kyi dag pa dang bzlas pa rnams so ;
T02D1410:337a-39: / gtor ma sbyin nas bdag nyid go bgo bar bya'o //
T02D1410:337a-40: 'dir nye bar sgrub pa'i yan lag la ji ltar
T02D1410:337a-41: gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das zhal gcig pa phyag
T02D1410:337a-42: gnyis pa la sogs pa bsgoms nas mkha' 'gro ma'i
T02D1410:337a-43: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1410:337b-0: de nas @337b mtshan ma bcu gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1410:337b-1: brjod par bya ste bla mar yang mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1410:337b-2: ni rdo rje ste mtshan ma brgyad la'o //
T02D1410:337b-3: l'a ma ni dril bu la'o //
T02D1410:337b-4: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma ni glang po che'i pags pa'i khu tshur la'o //
T02D1410:337b-5: de bzhin du bya rog gdong ma la sogs pa
T02D1410:337b-6: rnams kyi mdung dang lcags kyu dang cang te'u dang
T02D1410:337b-7: kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i mgo
T02D1410:337b-8: bo dang dgra sta dang sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan
T02D1410:337b-9: ma brgyad la'o // slob dpon bha bas kyang gsungs
T02D1410:337b-10: pa mkha' 'gro ma bcu po rnams ni bzhi dang
T02D1410:337b-11: drug ni dgra sta dang zhags pa dang mdung dang
T02D1410:337b-12: kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo
T02D1410:337b-14: ji srid ldog pa'i spyod yul du gyur gyi bar
T02D1410:337b-15: du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi
T02D1410:337b-16: don du me tog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o
T02D1410:337b-17: // g-yon nas bskor ba'i 'jug pa'i phyag 'tshal ba
T02D1410:337b-18: dang po ming dang lhan cig sv'a h'a'i mtha' ye
T02D1410:337b-21: gnyis med rdzas ni me tog sogs //
T02D1410:337b-22: me tog re re nas dbul bya //
T02D1410:337b-24: mngon par brjod pa bla mar yang //
T02D1410:337b-25: ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi yis //
T02D1410:337b-26: sa gzhi kun nas byug par bya //
T02D1410:337b-27: bzod pa'i pha rol phyin me tog /'bad pas gtor te dbul bar bya //
T02D1410:337b-28: sna tshogs phyag rgya yid 'ong ldan //
T02D1410:337b-29: rgya che shin tu mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1410:337b-32: shing skyes rdo 'am ras la yang //
T02D1410:337b-33: gru bzhi khru yi tshad du ni //
T02D1410:337b-34: skra dang srog chags phra brtags nas //
T02D1410:337b-35: sa la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1410:337b-36: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:337b-37: dngos po kun gyis zhes pa ni mkha' spyod la
T02D1410:337b-38: sogs pa gzugs yongs su bsgyur ba gnas pa rnams
T02D1410:337b-39: so // rgya cher bshad pa sum cu rtsa drug par yang //
T02D1410:337b-40: grub 'dod shin tu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
T02D1410:337b-41: rnal 'byor pas ni thun gsum bsgom //
T02D1410:337b-42: gtor ma dang ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:337b-43: sgrub chen dus kyi khyad par las //
T02D1410:337b-45: bsgom par bya ni rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pas sam /
T02D1410:337b-46: yan lag bzhis thun mtshams bzhir ro //
T02D1410:337b-47: yang yid la bzlas pa dang dam tshig btung ba yang bya'o //
T02D1410:338a-0: @338a * // thun mtshams gsum ni kun du sbyor ba gsum gyi lus shes rab dang thabs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1410:338a-1: snyoms par 'jug pa ni gcig tu 'dres pa'i dngos por bya'o //
T02D1410:338a-2: sbyin sreg ni phung po rnams so //
T02D1410:338a-3: dus ni mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba yin no zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1410:338a-4: da ni rgyun du gsungs pa'i mchod pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1410:338a-5: snga bar mal las langs nas bshang ba dang kha bshal ba bya'o //
T02D1410:338a-6: rang bzhin gyi kha dag pa'i don du ril bu khar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1410:338a-7: mdun du dkyil 'khor byas nas bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i ba byung gis so //
T02D1410:338a-8: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas ming med dang mthe
T02D1410:338a-9: bong kha sbyar ba dag gis 'khor lo'i dbus su
T02D1410:338a-10: bcom ldan 'das phag mo dang lhan cig pa mchod
T02D1410:338a-11: par bya'o // de nas shar dang byang dang nub dang lhor gnas pa rnams la'o //
T02D1410:338a-12: me dang bden bral dang rlung dbang du gnas pa rnams la'o //
T02D1410:338a-13: yang na phyogs gsum g-yas su bskor ba dang phyogs
T02D1410:338a-14: bral rnams su g-yon pas 'khor lo mtha' dag yang
T02D1410:338a-16: yi ge brgya pa bton nas btud pa tsam gyis
T02D1410:338a-17: mdzod spur phyag byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi re kha
T02D1410:338a-18: dbyi bar bya'o // mchod pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D1410:338a-19: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1410:338a-20: phyugs kyi las kyi cho ga mchog / gang gi rnam par shes tsam gyis //
T02D1410:338a-21: myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o //
T02D1410:338a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pas yi ge bdun pa'i las gsungs te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:338a-23: sngags pas cho ga ldan byas nas //
T02D1410:338a-24: s'a li btags pa las byung phyugs //
T02D1410:338a-25: bong bu mi dang rus sbal dang //
T02D1410:338a-26: rnga mo ce spyang rta la sogs //
T02D1410:338a-27: kun du sna tshogs phag dag ni //
T02D1410:338a-28: dngos grub ster ba'i phyugs su bshad //
T02D1410:338a-29: ces te phyugs kyi skye ba bdun pa so sor bdun pa can no //
T02D1410:338a-31: sna tshogs phag ni grong gi phag pa'o //
T02D1410:338a-33: des zos pa 'dis skye ba bdun pa shes pa
T02D1410:338a-34: dang rnyed par 'gyur ro zhes pa phan yon gsungs
T02D1410:338b-0: mtshan nyid ji ltar 'gyur @338b ba dang //
T02D1410:338b-1: de rnams las ni rab 'chang byed //
T02D1410:338b-2: nyon cig lha mo skal ba che //
T02D1410:338b-3: rnal 'byor pa yi mnyes gshin ma //
T02D1410:338b-4: skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis //
T02D1410:338b-5: gsum bzhi lnga dang skye ba drug / skye ba bdun du 'gyur ba yang //
T02D1410:338b-6: de rnams phyugs su the tshom med //
T02D1410:338b-8: phyugs ni bong bu la sogs pa ste drang ba'i don to //
T02D1410:338b-9: de 'gro ba ma yin pa las bdun no //
T02D1410:338b-11: gang gi dbugs ni dri zhim zhing //
T02D1410:338b-12: mig mi 'dzum par nges pa lta //
T02D1410:338b-13: bden par smra ba'i mi de rnams //
T02D1410:338b-14: rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga' //
T02D1410:338b-15: bdag gi skye ba shes pa dang //
T02D1410:338b-16: rtag tu lus kyi dri ni zhim //
T02D1410:338b-17: mtshan nyid de rnams ldan pa de //
T02D1410:338b-18: skye ba bdun du gyur pa'i phyugs //
T02D1410:338b-20: 'di rnams bshad pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa ni bla mar yang /
T02D1410:338b-23: srog chags gdug pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1410:338b-24: nam yang za bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:338b-26: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1410:338b-27: nye snying 'bum du bzlas pas kyang //
T02D1410:338b-28: de nyid kyi ni lag par dbul //
T02D1410:338b-29: sbyin pa 'di ni bdag la stsol //
T02D1410:338b-31: de ni zos pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1410:338b-33: snying ga'i ro tsa na blangs nas //
T02D1410:338b-34: gang la thig le byed 'gyur ba //
T02D1410:338b-35: sems can gang dag gang nyid kyi //
T02D1410:338b-38: skud pa byas nas mgrin pa la //
T02D1410:338b-39: bcings na sems can gang yin de'i //
T02D1410:338b-41: de ltar thams cad yongs su shes nas //
T02D1410:338b-42: sngar brjod pa yi las rnams sgrub //
T02D1410:338b-44: des na de ni rang shi ba'i'o //
T02D1410:338b-45: rab tu zos pa ni zos pa'o //
T02D1410:338b-46: sngar brjod pa mngon par brjod par gsungs pa'i las rnams bya ba'o zhes pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:338b-47: mkhas pa shing lo'i khu ba ni //
T02D1410:338b-48: ro tsa nar bcas blangs nas su //
T02D1410:338b-49: dpral bar thig le byas na ni //
T02D1410:338b-50: de gzugs 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D1410:338b-51: ces te shing ni 'byung po'i skra'o //
T02D1410:338b-53: phyugs rnams nyid kyi spu rnams ni //
T02D1410:339a-0: @339a * // lag dang spyi bor bcing bar bya //
T02D1410:339a-1: ljon shing yan lag lnga dang ldan //
T02D1410:339a-2: mi de de yi gzugs su 'gyur //
T02D1410:339a-3: zhes te ljon shing ni skye ba bdun pa'o //
T02D1410:339a-4: de'i yan lag lnga rnams su'o //
T02D1410:339a-6: rnal 'byor goms shing bzlas par ldan //
T02D1410:339a-7: mi ni nus par ldan yin yang //
T02D1410:339a-8: dka' dang sdig pa la dga' de //
T02D1410:339a-9: dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa yin //
T02D1410:339a-10: zhes pas sgrub pa po gsungs so //
T02D1410:339a-11: rnal 'byor ni gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1410:339a-13: shes rab thabs ni snyoms zhugs pa //
T02D1410:339a-14: mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan //
T02D1410:339a-15: shes dang shes bya rdzogs gcig nyid //
T02D1410:339a-16: stong nyid snying rje gnyis su med //
T02D1410:339a-18: dka' ba ni dam tshig nyams pa'o //
T02D1410:339a-19: sdig pa la dga' ba ni mi dge ba bcu
T02D1410:339a-20: dang rtsa ba dang sbom po'i ltung ba la sogs
T02D1410:339a-22: rtsa ba'i ltung ba rnams kyang gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud du gsungs pa /
T02D1410:339a-23: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
T02D1410:339a-24: bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-25: de bzhin khros nas spun rnams la //
T02D1410:339a-26: nyes pa brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1410:339a-27: sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems //
T02D1410:339a-28: nam yang nges par btang mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-29: byang chub sems ni 'dor mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-30: rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-31: yongs su ma smin sems can la //
T02D1410:339a-32: gsang ba nyid ni bstan mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-33: bdag nyid phung po smad mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-34: chos rnams ngo bo sun mi dbyung //
T02D1410:339a-35: gdug pa'i byams pa rtag tu spang //
T02D1410:339a-36: chos rnams nyid ni bstan mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-37: dad ldan sems can bslu mi bya //
T02D1410:339a-38: rtag tu dam tshig bsten par bya //
T02D1410:339a-39: shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
T02D1410:339a-40: skyon nyid kyis ni sun mi dbyung //
T02D1410:339a-42: sbom po'i ltung ba yang grub pa'i slob dpon padma myu gu'i zhabs kyis //
T02D1410:339a-43: sbom po'i ltung ba stobs nyid las //
T02D1410:339a-44: rdo rje btsun mo la zhen dang //
T02D1410:339a-45: stobs las de yis byang chub sems //
T02D1410:339a-46: dbang byed bdud rtsi'i cho ga dang //
T02D1410:339a-47: shin tu gsang ba mi sbed nyid //
T02D1410:339a-48: tshogs kyi 'dus pa rtsod pa dang //
T02D1410:339a-49: dad pa che las gsang ba'i chos //
T02D1410:339a-50: phyin ci log tu ston pa dang //
T02D1410:339a-51: nyan thos lhan cig nyin zhag bdun //
T02D1410:339b-1: dad pa med la dam tshig ston //
T02D1410:339b-3: de zhes pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang //
T02D1410:339b-4: sbom po'i ltung ba rnam pa dgu'o //
T02D1410:339b-5: ni ni gang gi phyir gyi don te /
T02D1410:339b-6: dngos grub kyi lam 'grogs par byed pa ni de'i phyir spang bar bya'o //
T02D1410:339b-8: / dmyal ba'i yi dags dud 'gro ru //
T02D1410:339b-9: kun nas ltung bar byed pa gang //
T02D1410:339b-10: de'i phyir ltung ba rnams su bshad /
T02D1410:339b-11: mkhas pas de rnams yongs su spang //
T02D1410:339b-12: ltung ba las slong bar byed pa'i sngags kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:339b-14: aom shr'i buddha ka p'a li kam bu a'a h'um
T02D1410:339b-15: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra h'um phat sv'a
T02D1410:339b-16: h'a / yang na rang gi ming bzlas pa yang
T02D1410:339b-17: stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug tu bzlas par bya'o
T02D1410:339b-18: h'a / // 'khor lo byas nas ji lta bu'i
T02D1410:339b-19: rnal 'byor gsungs pa las bla ma dam pa'i mdun
T02D1410:339b-20: du phyag byas nas ltung ba thams cad nges par
T02D1410:339b-21: 'dul bar byed pa'i gsang sngags gdon par bya'o //
T02D1410:339b-22: slar yang bla ma la gsol ba btab pas dam tshig sdom pa blang bar bya'o //
T02D1410:339b-23: bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste //
T02D1410:339b-24: dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams //
T02D1410:339b-25: bla ma mgon pos bdag skyabs mdzod //
T02D1410:339b-26: gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste //
T02D1410:339b-27: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1410:339b-28: 'gro ba'i gtso la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D1410:339b-29: zhes pa the tshom med byas nas //
T02D1410:339b-30: nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur //
T02D1410:339b-32: bla ma'i rgyud du bla mar yang //
T02D1410:339b-33: zhi bar 'gyur zhing skal bzangs nyid //
T02D1410:339b-34: rnal 'byor ma yis dbang yang bskur //
T02D1410:339b-35: thun bzhi'i go rims bzhin du ni //
T02D1410:339b-36: phyi dang gsang ba'i chus bkru'o //
T02D1410:339b-38: ltung ba las slong bar byed pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1410:339b-40: // / glang po rta dang rus sbal dang //
T02D1410:339b-41: rnga mo phag sogs ce spyang dang //
T02D1410:339b-42: bya rog 'ug sogs bya rgod sogs //
T02D1410:339b-43: khrung khrung bzhad dang khra rnams dang //
T02D1410:339b-44: gzugs bzang gzugs ngan rnams kyis kyang //
T02D1410:339b-45: lha yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:339b-48: 'di las che mchog dngos grub ni //
T02D1410:339b-49: 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin //
T02D1410:340a-0: @340a * // 'og min gnas kyi mthar thug pa //
T02D1410:340a-2: zhes pas phan yon gsungs so //
T02D1410:340a-3: 'og min na gzugs na spyod pa'i mtha' ste de'i mthar thug pa'i bdag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:340a-4: sa bdun gyi dbang phyug yang 'jig rten pa can sgrub pa nyid las so //
T02D1410:340a-5: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bsgoms pas ni dkyil 'khor mngon
T02D1410:340a-6: sum du byas pas kyang 'jig rten pa thams cad
T02D1410:340a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po mchog gi sangs rgyas su gsungs pa //
T02D1410:340a-9: 'dod par spyod pa'i dngos grub ni ;
T02D1410:340a-10: / las kyi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1410:340a-11: ye shes phyag rgyas 'og min gyi //
T02D1410:340a-12: gnas kyi mthar thug bdag po nyid //
T02D1410:340a-13: gzugs zhes bya'o kun mkhyen nyid //
T02D1410:340a-14: rnal 'byor chen po'i phyag rgya che //
T02D1410:340a-15: ma nyams bsgoms pas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1410:340a-16: 'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba nyid ;
T02D1410:340a-17: / skye ba 'di la sa sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D1410:340a-19: de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid kyis phag mo yud kyis bsam par bya'o //
T02D1410:340a-20: zung 'jug mnyam par sbyor ba las //
T02D1410:340a-21: snang ba gsal ba las bde ba'i //
T02D1410:340a-22: go 'phang rtag tu mthong ba ni //
T02D1410:340a-23: de ni rgyal bas mchod par 'dod //
T02D1410:340a-24: nyer spyod lnga yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1410:340a-25: myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur //
T02D1410:340a-27: mngon sum 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D1410:340a-28: dbang po'i dra lta'i 'jig rten du //
T02D1410:340a-29: sems can kun don byed pa po //
T02D1410:340a-30: rus sbal lus ni skyong ba ci //
T02D1410:340a-31: bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos //
T02D1410:340a-32: lung ni lhag par rtog pas grub //
T02D1410:340a-33: phyi yi bstan bcos kyis ma sgrub //
T02D1410:340a-34: de nyid phyir na 'gro ba'i mgon //
T02D1410:340a-35: bde ba che la yang dag brten //
T02D1410:340a-36: med pa'i chos can la ni chos //
T02D1410:340a-37: skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong //
T02D1410:340a-38: yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i //
T02D1410:340a-39: sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed //
T02D1410:340a-40: shes rab thabs gnyis snyoms 'jug pas //
T02D1410:340a-41: chos dbyings kun du dmigs pa la //
T02D1410:340a-42: thams cad stong par rab 'byung ba //
T02D1410:340a-43: ye shes dag pa'i ye shes nyid //
T02D1410:340b-0: gang des rdzogs pa'i byang chub @340b nyid ;
T02D1410:340b-1: / skad cig gcig la rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1410:340b-2: brgya phrag bco brgyad dbugs rnams kyis //
T02D1410:340b-3: 'gyur med skad cig gis zos pas //
T02D1410:340b-5: zung 'jug rnam par sgom pa po //
T02D1410:340b-6: de ltar nyi khri'i brgyad gnyis brgyas //
T02D1410:340b-7: rdzogs pa'i bde stong skad cig gis //
T02D1410:340b-8: bcu gnyis pa ni de nas 'grub //
T02D1410:340b-9: nges par sras po chen po yis //
T02D1410:340b-10: thog ma tha ma med ces pa //
T02D1410:340b-11: so so rang rig mi g-yo ba //
T02D1410:340b-12: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul //
T02D1410:340b-13: bde ba chen po rang don ldan //
T02D1410:340b-14: gzhan don byed phyir sangs rgyas te //
T02D1410:340b-15: rtag tu snying rje can gyi stobs //
T02D1410:340b-16: chos kyi dbyings la rtag tu gnas //
T02D1410:340b-17: skal ldan che ge zhes mthong ngo //
T02D1410:340b-18: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang dang ni //
T02D1410:340b-19: rnam rtog thams cad bral las te //
T02D1410:340b-20: 'gro ba nam mkha'i mthar thug par //
T02D1410:340b-21: sems can don la rab tu 'jug / mthong ba'i yul la khyab pa ni //
T02D1410:340b-22: sprul pa'i ye shes su bshad do //
T02D1410:340b-23: lus dang ngag yid gsang ba ni //
T02D1410:340b-24: lhan skyes bsgoms pa rnams kyis thob //
T02D1410:340b-25: ji ltar rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1410:340b-26: brgya byin gzugs brnyan sogs brjod pa //
T02D1410:340b-27: dgug byas nges par bton pa ni //
T02D1410:340b-28: chos kyi dbyings ni nges par gsungs //
T02D1410:340b-29: ji ltar bee d'ur sa gzhi gcang ma la //
T02D1410:340b-30: lha dbang lus kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba ltar //
T02D1410:340b-31: de bzhin 'gro ba'i sems gzhi gtsang ma la //
T02D1410:340b-32: thub pa'i dbang po sku yi gzugs brnyan 'char //
T02D1410:340b-33: ji ltar rnga bo che las ni //
T02D1410:340b-35: de bzhin rgyal ba bzo med par //
T02D1410:340b-36: ston par byed pa yang dag 'byung //
T02D1410:340b-37: ji ltar 'jig rten dge ba'i lam 'jug na //
T02D1410:340b-38: rlung skyes chu char sprin gyis 'bebs pa ltar //
T02D1410:340b-39: de bzhin brtse rlung 'gro dge mngon spel phyir //
T02D1410:340b-40: sangs rgyas sprin las dam chos char pa 'bebs //
T02D1410:340b-41: tshangs bzhin zag med gnas las ma bskyod pa //
T02D1410:340b-42: gang tshe sprul pa rnam pa du ma ston //
T02D1410:340b-43: rtag tu nyi bzhin ye shes snang ba spro //
T02D1410:340b-44: rnam dag rin chen yid bzhin nor bu'i thugs //
T02D1410:340b-45: rgyal ba rnams kyi gsungs 'di ni //
T02D1410:340b-46: brag ca bzhin du yi ge med //
T02D1410:341a-2: khyab dang gzugs med rtag pa med //
T02D1410:341a-3: sa bzhin 'gro ba'i dkar po yi //
T02D1410:341a-4: chos kyi sman ni ma lus pa'i //
T02D1410:341a-5: rnam pa kun du gzhir gyur pa //
T02D1410:341a-6: 'di ni sangs rgyas sa yin no //
T02D1410:341a-7: brgya byin rnga bzhin sprin dang tshangs pa nyi ma nor bu rin chen bzhin //
T02D1410:341a-8: brag ca lta bu nam mkha' dang ni sa gzhi lta bur de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1410:341a-10: skye ba bdun pa'i gzugs yongs su bsgyur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D1410:341a-12: // / de nas sbyin sreg cho ga bshad //
T02D1410:341a-14: gang gis yang dag cho ga yis //
T02D1410:341a-15: myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa //
T02D1410:341a-16: ba lang sha dang chang bsregs nas //
T02D1410:341a-17: lag pa g-yon pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:341a-18: sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang 'gyur na //
T02D1410:341a-19: phran tshogs mi ni smos ci dgos //
T02D1410:341a-21: chang ni bu ram las byung ba dang rgun 'brum
T02D1410:341a-22: gyi shing las skyes pa'i btags pa las byung ba'o
T02D1410:341a-25: kha chu so shing dag dang ni //
T02D1410:341a-26: de bzhin rang gi lus mnyes pa //
T02D1410:341a-27: ming dang myos byed sbyin sreg gis //
T02D1410:341a-28: 'jig rten gsum yang dbang du byed //
T02D1410:341a-30: ba chu ni skyugs pa'am mchil ma'o //
T02D1410:341a-31: myos byed ni rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba mo'o //
T02D1410:341a-33: zla mtshan ldan pa'i khrag dang ni //
T02D1410:341a-34: zos nas skyugs pa dag dang ni //
T02D1410:341a-35: mi yi skra dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1410:341a-38: rang gi lus las zos pa skyugs //
T02D1410:341a-39: nim pa'i shing la ma sbar nas //
T02D1410:341a-40: mkhas pa rang sgra'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:341a-41: mod la mchog tu sdang bar 'gyur //
T02D1410:341a-42: zhes te rang gi lus ni khyi'o //
T02D1410:341a-44: mkhas pa ni las rab 'byam shes pa'o //
T02D1410:341a-46: smyo byed me la brgyad brgyar ni //
T02D1410:341a-47: tsha ba'i til mar gyis bsgres pas //
T02D1410:341a-48: bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:341a-50: mi yi sha ni khrag dang ldan //
T02D1410:341a-51: ra can dug dang mnyam ldan pa //
T02D1410:341a-52: mtshan mo dur khrod sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:341b-0: dgra bo @341b myur du gsod par 'gyur //
T02D1410:341b-1: zhes te mtshan mo ni thun tshod gnyis pa la'o //
T02D1410:341b-3: zhi ba can ni srong la bya //
T02D1410:341b-4: de nas tho rangs rgyas pa can //
T02D1410:341b-5: nyi ma gung dang mtshan phyed la //
T02D1410:341b-6: dbang dang bskrang [*bskrad] pa la sogs so //
T02D1410:341b-7: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la ;
T02D1410:341b-8: / gnod pa byed pa'i dgra bo la ste nyes
T02D1410:341b-9: pa phyung dus mi bya ste dngos grub nyams par
T02D1410:341b-11: ce spyang sha yis sreg blugs brgya //
T02D1410:341b-12: yang dag sbyin sreg byed pa'i mi //
T02D1410:341b-13: de ni ji srid 'tsho bar du //
T02D1410:341b-14: lag tu dpal 'ong the tshom med //
T02D1410:341b-15: ces te mi ni shar du mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02D1410:341b-16: yang dag pa ni rgyas pa can gyi tshogs so //
T02D1410:341b-17: brgya ni brgyad lhag pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1410:341b-19: 'ga' zhig myos byed dang ldan pa'i //
T02D1410:341b-20: sha chen dag gis sbyin sreg byed //
T02D1410:341b-21: sgrub po mchog ni thun gsum du //
T02D1410:341b-22: ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar //
T02D1410:341b-23: ji srid 'tsho bar sa kun la //
T02D1410:341b-24: spyod par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D1410:341b-25: de bzhin zla ba gsum steng du //
T02D1410:341b-26: skad cig nyid la dbul ba 'jig / ces pa ni rtag tu'o //
T02D1410:341b-27: spyod par 'gyur zhes pa ni rtag tu'o //
T02D1410:341b-28: spyod par 'gyur zhes pa ni rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:341b-29: skad cig las ni stong thob pa la'o //
T02D1410:341b-31: gsang sngags dus kun zlos byed pa //
T02D1410:341b-32: de la btud ni yid ma yin //
T02D1410:341b-33: lha rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1410:341b-34: thun tshod gnyis su sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:341b-35: de la mkha' 'gro ma rgyal srid //
T02D1410:341b-37: rang gi lus ni 'di nyid kyis //
T02D1410:341b-38: mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang thob //
T02D1410:341b-39: ces pa ni phan yon gsungs pa'o //
T02D1410:341b-40: dus kun ni spyod lam bzhi po thams cad du bzlas par bya zhing mchod par bya'o //
T02D1410:341b-41: sngags ni gang la la zhig go //
T02D1410:341b-42: lha ni mkha' 'gro lnga la sogs pa'i sngags te mngon brjod du gsungs pa rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1410:341b-43: aom badzra d'a ka dam h'um phat /
T02D1410:341b-44: aom buddha d'a ka nyam h'um phat /
T02D1410:341b-45: aom ratna d'a ka h'um phat /
T02D1410:341b-46: aom padma d'a ka nam h'um phat /
T02D1410:341b-47: aom bi shva d'a ka mam h'um phat /
T02D1410:342a-1: snying po lnga ste thams cad gcig kho na'o zhes so //
T02D1410:342a-4: mchod la brtson pas mchod par 'gyur //
T02D1410:342a-5: bzlas la brtson pas rnam par dag / me la sbyin sreg brtson pas 'byor //
T02D1410:342a-6: bsam gtan brtson pas thar pa thob //
T02D1410:342a-8: rang gi lus ni mchog tu bde ba lus med pa 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1410:342a-9: 'di nyid kyis ni skye ba 'di nyid do //
T02D1410:342a-10: mkha' spyod ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o //
T02D1410:342a-11: go 'phang ni sangs rgyas nyid rtag pa'o //
T02D1410:342a-15: thob par 'gyur ni las kyi lus can no //
T02D1410:342a-17: ce spyang sha dang myos byed kyi //
T02D1410:342a-18: phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg gis //
T02D1410:342a-19: las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D1410:342a-20: sgrub pos rgyud du brjod pa yis //
T02D1410:342a-21: zhes pa ste ce spyang ni ce spyang ngo ;
T02D1410:342a-22: / las thams cad ni zhi ba can la sogs pa brgyad dngos grub chen po rnams so //
T02D1410:342a-23: sbyin sreg gis ni thab tu dong lta bar yang
T02D1410:342a-24: blugs gzar la sogs pas dang lag pas kyang bsgrub
T02D1410:342a-25: par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'i don to //
T02D1410:342a-26: goo zhes pa dbang po rnams so //
T02D1410:342a-28: m'am zhes m'a ma k'ir rab brjod //
T02D1410:342a-29: sa zhes rdzogs pa'i byang chub gsal //
T02D1410:342a-31: myos ni lhan cig skyes dga'o //
T02D1410:342a-32: sogs pa'i sgra las dga' ba gsum po rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D1410:342a-33: sbyin sreg gis ni lhan cig skyes pa stong pa bsgoms pas so //
T02D1410:342a-34: nang gi zhes pa thams cad stong pa bde ba la'o //
T02D1410:342a-35: phyi dang zhes pa kun rdzob kyi bden pas so //
T02D1410:342a-36: las rnams thams cad ces pa 'gro ba'i don byed pa sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D1410:342a-37: gsungs pa yang sangs rgyas nyid ni ye shes dang
T02D1410:342a-38: thugs rje dang nus par bstan pa don gnyis mkhyen
T02D1410:342a-39: pa'o zhes te nges pa'i don to //
T02D1410:342a-40: rgyud du ni shes rab dang thabs dag gis gzhung
T02D1410:342a-41: yang dag par spel ba rnams su ste der rgyal
T02D1410:342a-42: bas gsal bar byed pa rnams ni 'dus pa phyi
T02D1410:342a-43: ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud nyi shu
T02D1410:342b-0: rtsa bzhi dang rnal 'byor ma'i @342b rgyud rnams kyang
T02D1410:342b-1: ste dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba dang
T02D1410:342b-2: / mngon par brjod pa bla ma dang /
T02D1410:342b-3: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang /
T02D1410:342b-4: kun spyod dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /
T02D1410:342b-5: ri gi aa rilli dang rdo rje aa ralli dang dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa dang /
T02D1410:342b-8: ral pa gyen brdzes phyi ma dang kha sbyor 'byung
T02D1410:342b-9: ba'i rgyud rnams su rtogs par bya'o zhes pa sgra
T02D1410:342b-10: ji bzhin pa'o // da ni thab gsungs pa /
T02D1410:342b-11: zhi la thab khung zlum po ru //
T02D1410:342b-12: sgrub pos sbyin sreg bya ba yin //
T02D1410:342b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1410:342b-14: rdo rje a'a rallir yang nges par bstan pa /
T02D1410:342b-15: khru gang ba yi tshad tsam la //
T02D1410:342b-16: sngags pas khru phyed brkos par bya //
T02D1410:342b-17: mkhas pas shin tu dkar ba yis //
T02D1410:342b-18: rdul tshon ldan pas thab khung bya //
T02D1410:342b-19: der ni sha la sogs pa dang //
T02D1410:342b-20: gsungs pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1410:342b-22: 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed yin //
T02D1410:342b-24: 'dir thams cad du thab khung gi phyed kyi tshad brko bar bya'o //
T02D1410:342b-25: thab khung gi drug cha ni kha khyer te thab khung gi rnam pa'o //
T02D1410:342b-26: thab khung gi bcu gnyis cha ni mchu ste thad kar 'byung ba'o //
T02D1410:342b-27: gang gi che rdul tshon du gyur pa de'i tshon dpangs nges pa med do //
T02D1410:342b-29: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gru bzhi ru //
T02D1410:342b-30: gsal la gzhu yi rnam pa ru //
T02D1410:342b-31: zur lnga yang dag bshad pa la //
T02D1410:342b-32: slar yang rnam par ldang dang bskrad //
T02D1410:342b-33: dbang la zur gsum pa yi thab ;
T02D1410:342b-34: / dgug pa la ni zur bdun du //
T02D1410:342b-35: rmongs pa'i sbyin sreg zur drug tu //
T02D1410:342b-36: rengs pa la yang zur brgyad la //
T02D1410:342b-37: thab khung mtshan nyid shes nas ni //
T02D1410:342b-38: de nas me la sbyin sreg byin //
T02D1410:342b-40: 'dir thams cad du me tog dang gos la sogs
T02D1410:342b-41: pa las kyi rjes su 'brangs pas dkar po la
T02D1410:342b-43: sngags ni mchog tu gsang chen la yang brjod pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'dir mi brjod do //
T02D1410:342b-44: 'dir zhi ba la dkar po'i zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas sngon ma gtso ba'o //
T02D1410:343a-2: rgyas pa la dkar po dang ser po mtshungs pa gnyis pa la 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:343a-3: de bzhin du rengs pa la ser po rengs pa gsum pa la'o //
T02D1410:343a-4: de bzhin du rmongs pa la ser po dang dmar por 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:343a-5: de bzhin du dgug pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dmar po lnga pa la 'gyur ro //
T02D1410:343a-6: de bzhin du dbang la dmar po dang nag po drug pa la'o //
T02D1410:343a-7: de bzhin du gsang ba la nag po'i zhal bdun pa la'o //
T02D1410:343a-8: skrod par byed pa ni dkar po dang nag po brgyad pa la'o //
T02D1410:343a-9: bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa khro ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1410:343a-10: yang na thun phyed pa'i dbye bas phye'o //
T02D1410:343a-11: yang na thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas las rnams te snga ma'i thun mtshams la zhi ba'o //
T02D1410:343a-12: nyi ma gung la rengs pa'o //
T02D1410:343a-13: nub par gyur pa la dgug pa'o //
T02D1410:343a-14: mtshan mo phyed la gsang ba'o //
T02D1410:343a-16: dpal 'bras pa la sha dang ni //
T02D1410:343a-17: au dumw'a ra'am aa shvadtha ni yam shing ngo //
T02D1410:343a-18: de nas gsang sngags grub par 'gyur //
T02D1410:343a-22: cho gas bcu cha'i sbyin sreg las //
T02D1410:343a-24: 'dir thams cad du dang por sngags bsgrub pa'i ched
T02D1410:343a-25: du yi ge gsum gyi gsang sngags kyi bdag po
T02D1410:343a-26: bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa bsgrub par
T02D1410:343a-27: bya'o // de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i bsam
T02D1410:343a-28: gtan dang bsam gtan gzhan bsgrub pa'i ched du dang
T02D1410:343a-30: rnam pa gzhan du dngos grub med do //
T02D1410:343a-31: dpal dus kyi 'khor lor yang gsungs pa //
T02D1410:343a-32: sngags dang gzugs brnyan grub par srid pa gsum gnas
T02D1410:343a-33: su ni ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma
T02D1410:343a-34: yin // de yi rgyal po rang sems dri ma
T02D1410:343a-35: rnam par bral ba dag la gsang sngags gzugs ni
T02D1410:343a-36: yin // bsgrub par bya // zhes pas //
T02D1410:343a-37: de bzhin du srog gi rlung rdo rje bzlas pa'am
T02D1410:343a-38: ma ning gi bzlas pas sam srog rtsol la sogs
T02D1410:343a-39: pas las rab 'byam gyi don du dbu mar rab
T02D1410:343a-41: srog gis bsgrubs pa las rnam pa gzhan du las grub pa med do zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1410:343a-42: gsal lo sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02D1410:343a-43: de nas 'dis ni ye shes kyi //
T02D1410:343b-1: phyag rgyas bcing dang lag par dgod //
T02D1410:343b-2: de nas yan lag dgod pa sogs //
T02D1410:343b-3: dpral drug mnyam par spror ba yis //
T02D1410:343b-4: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1410:343b-5: zhes pa la sogs pas ye shes dgug pa la
T02D1410:343b-6: sogs pa mdor ston te dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs
T02D1410:343b-7: nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D1410:343b-8: zhes pa la sogs pas rab tu gzhug par bya'o
T02D1410:343b-11: ye shes sems dpa' ni gzhon nu ma dang rab tu 'grogs pa'i khu ba ste /
T02D1410:343b-12: de'i dgug pa ni srog la sogs pa'i rlung gi tshogs kyis byed do //
T02D1410:343b-13: spyi bor byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1410:343b-14: des mes zhu bar gyur nas thig le'i gzugs kyis
T02D1410:343b-15: mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang
T02D1410:343b-16: bar rab tu 'jug par byed do //
T02D1410:343b-17: sa ni de'i bcing ba byed do //
T02D1410:343b-18: chu'i khams ni lus la bsil ba nyid du byed do //
T02D1410:343b-19: slar yang gnas de nas steng du bgrod pa'i don du rgyu mthun pa'i bde ba nyid do //
T02D1410:343b-20: spyan ma la sogs pas rdo rje'i glu rnams kyis rab tu rtogs par byed do //
T02D1410:343b-21: lte ba la sogs pa nas de lta bu la
T02D1410:343b-22: sogs pa rnams kyis bslangs nas bde ba chen po
T02D1410:343b-23: dri ma med pa nyid du gyur pas phung po
T02D1410:343b-24: la sogs pa sgrib pa med par byed do //
T02D1410:343b-25: de nas rnal 'byor pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

T02D1410:347a-14: dur khrod du ni rol par gang //
