T02D1410:347a-17: de ltar thams cad yongs shes bya //
T02D1410:347a-18: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:347a-19: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1410:347a-20: rlung me chu dang sa gzhi ri //
T02D1410:347a-22: dbus su dkyil 'khor gtso bo de //
T02D1410:347a-23: au ma dbang phyug mnyam mnan nas //
T02D1410:347a-24: zhes pa la sogs pas sprul pa'i sku rgyas par
T02D1410:347a-25: 'chad de de'i au ma dbang phyug ni g-yon du
T02D1410:347a-29: dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo mnan //
T02D1410:347a-30: au ma'i nu ma rgyas pa mnan //
T02D1410:347a-32: rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang dkar po zhal gcig pa
T02D1410:347a-33: phyag bzhi rnams su dgra sta dang thod pa dang
T02D1410:347a-35: rgan byang ma nag mo zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi
T02D1410:347a-36: rnams su thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang ral
T02D1410:347a-37: gri dang cang te'u can no //
T02D1410:347a-40: bdud rtsi yi ni thod pa rnams //
T02D1410:347a-41: nag po dmar po dkar po'i lha //
T02D1410:347a-42: 'khor lo gsum du rim bzhin gnas //
T02D1410:347a-43: mkha' 'gro ma sogs rim ji bzhin //
T02D1410:347a-44: bya rog gdong sogs de bzhin nyid //
T02D1410:347a-45: phyogs su ji ltar de bzhin zur //
T02D1410:347a-46: sgrub pos rtag tu shes par bya //
T02D1410:347a-47: zhes te ye shes 'khor lo ni snying po'i 'dab ma la'o //
T02D1410:347a-48: bdud rtsi ni bshang ba dang gci ba dang khrag
T02D1410:347a-49: bcud rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs pa'i phyogs bral
T02D1410:347a-50: rnams su'o // de nyid du nag po ni thugs kyi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1410:347a-51: de bzhin du dmar po ni gsung gi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1410:347a-52: dkar po ni sku'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1410:347a-53: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams nag mo dang
T02D1410:347b-0: so bsangs ma dang dmar mo dang ser mo @347b
T02D1410:347b-1: rnams shar dang byang la sogs te bya rog gdong
T02D1410:347b-2: la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1410:347b-3: zur du gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1410:347b-5: yang na zhal gyi kha dog gis de rnams phyogs bzhir bskor bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1410:347b-6: nag po dmar po gser du snang //
T02D1410:347b-7: kha ba kunda zla ba mtshungs //
T02D1410:347b-8: zhes gtso bo'i zhal gyi kha dog gi dbye bas rnal 'byor ma dgu po de rnams nag mo'o //
T02D1410:347b-9: g-yas su dmar mo dgu ser mo rgyab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D1410:347b-10: byang du gnas pa dkar mo'o //
T02D1410:347b-14: gzugs gnyis ldan zhing yid 'phrog ma //
T02D1410:347b-16: he ru ka dpal rgyal po che //
T02D1410:347b-17: go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1410:347b-18: sems dpa' dpa' bo pho nya mo //
T02D1410:347b-19: dngos po kun gyi rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1410:347b-21: longs spyod rdzogs pa gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:347b-22: longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid 'khor los sgyur ba bzhin
T02D1410:347b-23: du slar yang khams thams cad du rdzogs par longs
T02D1410:347b-24: spyod pa nyid tha dad ma yin par yongs su
T02D1410:347b-26: de yang mchog gi dang po la sogs par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1410:347b-28: klu yi dbang po rus pa'i rgyan //
T02D1410:347b-29: stag lpags glang po'i pags pa dang //
T02D1410:347b-30: bdud dang nyon mongs snyoms 'jug dang //
T02D1410:347b-31: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1410:347b-34: 'khor gsum rnam par rtog pa gang //
T02D1410:347b-35: de ni shes bya'i sgrib par 'dod //
T02D1410:347b-36: ser sna la sogs pa rnam rtog gang //
T02D1410:347b-37: de nyid nyon mongs sgrib par 'dod //
T02D1410:347b-39: bdud kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pas klu'i dbang po'o //
T02D1410:347b-40: nyon mongs dag pas rus pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1410:347b-41: snyoms 'jug dag pas stag gi pags pa'o //
T02D1410:347b-42: shes bya yongs su dag pas glang po che'i pags pa yang ngo //
T02D1410:347b-44: au ma dbang phyug che de bzhin //
T02D1410:347b-45: thod pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang //
T02D1410:347b-46: thod pa'i phreng ba de bzhin te //
T02D1410:347b-47: thal bcas tshangs pa'i skud pa dang //
T02D1410:347b-48: mgo bo'i phreng ba yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:347b-49: de dag rnam dag shes par bya //
T02D1410:347b-50: khro bo'i dbang dang byang chub sems //
T02D1410:347b-51: sgrib pa cung zad dang ldan no //
T02D1410:347b-52: zhes te cung zad ces pa nyon mongs pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1410:348a-2: nyung ngu'i ye shes kyis byas pa //
T02D1410:348a-3: nyon mongs bzhi po nges bsregs yin //
T02D1410:348a-4: zhes te sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:348a-5: au ma dang dbang phyug chen po ni rdul dang khu ba'o //
T02D1410:348a-7: mgo po yang ni nyon mongs bdud //
T02D1410:348a-8: thod pa nam mkha' dag pa zhes so //
T02D1410:348a-9: a'a li k'a li'i dag pa sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1410:348a-10: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pas //
T02D1410:348a-11: spyod pa sna tshogs kun du gnas //
T02D1410:348a-12: sna tshogs tshul gyi cho ga yis //
T02D1410:348a-13: sna tshogs pa yi thabs bstan no //
T02D1410:348a-14: zhes te lhag par mos pa tha dad pa nyid
T02D1410:348a-15: kyi sems can gang yin pa de la tha dad
T02D1410:348a-16: pa'i tshul dang thabs bstan no //
T02D1410:348a-17: lhag par mos pa sna tshogs pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i sems so //
T02D1410:348a-18: spyod pa dang tshul rnam pa gsum ni bye brag
T02D1410:348a-19: tu smra ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams so
T02D1410:348a-20: // thabs ni lam sgom par byed pa'o //
T02D1410:348a-21: de la gang thag tu smra ba rnams la gang
T02D1410:348a-22: zag mi rtag par sgom pa la sogs pa gsungs
T02D1410:348a-23: so // don smra ba rnams las la sogs pa'i zad par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1410:348a-24: rnam par shes pa rnams la brtags pa tsam nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D1410:348a-25: dbu ma rnams la rmi lam lta bu dang 'gyur
T02D1410:348a-26: ba med pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sgom
T02D1410:348a-27: pa gsungs te sems can gyi bsam pas ston pa
T02D1410:348a-28: rnams kyang de bzhin te khur ba'i gang zag yod
T02D1410:348a-29: de rtag par yang mi smra mi rtag par yang
T02D1410:348a-30: mi smra'o // rdul phra rab tshogs pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1410:348a-31: kyi tha ma'i lus mtshan la sogs pa dang ldan
T02D1410:348a-33: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste khams gsum
T02D1410:348a-34: pa ni rnam par shes pa tsam mo zhes so
T02D1410:348a-36: sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo //
T02D1410:348a-37: 'byung dang sdud par byed pa mo //
T02D1410:348a-39: shes rab pa rol phyin byed ma //
T02D1410:348a-40: byed po sangs rgyas lus can min //
T02D1410:348a-41: zhes te ldog pas mya ngan las 'das pa nyan
T02D1410:348a-42: thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi phung po lhag ma
T02D1410:348a-44: theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi phung po lhag ma med pa'o //
T02D1410:348a-45: stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa smra ba po
T02D1410:348a-46: rnams kyi rab tu mi gnas pa shin tu gnyid
T02D1410:348a-47: log pa dang sad pa dang bral ba bzhi pa
T02D1410:348a-48: dang rmi lam lta bu ni 'bras bu'o //
T02D1410:348a-49: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du
T02D1410:348b-0: bstan pa la gang sems ma yin @348b pa'o zhes
T02D1410:348b-1: gsungs pa chos thams cad dngos po ma yin pa'i
T02D1410:348b-2: rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes so //
T02D1410:348b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa /
T02D1410:348b-4: nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis //
T02D1410:348b-5: 'dus ma byas gsum rtag pa ste //
T02D1410:348b-6: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //
T02D1410:348b-7: bdag gi stong zhing byed po med ;
T02D1410:348b-8: / dbang skyes blo ni rna med kyis //
T02D1410:348b-9: phra rab bsags pa dngos su rig / kha che'i gzhung gi chu gter gyi //
T02D1410:348b-11: shes pa rnam can skyed byed ni //
T02D1410:348b-12: dbang po'i spyod yul snang ba min //
T02D1410:348b-13: nam mkha'i mo gsham bu dang mtshungs //
T02D1410:348b-14: 'gog pa dag ni nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1410:348b-15: 'du byad bems po yod ma yin //
T02D1410:348b-16: dus gsum rjes 'gro dag kyang med //
T02D1410:348b-17: thogs pa med pa'i gzugs yod min //
T02D1410:348b-18: zhes pa mdo sde pa yi rig / yan lag can zhes bya ba med //
T02D1410:348b-19: phra rab rdul rnams yod ma yin //
T02D1410:348b-20: sgyu ma rmi lam mthong ba yis //
T02D1410:348b-21: dmigs pa med pa rab tu gsal //
T02D1410:348b-22: gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba'i //
T02D1410:348b-23: rnam par shes pa don dam yong //
T02D1410:348b-24: rnal 'byor spyod gzhung rgya mtsho yis //
T02D1410:348b-25: pha rol phyin rnams de skad sgrogs //
T02D1410:348b-26: rnam par shes pa don dam yod //
T02D1410:348b-27: de yang mkhas rnams mi 'dod do //
T02D1410:348b-28: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin dang //
T02D1410:348b-29: bral phyir nam mkha'i padmo bzhin //
T02D1410:348b-30: yod dang med dang yod med dang //
T02D1410:348b-31: gnyis ka'i bdag nyid min pa'am min //
T02D1410:348b-32: mtha' bzhi rnam par grol ba yis //
T02D1410:348b-33: de nyid dbu ma pa yi rig / de bzhin du 'ang //
T02D1410:348b-34: bdag med 'byung ba yod cing dge dang mi dge
T02D1410:348b-35: 'bras bu yod de byed pa po yis rnam par
T02D1410:348b-36: dman // 'gro ba po med ma lus thar ba'i
T02D1410:348b-37: slad du 'gro ba yod cing 'chi ba yod de
T02D1410:348b-38: dman // bcings pa med // dngos po med pa
T02D1410:348b-39: dag kyang yod de skad cig rnam bral rang bzhin
T02D1410:348b-40: med pa dag gi srid pa yod //
T02D1410:348b-41: 'di dag bdag gi bden pa'i tshig ste lha dang
T02D1410:348b-42: gdengs can rnams kyi gdon bcas tshig gis 'joms mi
T02D1410:348b-44: zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la //
T02D1410:348b-45: gal te mos par ma gyur kyang //
T02D1410:348b-46: smod pa dag tu mi bya ste //
T02D1410:348b-47: chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya //
T02D1410:348b-48: zhes pas dag pa'i sku gsungs so //
T02D1410:348b-49: zab mo ni rtog ge'i yul ma yin pa'o //
T02D1410:348b-50: gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa //
T02D1410:348b-51: bdag gis chos nyid mi shes te //
T02D1410:349a-2: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen //
T02D1410:349a-3: sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02D1410:349a-4: gang gis khams gsum rgyas gdab pa //
T02D1410:349a-5: khro bo'i dbang dang byang chub sems //
T02D1410:349a-7: zhes te bdag nyid chen po ni sku lnga'o //
T02D1410:349a-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni sa bcu gsum gyi dbang po'o //
T02D1410:349a-9: dus gsum bzhugs pa ni tshogs gsum mo //
T02D1410:349a-10: khro bo'i dbang po ni gshin rje mthar byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:349a-11: byang chub smes dpa' ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:349a-12: dang yig las spyan ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1410:349a-13: thams cad ni mkha' 'gro lnga la sogs pa rnams
T02D1410:349a-14: kyis mkhyen no zhes pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o
T02D1410:349a-16: de ltar gang zhig sgom pa dang /
T02D1410:349a-17: gsang sngags bzlas pa byed pa ni //
T02D1410:349a-18: skye dang skye bar chos ldan pa'i //
T02D1410:349a-20: zhes pas rjes su 'gro ba gsungs so //
T02D1410:349a-21: de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs sam //
T02D1410:349a-22: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang ngo //
T02D1410:349a-24: dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod //
T02D1410:349a-25: me yi dbus su legs gzhag la //
T02D1410:349a-26: de la mar ni zhu 'gyur te //
T02D1410:349a-27: snod kyi dri ma gnas par byed //
T02D1410:349a-28: ces pas las kyis lus gtong ba don du gnyer ba la dpe gsungs pa /
T02D1410:349a-29: dper na mar me med pa bzhin du lus gnas pa rnam par shes pa med pa'o //
T02D1410:349a-30: dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang /
T02D1410:349a-31: phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde ba'i
T02D1410:349a-32: go 'phang 'gro ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni
T02D1410:349a-33: grags pa min // zhes te dgongs pa /
T02D1410:349a-35: rnal 'byor ma rnams thugs dgyes pas //
T02D1410:349a-36: lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs //
T02D1410:349a-37: sna tshogs rgyal mtshan yang dag ldan //
T02D1410:349a-38: sna tshogs rol mo'i sgra rnams dang //
T02D1410:349a-39: sna tshogs glu dang mchod pa yis //
T02D1410:349a-41: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
T02D1410:349a-42: ces pa ste nyes pa mthar phyin pa gsungs so //
T02D1410:349a-43: 'am gyi sgra las skyes pa 'di nyid kho na la'o //
T02D1410:349a-44: phyag rgya chen po dang bcas pa grub pa'i dngos grub kyi dus su'o //
T02D1410:349a-46: dus kyi 'khor lor khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo
T02D1410:349a-47: dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang
T02D1410:349a-49: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa las
T02D1410:349b-0: grub pa'i @349b dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon
T02D1410:349b-1: sum 'gyur // de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri
T02D1410:349b-2: bong can gyi zhag gi ri rangs nas ni mtshan
T02D1410:349b-4: rin po che'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus
T02D1410:349b-5: kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur
T02D1410:349b-6: // zhes te rnal 'byor ma rnams gur gum la sogs pa'i char 'bebs par byed do //
T02D1410:349b-7: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1410:349b-9: rdo rje slob dpon rnams kyis byed de de'i phyir ro zhes so //
T02D1410:349b-10: 'di rnams rtogs na mi shes pa rnams kyi 'chi
T02D1410:349b-11: ba'o zhes phung po med pa mchog gi bde ba
T02D1410:349b-13: phyag rgya'i dngos grub mnyam pa 'di'o //
T02D1410:349b-14: phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyang dpal dus kyi 'khor lor gsungs pa /
T02D1410:349b-15: mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khrums
T02D1410:349b-16: nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni byung mi
T02D1410:349b-17: bya // gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi
T02D1410:349b-18: tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par
T02D1410:349b-19: bya // rab tu 'gyur // rdo rje chu skyes
T02D1410:349b-20: dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying gar
T02D1410:349b-21: ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste //
T02D1410:349b-22: 'di yi 'od zer rnams kyis gnyis ka'i lus ni
T02D1410:349b-23: gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad nyid du
T02D1410:349b-25: 'khrid par byed ni de rnams kyis sam de rnams
T02D1410:349b-26: kyi mkha' spyod nas su ste gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1410:349b-29: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur ram //
T02D1410:349b-30: ma byung na yang rnam kun du //
T02D1410:349b-31: bsam gyis mi khyab chos nyid ni //
T02D1410:349b-33: zhes pas stong pa nyid dang snying rje tha mi dad pa gsungs so //
T02D1410:349b-34: sangs rgyas rnams ni sangs rgyas sprul pa sku gsum po rnams so //
T02D1410:349b-35: de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1410:349b-36: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa //
T02D1410:349b-37: dag pa'i sku las spro bar byed //
T02D1410:349b-40: zhes pa de ltar bzhag nas ni //
T02D1410:349b-41: 'jig rten pa kun smad mi bya //
T02D1410:349b-42: de rnams rtogs pa bsam mi khyab //
T02D1410:349b-43: sangs rgyas gar mkhan bsam mi khyab //
T02D1410:349b-45: gzhal nas ni de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rtogs par byas nas so //
T02D1410:349b-46: 'jig rten pa kun ni lha rnams so //
T02D1410:349b-47: smad par mi bya'o zhes pa ni gsungs pa yang
T02D1410:349b-48: dag gang las don gang la bsam par bya ba
T02D1410:349b-49: thams cad stong par bgrod pa mthar thug pa ni
T02D1410:349b-50: thams cad 'od gsal ba mthar thug pa'i phyir ro
T02D1410:350a-2: bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rtog ge'i rtogs bya ma yin pa'o //
T02D1410:350a-3: sangs rgyas gar mkhan ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o //
T02D1410:350a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul du gsungs pa yang /
T02D1410:350a-5: sangs rgyas khams dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang //
T02D1410:350a-6: sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas mdzad pa ste //
T02D1410:350a-7: 'di ni 'dren pa rnams kyis spyod yul de //
T02D1410:350a-8: dag pa'i sems can gyis kyang bsam mi khyab //
T02D1410:350a-10: gal te sangs rgyas khams med na //
T02D1410:350a-11: lus can kun la myang 'das med //
T02D1410:350a-12: byang chub kyang gsungs pa 'phel 'grib spangs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pas 'dir ro //
T02D1410:350a-13: chos kyang gsungs pa mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa
T02D1410:350a-14: rnams te chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang
T02D1410:350a-16: nges par 'ching ba'i gegs byed pa la dang /
T02D1410:350a-17: lam kun bshad pa la dang /
T02D1410:350a-18: 'gog pa thob pa la mi 'jigs pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1410:350a-19: 'di yang nub par gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi bya ba'o //
T02D1410:350a-20: rdo rje aa rall'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang de
T02D1410:350a-21: nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad go
T02D1410:350a-22: 'phang mchog nyid thob nas sangs rgyas kyi gar ston
T02D1410:350a-23: par byed de kha cig tu rdzogs par byang chub
T02D1410:350a-24: par byed / kha cig tu dga' ba spyod pa dang /
T02D1410:350a-25: lha las babs pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T02D1410:350a-26: de bzhin du khab nas nges par 'byung ba zhes so //
T02D1410:350a-28: mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams //
T02D1410:350a-29: rnal 'byor gang mtha'i dbye ba las //
T02D1410:350a-30: sems can 'jug la tshul khrims ni //
T02D1410:350a-31: de dang de la rab tu bstan //
T02D1410:350a-32: zhes pas sde snod gsum bsdus pa gsungs te tshul

T02D1410:351a-1: 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de gzugs nas stong par lta byed pa //

T02D1410:351a-6: rgyal po ni gnyis su med pas dbang du byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1410:351a-7: rdzogs so ni yang dag par thob pa ste sems
T02D1410:351a-8: can thams cad kyi mthar thug gi de nyid do

T02D1410:351a-11: rgyud dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud rab

T02D1410:351b-0: srid pa ni 'byung @351b 'gyur gyi srid pa 'bras bu'o //
